(If you did not choose to view a preview, Android Studio skips this step, and converts your images immediately.) During the preview step, you can adjust the quality setting for each image individually, as described below.
(如果你未选择查看预览，Android Studio 会跳过此步骤，并立即转换图像。)在预览步骤中，你可以单独调整每个图像的质量设置，如下所述。
(Note that in LabelView, the real work is done by a private <c1>measureWidth()</c1> method.)
(注意在 LabelView 中，真正起作用的是私有的 <c1>measureWidth()</c1> 方法。)
(Note that the list of TV inputs available on the system can be obtained by calling <c2><a3>TvInputManager#getTvInputList()</a3></c2>.)
(请注意，可以通过调用 <c2><a3>TvInputManager#getTvInputList()</a3></c2> 来获取系统上可用的电视输入列表。)

(Note that you should avoid using <c16><a17>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_HIDE_NAVIGATION</a17></c16> by itself.) If you have set the window flag <c18><a19>FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a19></c18> to hide the status bar (instead of using <c20><a21>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a21></c20>), then a hidden status bar will be considered a "stable" state for purposes here.

(请注意，你应该避免单独使用 <c16><a17>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_HIDE_NAVIGATION</a17></c16>。)如果你已将窗口标志 <c18><a19>FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a19></c18> 设置为隐藏状态栏(而不是使用 <c20><a21>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a21></c20>)，然后隐藏状态栏将被视为 "稳定" 状态。

(See <c3><a4>MeasureSpec.makeMeasureSpec</a4></c3> for more details.) This was triggered when a RelativeLayout container was placed in a scrolling container, such as a ScrollView or HorizontalScrollView.
（有关详细信息，请参阅 <c3><a4>MeasureSpec.makeMeasureSpec</a4></c3>。）当 RelativeLayout 容器放置在滚动容器（如 ScrollView 或 Horizo​​ntalScrollView）中时会触发此操作。
(The NinePatch image is saved as <c0>res/drawable/my_button_background.9.png</c0>
(该 NinePatch 图保存在 <c0>res/drawable/my_button_background.9.png</c0>
(When you specify an ID to an XML resource using the plus sign—in the format <c2>android:id="@+id/name"</c2>—it means that the "name" ID does not exist and should be created.)
(当你使用加号为 XML 资源指定 ID 时，格式为 <c2>android:id="@+id/name"</c2> - 这意味着 "name" ID 不存在且应该被创造。)

(e.g. <c1><a2>RecyclerView.ViewHolder.getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>, <c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>) You should use these methods when you need to work with up-to-date adapter positions even if they may not have been reflected to layout yet.
(例如 <c1><a2>RecyclerView.ViewHolder.getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>，<c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>)当你使用这些方法时需要使用最新的适配器位置，即使它们可能尚未反映到布局中。

(e.g. <c1><a2>getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>, <c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>) You should use these methods when you need to work with up-to-date adapter positions even if they may not have been reflected to layout yet.
(比如 <c1><a2>getAdapterPosition()</a2></c1>，<c3><a4>findViewHolderForAdapterPosition(int)</a4></c3>) 当你需要去使用最新的适配器位置时，你应该使用这些方法，即使这些位置还没有针对布局进行更新。

<a0><c1>ConstraintLayout</c1></a0> allows you to create large and complex layouts with a flat view hierarchy (no nested view groups).

翻译于：20170505 平方X 参考： [1]_SOLID.[译文]使用 ConstraintLayout 构建一个响应式的 UI.http://www.jianshu.com/p/f61227a2775f [2].weiyf.【双语】使用 ConstraintLayout 构建响应式 UI(Build a Responsive UI with ConstraintLayout).https://weiyf.cn/2017/03/10/Build%20a%20Responsive%20UI%20with%20ConstraintLayout/ <a0><c1>ConstraintLayout</c1></a0> 允许你使用平面 view 层次结构创建大而复杂的布局(没有嵌套 view groups)。

<b0>Note:</b0> <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1> is available as a support library that you can use on Android systems starting with API level 9 (Gingerbread).
<b0>Note:</b0> <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1> 可用作支持库，你可以在从 API 级别 9(Gingerbread)开始的 Android 系统上使用。
<b0>Note:</b0> Because no markup is recognized within a <c1>CDATASection</c1>, character numeric references cannot be used as an escape mechanism when serializing.
<b0>Note:</b0> 由于 <c1>CDATASection</c1> 中未识别出标记，因此在序列化时，字符数字引用不能用作转义机制。

<b0>Note:</b0> Because support for lossless and transparent WebP images is only available in Android 4.3 and higher, your project must declare a <c1>minSdkVersion</c1> of 18 or higher to create lossless or transparent WebP images using Android Studio.
<b0>Note:</b0> 由于对无损和透明 WebP 图像的支持仅适用于 Android 4.3 及更高版本，因此你的项目必须声明 18 或更高的 <c1>minSdkVersion</c1> 才能创建无损或透明的 WebP 图像使用 Android Studio。
<b0>Note:</b0> If you set the quality to 100% and the <c1>minSdkVersion</c1> is set to 18 or higher, Android Studio automatically switches to lossless encoding instead.
<b0>Note:</b0> 如果将质量设置为 100％并且 <c1>minSdkVersion</c1> 设置为 18 或更高，则 Android Studio 会自动切换到无损编码。

<b0>Note:</b0> One potential solution in the serialization process is to end the CDATA section before the character, output the character using a character reference or entity reference, and open a new CDATA section for any further characters in the text node.
<b0>Note:</b0> 序列化过程中的一个可能的解决方案是在字符前结束 CDATA 部分，使用字符引用或实体引用输出字符，并为文本中的任何其他字符打开新的 CDATA 部分节点。
<b0>Packed:</b0> The views are packed together (after margins are accounted for).
<b0>Packed:</b0> view 被打包在一起(在考虑边距之后)。
<b0>Spread inside:</b0> The first and last view are affixed to the constraints on each end of the chain and the rest are evenly distributed.
<b0>Spread inside:</b0> 第一个和最后一个 view 被附加到链的每个端部上的约束，并且其余的是均匀分布的。
<b0>Spread:</b0> The views are evenly distributed (after margins are accounted for).
<b0>Spread:</b0> view 均匀分布(在考虑边距之后)。

<b0>Weighted:</b0> When the chain is set to either <b1>spread</b1> or <b2>spread inside</b2>, you can fill the remaining space by setting one or more views to "match constraints" (<c3>0dp</c3>).
<b0>Weighted:</b0> 当链被设置为 <b1>spread</b1> 或 <b2>spread inside</b2>，你可以通过将一个或多个 view 设置为(<c3>0dp</c3>)来填充剩余空间。

<c0><a1>android:checkable</a1></c0> - If true, the chip can be toggled.
<c0><a1>android:checkable</a1></c0> - 如果为 true，则可以切换 chip。
<c0><a1>android:text</a1></c0> - Sets the text of the chip.
<c0><a1>android:text</a1></c0> - 设置 chip 的文本。

<c0><a1>app:closeIcon</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>app:closeIconEnabled</a3></c2> - 设置用户可以点击关闭的自定义图标。
<c0><a1>onMeasure()</a1></c0> has no return value.
<c0><a1>onMeasure()</a1></c0> 没有返回值。
<c0><a1>onSizeChanged()</a1></c0> is called when your view is first assigned a size, and again if the size of your view changes for any reason.
首次为 view 指定大小时，将调用 <c0><a1>onSizeChanged()</a1></c0>，如果 view 大小因任何原因发生更改，则会再次调用。
<c0>@Deprecated</c0>: The @Deprecated annotation must be used whenever the use of the annotated element is discouraged.
<c0>@Deprecated</c0>：在不建议使用注释元素时，必须使用 @Deprecated 注释。
<c0>@Override</c0>: The @Override annotation must be used whenever a method overrides the declaration or implementation from a super-class.
<c0>@Override</c0>：当某个方法替换了超类中的声明或实现时，必须使用 @Override 注释。
<c0>@SuppressWarnings</c0>: The @SuppressWarnings annotation should be used only under circumstances where it is impossible to eliminate a warning.
<c0>@SuppressWarnings</c0>：@SuppressWarnings 注释应该仅在无法消除警告的情况下使用。
<c0>AndroidManifest.xml</c0>: Contains the core Android manifest file.
<c0>AndroidManifest.xml</c0>：包含核心 Android 清单文件。
<c0>AttributeSet</c0>: This value may be <c1>null</c1>.
<c0>AttributeSet</c0>：此值可能为 <c1>null</c1>。
<c0>AttributeSet</c0>: the attributes to build the layout parameters from
<c0>AttributeSet</c0>：从中构建布局参数的属性
<c0>Bitmap.CompressFormat</c0>: The format of the compressed image
<c0>Bitmap.CompressFormat</c0>：压缩图像的格式
<c0>Bitmap</c0>: The bitmap to use inside the shader
<c0>Bitmap</c0>: 在着色器内使用的位图
<c0>BitmapFactory.Options</c0>: null-ok; Options that control downsampling and whether the image should be completely decoded, or just is size returned.
<c0>BitmapFactory.Options</c0>：可以为 null ；相关选项，用来控制 downsampling 以及图像是否应该完全解码，或者只是返回大小。
<c0>BitmapFactory.Options</c0>: null-ok; Options that control downsampling.
<c0>BitmapFactory.Options</c0>：可为 null ；控制采样的选项。
<c0>CHAIN_PACKED</c0> -- the elements of the chain will be packed together.
<c0>CHAIN_PACKED</c0> -- 链的元素将被打包在一起。
<c0>CHAIN_SPREAD</c0> -- the elements will be spread out (default style)
<c0>CHAIN_SPREAD</c0> --元素将会被展开(默认样式)。
<c0>CHAIN_SPREAD_INSIDE</c0> -- similar, but the endpoints of the chain will not be spread out
<c0>CHAIN_SPREAD_INSIDE</c0> -- 相似的，但是链的端点将会被展开
<c0>Canvas</c0>: Canvas to draw into
<c0>Canvas</c0>: 要绘制进的 Canvas
<c0>Configuration</c0>: A <c1><a2>Configuration</a2></c1> specifying what values to modify in the base Configuration of the original Context's resources.
<c0>Configuration</c0>：<c1><a2>Configuration</a2></c1> 指定在原始上下文资源的基本配置中要修改的值。
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> has a specific handling of widgets being marked as <c1>View.GONE</c1>.
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> 对被标记为 <c1>View.GONE</c1> 的小部件有特别的处理。
<c0>Context</c0>: This value must never be <c1>null</c1>.
<c0>Context</c0>：此值绝不能为 <c1>null</c1>。
<c0>DEBUG</c0>: Use to further note what is happening on the device that could be relevant to investigate and debug unexpected behaviors.
<c0>DEBUG</c0>：用于进一步记录设备上发生的可能与调查和调试意外行为相关的情况。

<c0>ERROR</c0>: Use when something fatal has happened, i.e. something will have user-visible consequences and won't be recoverable without explicitly deleting some data, uninstalling applications, wiping the data partitions or reflashing the entire device (or worse).
<c0>ERROR</c0>：在出现极其严重的情况时使用。例如，某些事件会导致用户可见的后果，如果不明确删除某些数据、卸载应用、清除数据分区或重写整个设备(或更糟)，则无法恢复。
<c0>GONE</c0> widgets, as usual, are not going to be displayed and are not part of the layout itself (i.e. their actual dimensions will not be changed if marked as <c1>GONE</c1>).
通常，<c0>GONE</c0> 小部件不会被显示，并且不是布局本身的一部分(即如果标记为 <c1>GONE</c1> 则其实际尺寸将不会改变)。
<c0>INFORMATIVE:</c0> Use to note that something interesting to most people happened, i.e. when a situation is detected that is likely to have widespread impact, though isn't necessarily an error.
<c0>INFORMATIVE:</c0> ：用于记录大多数人感兴趣的信息。例如，当检测到某种情况会造成广泛的影响时，尽管不一定是错误，系统也会记录下来。
<c0>ImageDecoder.DecodeException</c0>: exception containing information about the decode interruption.
<c0>ImageDecoder.DecodeException</c0>：包含有关解码中断的信息的异常。
<c0>ImageDecoder.ImageInfo</c0>: information about the encoded image.
<c0>ImageDecoder.ImageInfo</c0>：有关编码图像的信息。
<c0>ImageDecoder.OnHeaderDecodedListener</c0>: for learning the <c1><a2>ImageInfo</a2></c1> and changing any default settings on the <c3>ImageDecoder</c3>.
<c0>ImageDecoder.OnHeaderDecodedListener</c0>：用于了解 <c1><a2>ImageInfo</a2></c1> 并更改 <c3>ImageDecoder</c3> 上的任何默认设置。
<c0>ImageDecoder.Source</c0>: object that created <c1>decoder</c1>.
<c0>ImageDecoder.Source</c0>：创建 <c1>decoder</c1> 的对象。
<c0>ImageDecoder.Source</c0>: representing the encoded image.
<c0>ImageDecoder.Source</c0>：表示编码图像。
<c0>ImageDecoder</c0>: the object performing the decode, for changing its default settings.
<c0>ImageDecoder</c0>：执行解码的对象，用于更改其默认设置。

<c0>LinedEditText</c0> is defined as an inner class within the <c1>NoteEditor</c1> activity, but it is public so that it could be accessed as <c2>NoteEditor.LinedEditText</c2> from outside of the <c3>NoteEditor</c3> class if desired.
<c0>LinedEditText</c0> 被定义为 <c1>NoteEditor</c1> activity 中的内部类，但它是公共的，因此如果需要，可以使用 <c3>NoteEditor</c3> 类从外部访问 <c2>NoteEditor.LinedEditText</c2> 。
<c0>META-INF/</c0>: Contains the <c1>CERT.SF</c1> and <c2>CERT.RSA</c2> signature files, as well as the <c3>MANIFEST.MF</c3> manifest file.
<c0>META-INF/</c0>：包含 <c1>CERT.SF</c1> 和 <c2>CERT.RSA</c2> 签名文件，以及 <c3>MANIFEST.MF</c3> 清单文件。

<c0>MaterialToolbar</c0> 是 <c1><a2>Toolbar</a2></c1>，它实现了某些材质功能，例如黑暗主题的高程叠加。

<c0>Matrix</c0>: 如果不为空，则将其设置为 shader 的局部矩阵。

<c0>Matrix</c0>: shader 的新本地矩阵，或者 null 来指定同一性

<c0>MotionEvent</c0>：在层次结构中分发的动作事件。

<c0>MotionEvent</c0>：动作事件。
<c0>OutputStream</c0>: The outputstream to write the compressed data.
<c0>OutputStream</c0>：写入压缩数据的输出流。

<c0>RecyclerView.State</c0>: RecyclerView 的当前状态。
<c0>RecyclerView.State</c0>: The current state of RecyclerView.
<c0>RecyclerView.State</c0>: RecyclerView 当前的状态。

<c0>RecyclerView</c0> 将尝试为适配器合成可见的结构更改事件，当这些适配器在使用此方法时报告具有 <a1>#hasStableIds() stable IDs</a1>。

<c0>Shader</c0>: 来自该着色器的颜色被模式视为 "dst"

<c0>String</c0>：要解码的文件的完整路径名称。

<c0>VERBOSE</c0> ：用于记录其他所有信息。

<c0>WARNING</c0>: Use when something serious and unexpected happened, i.e. something that will have user-visible consequences but is likely to be recoverable without data loss by performing some explicit action, ranging from waiting or restarting an app all the way to re-downloading a new version of an application or rebooting the device.
<c0>WARNING</c0>：在出现比较严重和意外的情况时使用。例如，某些事件会导致用户可见的后果，但是通过执行某些明确的操作（从等待或重启应用，一直到重新下载新版应用或重新启动设备）可在不丢失数据的情况下恢复。

<c0>Xfermode</c0>: 组合来自两个着色器的颜色的模式。

<c0>boolean</c0>：如果为 true，则执行 <c1><a2>fitSystemWindows(Rect)</a2></c1> 的默认实现。

<c0>boolean</c0>：是否动画到新状态

带有圆角背景和阴影的 FrameLayout。

Horizo​​ntalScrollView 是 <c0><a1>FrameLayout</a1></c0>，这意味着你应该在其中放置一个包含要滚动的全部内容的子项；这个子本身可能是一个具有复杂对象层次结构的布局管理器。
A Layout that arranges its children in a single column or a single row.
将其子项排列在单个列或单个行中的布局。
A Layout where the positions of the children can be described in relation to each other or to the parent.
一种布局，其中子元素的位置可以描述为彼此或父元素的相对位置。
A LayoutManager that lays out children in a staggered grid formation.
该 LayoutManager 可以以交错网格的形式布置子 view。

监听接口，可以附加给 RecylcerView，以在 ViewHolder 添加给 RecyclerView 或移除时获得通知。
A MeasureSpec can be in one of three modes:
MeasureSpec 可以为下 3 种模式之一：
A MeasureSpec encapsulates the layout requirements passed from parent to child.
MeasureSpec 封装了从父级传递给子级的布局要求。
A MultiChoiceModeListener receives events for <c0><a1>AbsListView#CHOICE_MODE_MULTIPLE_MODAL</a1></c0>.
MultiChoiceModeListener 接收 <c0><a1>AbsListView#CHOICE_MODE_MULTIPLE_MODAL</a1></c0> 的事件。
A NestedScrollingParent returning something other than <c0><a1>SCROLL_AXIS_NONE</a1></c0> is currently acting as a nested scrolling parent for one or more descendant views in the hierarchy.
如果 NestedScrollingParent 返回 <c0><a1>SCROLL_AXIS_NONE</a1></c0> 以外的值，表示其当前充当层次结构中一个或多个后代 view 的嵌套滚动父级。
A NinePatch drawable is a standard PNG image that includes an extra 1-pixel-wide border.
NinePatch drawable 是包含 1 像素宽度的边框的标准 PNG 图片。
A PageTransformer is invoked whenever a visible/attached page is scrolled.
PageTransformer 会在一个 visible/attached 的页面滚动时调用。
A RatingBar is an extension of SeekBar and ProgressBar that shows a rating in stars.
RatingBar 是 SeekBar 和 ProgressBar 的扩展，显示星级评分。
A Recycler is responsible for managing scrapped or detached item views for reuse.
Recycler 负责管理 scrapped（报废、销毁）或 detached（分离）的 item views 时以用于复用。
A RecyclerListener can be set on a RecyclerView to receive messages whenever a view is recycled.
RecyclerListener 可以设置给 RecyclerView，当 view 被复用时可以收到消息。
A RecyclerListener is used to receive a notification whenever a View is placed inside the RecycleBin's scrap heap.
每当 View 放置在 RecycleBin 的废料堆内时，RecyclerListener 用于接收通知。
A SeekBar is an extension of ProgressBar that adds a draggable thumb.
SeekBar 是 ProgressBar 的扩展，它添加了一个可拖动的 thumb。
A Spec defines the horizontal or vertical characteristics of a group of cells.
Spec 定义了一组单元格的水平或垂直特征。
A Switch is a two-state toggle switch widget that can select between two options.
Switch 是一个双状态切换开关小部件，可以在两个选项之间进行选择。
A TableLayout consists of a number of <c0><a1>TableRow</a1></c0> objects, each defining a row (actually, you can have other children, which will be explained below).
TableLayout 由许多 <c0><a1>TableRow</a1></c0> 对象组成，每个对象定义一行(实际上，你可以有其他子对象，下面将对此进行说明)。
A TableRow should always be used as a child of a <c0><a1>TableLayout</a1></c0>.
TableRow 应始终用作 <c0><a1>TableLayout</a1></c0> 的子级。
A TextSwitcher is useful to animate a label on screen.
TextSwitcher 可用于为屏幕上的标签设置动画。
A TextureView can be used to display a content stream.
TextureView 可用于显示内容流。
A TextureView's SurfaceTexture can be obtained either by invoking <c0><a1>getSurfaceTexture()</a1></c0> or by using a <c2><a3>SurfaceTextureListener</a3></c2>.
可以通过调用 <c0><a1>getSurfaceTexture()</a1></c0> 或使用 <c2><a3>SurfaceTextureListener</a3></c2> 来获取 TextureView 的 SurfaceTexture。
A Toolbar is a generalization of <c0><a1>action bars</a1></c0> for use within application layouts.
工具栏是 <c0><a1>action bars</a1></c0> 的泛化，可在应用程序布局中使用。
A URI path segment.
一个 URI 路径段。
A View occupies a rectangular area on the screen and is responsible for drawing and event handling.
一个 View 占据了屏幕上的一块矩形区域，并负责绘制和事件处理。
A View that displays web pages.
显示网页的 view。
A View that is bound to the given position or NULL if there is no View to re-use
绑定到给定位置的 view，如果没有可重用的 view，则为 NULL
A ViewHolder describes an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.
ViewHolder 描述了在 RecyclerView 中的一个 item view 以及它所在位置的元数据。
A ViewStub is an invisible, zero-sized View that can be used to lazily inflate layout resources at runtime.
ViewStub 是一个不可见的零大小的 View，可用于在运行时延迟加载布局资源。
A ViewSwitcher can only have two child views, of which only one is shown at a time.
ViewSwitcher 只能有两个子 view，其中一次只显示一个。
A WebView is useful when you need increased control over the UI and advanced configuration options that will allow you to embed web pages in a specially-designed environment for your app.
当你需要增加对 UI 和高级配置选项的控制时，WebView 非常有用，这些选项允许你在专门设计的应用环境中嵌入网页。
A bitmap configuration describes how pixels are stored.
描述像素如何存储的位图配置。
A boolean value defined in XML.
以 XML 定义的布尔值。
A button with two states, checked and unchecked.
具有两种状态的按钮，已选中和未选中。
A callback interface that can be used to alter the drawing order of RecyclerView children.
改变 RecyclerView 子控件的绘制顺序的回调接口。
A callback that notifies clients when the progress level has been changed.
在进度级别更改时通知客户端的回调。
A callback that notifies clients when the rating has been changed.
在评级已更改时通知客户端的回调。
A callback that notifies when the chronometer has incremented on its own.
一个回调，通知计时器何时自行递增。
A chain allows you to distribute a group of views horizontally or vertically with the following styles (as shown in figure 14):
链允许你使用以下样式水平或垂直分发一组 view(如图 14 所示)：
A chain is a group of views that are linked to each other with bi-directional position constraints.
链是用双向位置约束彼此链接的一组 view。
A chain works properly only if each end of the chain is constrained to another object on the same axis, as shown in figure 13.
只有链的每一端都被约束到同一轴上的另一个对象，链才能正常工作，如图 13 所示。
A checkbox is a specific type of two-states button that can be either checked or unchecked.
复选框是特定类型的双状态按钮，可以选中也可以取消选中。
A child that is often used is a <c2><a3>LinearLayout</a3></c2> in a horizontal orientation, presenting a horizontal array of top-level items that the user can scroll through.
经常使用的子项是水平方向的 <c2><a3>LinearLayout</a3></c2>，呈现用户可以滚动的顶级项目的水平数组。
A child view that has entered into a temporarily detached state during layout.
在布局过程中，一个进入暂时分离状态的子 view。
A child view that must be rebound by the adapter before being displayed.
一个子 view，它在显示之前必须由 adapter 重新绑定。
A class for converting encoded images (like <c0>PNG</c0>, <c1>JPEG</c1>, <c2>WEBP</c2>, <c3>GIF</c3>, or <c4>HEIF</c4>) into <c5><a6>Drawable</a6></c5> or <c7><a8>Bitmap</a8></c7> objects.
用于将编码图像(如 <c0>PNG</c0>，<c1>JPEG</c1>，<c2>WEBP</c2>，<c3>GIF</c3> 或 <c4>HEIF</c4>) 转为 <c5><a6>Drawable</a6></c5> 或 <c7><a8>Bitmap</a8></c7> 对象的类。
A class that creates a Material Themed CheckBox.
创建材质主题复选框的类。
A class that creates a Material Themed RadioButton.
创建以材质为主题的单选按钮的类。
A class that creates a Material Themed Switch.
创建材质主题的开关类。
A class that represents a fixed view in a list, for example a header at the top or a footer at the bottom.
表示列表中固定 view 的类，例如顶部的 header 或底部的 footer。
A cold start refers to an app’s starting from scratch: the system’s process has not, until this start, created the app’s process.
冷启动是指应用程序从头开始：系统的进程在此开始之前没有创建应用程序的进程。
A color to apply to the subtitle string.
应用于副标题字符串的颜色。
A color to apply to the title string.
要应用于标题字符串的颜色。
A color value defined in XML.
在 XML 中定义的颜色值。
A common container for a set of related, toggleable <c0><a1>MaterialButton</a1></c0>s.
一组相关的可切换 <c0><a1>MaterialButton</a1></c0> 的公共容器。

一个常见的例子是在电子书阅读器中，点击屏幕会带回用户沉浸在阅读书籍时隐藏的任​​何屏幕和 UI 装饰。

实现主题启动屏幕的常用方法是使用 <c0><a1>windowDisablePreview</a1></c0> 主题属性来关闭启动应用程序时系统进程绘制的初始空白屏幕。
A compiled representation of a regular expression.
正则表达式的编译表示。
A content URI allows you to grant read and write access using temporary access permissions.
content URI 允许你使用临时访问权限授予读写访问权限。
A content description string to describe the appearance of the associated logo image.
用于描述相关徽标图像外观的内容描述字符串。
A convenience class for creating a new Material button.
用于创建新“材质”按钮的便捷类。
A dialog appears, asking if you would like to convert the image to PNG, deleting the original WebP file, or keep the original WebP file as well as the new PNG file.
将出现一个对话框，询问你是要将图像转换为 PNG，删除原始 WebP 文件，还是保留原始 WebP 文件以及新的 PNG 文件。
A dimension is specified with a number followed by a unit of measure.
尺寸由数字后跟度量单位来指定。
A dimension value defined in XML.
XML 中定义的尺寸值。
A dimension, represented by a float, followed by a unit of measurement (dp, sp, pt, px, mm, in), as described above.
如上所述，由浮点表示的尺寸，接着是测量单位(dp，sp，pt，px，mm，in)。
A disabled view that is clickable still consumes the touch events, it just doesn't respond to them.
可点击的禁用 view 仍然会消耗触摸事件，只是没有响应。
A drawable to use as the background.
一个 drawable 用作背景。

activity 中复选框的示例用法如下：

有关这种规格需要的限制的完整参考，可以在 <c3><a4>View.onMeasure(int, int)</a4></c3> 的参考文档中找到（这个参考也很好的解释了整个测量的操作）。
A full-bleed scrim which is show or hidden when the scroll position has hit a certain threshold.
当滚动位置达到某个阈值时显示或隐藏的 full-bleed scrim。
A good example of this is the <e0>fling</e0> gesture, where the user quickly moves a finger across the screen and then lifts it.
一个很好的例子是 <e0>fling</e0> 手势，用户可以快速地在屏幕上移动手指，然后将其抬起。
A good rule to follow is to always expose any property that affects the visible appearance or behavior of your custom view.
要遵循的一个好规则是始终公开任何影响自定义 view 的可见外观或行为的属性。
A good way to look for bottlenecks is to use the Android Studio CPU Profiler.
寻找瓶颈的好方法是使用 Android Studio CPU Profiler。
A grid with <c2>N</c2> columns has <c3>N + 1</c3> grid indices that run from <c4>0</c4> through <c5>N</c5> inclusive.
具有 <c2>N</c2> 列的网格具有 <c3>N + 1</c3> 个网格索引，其从 <c4>0</c4> 到 <c5>N</c5>(包括端点)。
A helper class to provide the number of spans each item occupies.
一个助手类，它可以提供每个 item 占据的 span 数量。
A hot start displays the same on-screen behavior as a cold start scenario: The system process displays a blank screen until the app has finished rendering the activity.
热启动与冷启动方案有相同的屏幕显示行为：系统进程显示空白屏幕，直到应用程序完成渲染 activity。
A hot start of your application is much simpler and lower-overhead than a cold start.
应用程序的热启动比冷启动更简单，开销更低。
A layout that arranges its children horizontally.
一种水平排列其子项的布局。
A layout that arranges its children into rows and columns.
将子项排列为行和列的布局。
A layout that arranges other views either horizontally in a single column or vertically in a single row.
一种布局，可以在单列中水平排列其他 view，也可以在单行中垂直排列其他 view。
A layout that lets you specify exact locations (x/y coordinates) of its children.
一种布局，可让你指定其子项的精确位置(x/y 坐标)。
A layout that places its children in a rectangular <e0>
布局，将其子级放置在矩形 <e0>
A layout that places its children in a rectangular <e0>grid</e0>.
将子项放在矩形 <e0>grid (网格)</e0> 中的布局。
A left (or first) pane is treated as a content list or browser, subordinate to a primary detail view for displaying content.
左(或第一)窗格被视为内容列表或浏览器，从属于用于显示内容的主要详细 view。
A list does not have a spatial definition here.
列表在此处没有空间定义。
A list view is an <a0> adapter view</a0> that does not know the details, such as type and contents, of the views it contains.
列表 view 是 <a0> adapter view</a0>，它不知道它包含的 view 的详细信息，例如类型和内容。

A loss of network connectivity that has consequences within an app should be logged at the DEBUG or VERBOSE level (depending on whether the consequences are serious enough and unexpected enough to be logged in a release build).
如果失去网络连接后导致在应用内出现某种后果，则应该记录为 DEBUG 或 VERBOSE 级别(具体取决于后果是否足够严重以及足够意外，足以记录在发布版本中)。
A lot of physics and math are required to get a flywheel model working correctly.
需要大量的物理和数学才能使飞轮模型正常工作。
A matcher finds matches in a subset of its input called the <i0>region</i0>.
匹配器在其输入的子集（称为 <i0>region</i0> ）中查找匹配项。
A matcher is created from a pattern by invoking the pattern's <c0><a1>matcher</a1></c0> method.
通过调用 pattern 的 <c0><a1>matcher</a1></c0> 方法从 pattern 创建匹配器。
A matcher may be reset explicitly by invoking its <c0><a1>reset()</a1></c0> method or, if a new input sequence is desired, its <c2><a3>reset(CharSequence)</a3></c2> method.
可以通过调用匹配器的 <c0><a1>reset()</a1></c0> 方法来显式重置匹配器，如果需要新输入序列，则调用其 <c2><a3>reset(CharSequence)</a3></c2> 方法。
A more sophisticated component may override even more <c0>on...</c0> methods and introduce some of its own helper methods, substantially customizing its properties and behavior.
一个更复杂的组件可以重写更多的 <c0>on...</c0> 方法，并引入一些自己的助手方法，充分地自定义自己的属性和行为。
A name for the dimension.
尺寸的名称。
A new ViewHolder that holds a View of the given view type.
持有给定 view 类型的 View 的新 ViewHolder。
A non-null list of merged payloads.
合并的有效载荷的非空列表。
A notifyItemRangeChanged() with null payload will clear all existing payloads on that item and prevent future payload until <a1>#onBindViewHolder(ViewHolder, int, List)</a1> is called.
一个空有效载荷的 notifyItemRangeChanged() 将清除该项上所有现有的有效载荷，并防止未来的有效载荷，直到调用 <a1>#onBindViewHolder(ViewHolder, int, List)</a1> 。
A parent view may call measure() more than once on its children.
一个父 view 可能在子 view 上多次调用 measure() 方法。

A partial list of available widgets includes <c0><a1>Button</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>TextView</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>EditText</a5></c4>, <c6><a7>ListView</a7></c6>, <c8><a9>CheckBox</a9></c8>, <c10><a11>RadioButton</a11></c10>, <c12><a13>Gallery</a13></c12>, <c14><a15>Spinner</a15></c14>, and the more special-purpose <c16><a17>AutoCompleteTextView</a17></c16>, <c18><a19>ImageSwitcher</a19></c18>, and <c20><a21>TextSwitcher</a21></c20>.

部分可用的控件列表包括 <c0><a1>Button</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>TextView</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>EditText</a5></c4>, <c6><a7>ListView</a7></c6>, <c8><a9>CheckBox</a9></c8>, <c10><a11>RadioButton</a11></c10>, <c12><a13>Gallery</a13></c12>, <c14><a15>Spinner</a15></c14>，以及更多特殊目的的控件如 <c16><a17>AutoCompleteTextView</a17></c16>, <c18><a19>ImageSwitcher</a19></c18>,<c20><a21>TextSwitcher</a21></c20> 等。
A primary toolbar within the activity that may display the activity title, application-level navigation affordances, and other interactive items.
activity 中的主工具栏，可显示 activity 标题，应用程序级导航功能和其他交互项。
A radio button is a two-states button that can be either checked or unchecked.
单选按钮是一个双状态按钮，可以选中或取消选中。
A scrim may be used to indicate that the other elements beneath it are not currently interactive or actionable, drawing user focus and attention to the views above the scrim.
可以使用稀松布来指示其下面的其他元素当前不是交互式的或可操作的，从而将用户焦点和注意力吸引到稀松布上方的 view。
A scrim which is shown or hidden behind the status bar when the scroll position has hit a certain threshold.
当滚动位置达到某个阈值时，在状态栏后面显示或隐藏的 scrim。

A short distance may cause much more perspective distortion upon rotation, and can also result in some drawing artifacts if the rotated view ends up partially behind the camera (which is why the recommendation is to use a distance at least as far as the size of the view, if the view is to be rotated.)
短距离可能会在旋转时造成更多的透视畸变，并且如果旋转的 view 最终有一部分地在相机后面，也可能导致一些绘制瑕疵（这就是为什么在旋转 view 时，建议使用至少为 view 的尺寸作为相机距离。）
A single enum can add about 1.0 to 1.4 KB of size to your app's <c0>classes.dex</c0> file.
单个枚举可以为应用程序的 <c0>classes.dex</c0> 文件添加大约 1.0 到 1.4 KB 的大小。
A small exception to this rule is when the view does not have an animator reference but transient state is true (due to animations created outside ItemAnimator).
此规则的一个小例外是，view 没有 animator 引用，但 transient 状态为 true (由于在 ItemAnimator 外部创建的动画)。
A special sub-class of <c0><a1>EditText</a1></c0> designed for use as a child of <c2><a3>TextInputLayout</a3></c2>.
一个特殊的 <c0><a1>EditText</a1></c0> 子类，设计用作 <c2><a3>TextInputLayout</a3></c2> 的子元素。
A special widget composed of two children views: the handle, that the users drags, and the content, attached to the handle and dragged with it.
一个由两个子 view 组成的特殊小部件：用户拖动的句柄，以及附加到句柄并随之拖动的内容。
A standard toolbar for use within application content.
用于应用程序内容的标准工具栏。
A string resource containing the full class name is available.
可以使用包含完整类名的字符串资源。
A subclass of <c1><a2>RecyclerView.Adapter</a2></c1> responsible for providing views that represent items in a data set.
<c1><a2>RecyclerView.Adapter</a2></c1> 的子类，负责提供 view 用以展示数据集中的数据项。
A subclass of ConstraintLayout for building animations.
用于构建动画的 ConstraintLayout 的子类。
A subclass of Shader is installed in a Paint calling paint.setShader(shader).
Shader 的子类在调用 paint.setShader(shader) 时被安装到 Paint 中。
A subclass of Shader that draws a sweep gradient around a center point.
Shader 的一个子类，它围绕中心点绘制一个渐变扫区。
A subclass of shader that returns the composition of two other shaders, combined by an <c0><a1>Xfermode</a1></c0> subclass.
组合着色器，着色器的一个子类，它返回两个其他着色器的组合，由 <c0><a1>Xfermode</a1></c0> 的子类组合。
A subclass overrides the <c0>finalize</c0> method to dispose of system resources or to perform other cleanup.
子类会覆盖 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法来处理系统资源或执行其他清理。
A tab has a tab indicator, content, and a tag that is used to keep track of it.
选项卡具有选项卡指示符，内容和用于跟踪它的标记。
A tab in this layout.
此布局中的选项卡。
A table can leave cells empty.
表格可以将单元格留空。
A task (from the activity that started it to the next task activity) defines an atomic group of activities that the user can move to.
任务(从启动它的 activity 到下一个任务 activity)定义了用户可以移动到的 activity 的原子组。
A title which is larger when the layout is fully visible but collapses and becomes smaller as the layout is scrolled off screen.
标题在布局完全可见时较大，但随着布局在屏幕上滚动会折叠并变小。
A transparent overlay for gesture input that can be placed on top of other widgets or contain other widgets.
用于手势输入的透明覆盖，可以放置在其他小部件之上或包含其他小部件。
A unique resource ID defined in XML.
XML 中定义的唯一资源 ID。
A useful aspect of <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> is in how it deals with "impossible" constrains.
<c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> 一个有用的方面是如何处理 "不可能" 的约束。
A user interface element for entering and modifying text.
用于输入和修改文本的用户界面元素。
A user interface element that displays text to the user.
用户界面元素，向用户显示文本。
A user interface element that indicates the progress of an operation.
用于指示操作进度的用户界面元素。
A user interface element the user can tap or click to perform an action.
用户可以点击或单击以执行操作的用户界面元素。
A value of <c2>0.0</c2> indicates no movement at all, <c3>1.0f</c3> indicates normal scroll movement.
值 <c2>0.0</c2> 表示根本没有移动，<c3>1.0f</c3> 表示正常滚动的移动。
A view actually possess two pairs of width and height values.
一个 view 实际上控制两对宽高值。
A view can be a part of both a horizontal and a vertical chain, making it easy to build flexible grid layouts.
view 可以是水平和垂直链的一部分，使得构建灵活的网格布局变得容易。
A view containing controls for a MediaPlayer.
包含 MediaPlayer 控件的 view。
A view group that allows the view hierarchy placed within it to be scrolled.
一个 view group，允许滚动放置在其中的 view 层次结构。
A view group with two children, intended for use in ListViews.
一个包含两个子节点的 view 组，用于 ListView。
A view has a location, expressed as a pair of <e0>left</e0> and <e1>top</e1> coordinates, and two dimensions, expressed as a width and a height.
view 有一个位置，表示为一对 <e0>left</e0> 和 <e1>top</e1> 坐标，以及两个尺寸，表示为宽和高。
A view is recycled when a <a0>LayoutManager</a0> decides that it no longer needs to be attached to its parent <a1>RecyclerView</a1>.
当 <a0>LayoutManager</a0> 决定不再需要将 view 附加到其父级 <a1>RecyclerView</a1> 时，view 将被回收。
A view must be fully detached (removed from parent) before it may be recycled.
view 必须完全分离(从父 view 中移除)，然后才能回收。
A view previously used to display data for a specific adapter position may be placed in a cache for later reuse to display the same type of data again later.
一个 view 之前用于显示 adapter 中某个位置的数据，它可能会被放到缓存中，以便于之后再次使用用于显示相同类型的数据。
A view that displays one child at a time and lets the user pick among them.
一次显示一个子项并让用户在其中进行选择的 view。
A view that renders a virtual <c0><a1>Keyboard</a1></c0>.
呈现虚拟 <c0><a1>Keyboard</a1></c0> 的 view。
A view that shows items in a center-locked, horizontally scrolling list.
一个 view，显示中心锁定的水平滚动列表中的项目。
A view that shows items in a vertically scrolling two-level list.
一个 view，显示垂直滚动的两级列表中的项目。
A view that shows items in two-dimensional scrolling grid.
在二维滚动网格中显示项目的 view。
A view's measured width and measured height values must respect the constraints imposed by the view's parents.
view 的测量宽度和测量高度值必须遵守 view 父项施加的约束。
A warm start encompasses some subset of the operations that take place during a cold start; at the same time, it represents less overhead than a hot start.
温启动包括冷启动期间发生的一些操作子集;同时，它表示比热启动更少的开销。
A well-designed custom view is much like any other well-designed class.
精心设计的自定义 view 与任何其他精心设计的类非常相似。
A widget for selecting the time of day, in either 24-hour or AM/PM mode.
用于在 24 小时或 AM/PM 模式下选择时间的小部件。
A widget that enables the user to select a number from a predefined range.
一个小部件，使用户可以从预定义的范围中选择一个数字。
A widget that provides a user interface for the user to enter a search query and submit a request to a search provider.
一个小部件，为用户提供用户界面以输入搜索查询并向搜索提供程序提交请求。
API Guides
API Guides
API level
API level
API level:
API level:
AT_MOST: This is used by the parent to impose a maximum size on the child.
AT_MOST：用于父 view 强加给子 view 一个最大值。
AbsListView extends LayoutParams to provide a place to hold the view type.
AbsListView 扩展 LayoutParams 以提供保存 view 类型的位置。
AbsSeekBar extends the capabilities of ProgressBar by adding a draggable thumb.
AbsSeekBar 通过添加可拖动的 thumb 来扩展 ProgressBar 的功能。
Absolute layouts are less flexible and harder to maintain than other types of layouts without absolute positioning.
与没有绝对定位的其他类型的布局相比，绝对布局不够灵活且难以维护。
Acceptable alternatives (in order of preference) are:
可接受的替代方案(按优先顺序排列)包括：
Accepts a user-provided Renderer object that does the actual rendering.
接受用户提供的 Renderer 对象，该对象执行实际渲染。
Accepts the following URI schemes:
接受以下 URI 方案：
Access to the underlying surface is provided via the SurfaceHolder interface, which can be retrieved by calling <c0><a1>getHolder()</a1></c0>.
通过 SurfaceHolder 接口提供对底层 surface 的访问，可以通过调用 <c0><a1>getHolder()</a1></c0> 来获取。
Action bar navigation modes are deprecated and not supported by inline toolbar action bars.
不建议使用操作栏导航模式，内联工具栏操作栏不支持。
Action buttons are vertically aligned within the Toolbar's <c4><a5>minimum height</a5></c4>, if set.
如果设置，操作按钮在工具栏的 <c4><a5>minimum height</a5></c4> 内垂直对齐。
Action buttons are vertically aligned within the Toolbar's minimum height, if set.
如果设置，操作按钮在工具栏的最小高度内垂直对齐。
ActionMenuView is a presentation of a series of menu options as a View.
actionMenuView 是一系列菜单选项的 view 表示。

Activities that use this feature should use one of the supplied <c0>.NoActionBar</c0> themes, set the <c1><a2>windowActionBar</a2></c1> attribute to <c3>false</c3> or otherwise not request the window feature.
使用此功能的 activity 应使用提供的 <c0>.NoActionBar</c0> 主题之一，将 <c1><a2>windowActionBar</a2></c1> 属性设置为 <c3>false</c3> 或不请求窗口功能。
Activity creation
Activity 创建
Activity creation often entails a lot of high-overhead work.
创建 activity 通常需要大量高额开销。
Adapter position to query

Adapter should not assume that the payload passed in notify methods will be received by onBindViewHolder().

After the <c0>finalize</c0> method has been invoked for an object, no further action is taken until the Java virtual machine has again determined that there is no longer any means by which this object can be accessed by any thread that has not yet died, including possible actions by other objects or classes which are ready to be finalized, at which point the object may be discarded.
在为对象调用 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法后，不会采取进一步的操作，直到 Java 虚拟机再次确定这个对象不再被任何尚未死亡的线程访问，除非是由于某个其他准备 finalize 的对象或类的准备而产生的动作的结果，此时物体可能会被丢弃。

应用程序进程创建 activity 后，activity 将执行以下操作：

然后，整个 view 树的绘制命令向屏幕发出，裁去被破坏的区域。
Afterwards, the app spawns the main thread, also known as the UI thread, and tasks it with creating your main activity.
之后，应用程序会生成主线程（也称为 UI 线程），并通过创建主 activity 来执行任务。
Afterwards, you need to update the <c2><a3>Scroller</a3></c2> by calling <c4><a5>Scroller.computeScrollOffset()</a5></c4> at regular intervals.
之后，你需要定期调用 <c4><a5>Scroller.computeScrollOffset()</a5></c4> 来更新 <c2><a3>Scroller</a3></c2>。

<c0><a1>delete(int)</a1></c0> 的别名。

将 view 的边缘与另一个 view 的相同边缘对齐。
Align the text baseline of a view to the text baseline of another view.
将 view 的文本基线与另一个 view 的文本基线对齐。

与段落末尾对齐，例如。

对齐 view 的末尾，如果 view 的已解析 layoutDirection 为 LTR，则为 ALIGN_RIGHT，否则为 ALIGN_LEFT。

All ItemDecorations are drawn in the order they were added, before the item views (in <c0><a1>onDraw()</a1></c0> and after the items (in <c2><a3>onDrawOver(Canvas, RecyclerView, RecyclerView.State)</a3></c2>.
所有的 ItemDecorations 按它们加入的顺序被绘制，在 item views 之前(在 <c0><a1>onDraw()</a1></c0> 中且在 items 之后 (在 <c2><a3>onDrawOver(Canvas, RecyclerView, RecyclerView.State)</a3></c2> 中。

将从运行 SurfaceView 窗口的线程(通常是应用程序的主线程)调用所有 SurfaceView 和 <c0><a1>SurfaceHolder.Callback</a1></c0> 方法。

所有这些工具都可以减少 PNG 文件的大小，同时保持感知的图像质量。

允许应用加载并显示你的视图，然后更新依赖于位图和其他资源的可视属性。

并且，它不会移除资源;它只会提醒你他们的存在。

此外，它强迫用户在 activity 启动时没有反馈地等待，使他们怀疑应用程序是否正常工作。

另外，请记住 ID 资源不引用实际资源项;它只是一个唯一的 ID，你可以将其附加到其他资源或作为应用程序中的唯一整数使用。
Alternatively, If you want CardView to add inner padding on platforms Lollipop and after as well, you can call <c0><a1>setUseCompatPadding(boolean)</a1></c0> and pass <c2>true</c2>.

Although Android supports all these densities, you don't need to export your rasterized assets to each density.
虽然 Android 支持所有这些密度，但你无需将 rasterized 资源导出到每个密度。
Although a missing constraint won't cause a compilation error, the Layout Editor indicates missing constraints as an error in the toolbar.
尽管缺少了约束也不会造成编译错误，布局编辑器将会在工具栏上显示有一个缺少约束的错误。
Although cells do not normally overlap in a GridLayout, GridLayout does not prevent children being defined to occupy the same cell or group of cells.

Although it's not strictly necessary to follow this convention, many popular code editors depend on this naming convention to provide statement completion.
尽管遵循此约定并非绝对必要，但许多流行的代码编辑器依赖于此命名约定来提供语句补全。
Although it's possible to read values from the <c2><a3>AttributeSet</a3></c2> directly, doing so has some disadvantages:
虽然可以直接从 <c2><a3>AttributeSet</a3></c2> 中读取值，但这样做有一些缺点：

虽然 UI 可能占用相同的空间，但 <c2><a3>ActionMode</a3></c2> API 与 <c4><a5>ActionBar</a5></c4> 的 API 不同且独立。
Although the orientation of a chain is either vertical or horizontal, using one does not align the views in that direction.
虽然链的取向是垂直或水平的，无论使用哪一个一个方向都不会使该方向上的视图对齐。
Although the typical child of a TableLayout is a TableRow, you can actually use any View subclass as a direct child of TableLayout.
虽然 TableLayout 的典型子项是 TableRow，但实际上可以使用任何 View 子类作为 TableLayout 的直接子项。

Although these properties can be changed with <c12><a13>setMutableRequired(true)</a13></c12> (which is only compatible with <c14><a15>decodeBitmap(Source)</a15></c14> and <c16><a17>decodeBitmap(Source, OnHeaderDecodedListener)</a17></c16>) and <c18><a19>setAllocator(int)</a19></c18>, it is also possible to apply custom effects regardless of the mutability of the final returned object by passing a <c20><a21>PostProcessor</a21></c20> to <c22><a23>setPostProcessor</a23></c22>.

Always allow a user to over-scroll this view, provided it is a view that can scroll.

Any <c0><a1>MaterialButton</a1></c0>s added to this view group are automatically marked as <c2>checkable</c2>, and by default multiple buttons within the same group can be checked.
添加到此 view 组的任何 <c0><a1>MaterialButton</a1></c0> 将自动标记为 <c2>checkable</c2>，默认情况下，可以选中同一组中的多个按钮。
Any change you make to the default margin applies only to the views you add from then on.
你对默认边距所做的任何更改仅适用于你之后添加的 view。
Any child views which are set to dodge the same inset edges by <c2><a3>CoordinatorLayout.LayoutParams.dodgeInsetEdges</a3></c2> will be moved appropriately so that the views do not overlap.
通过 <c2><a3>CoordinatorLayout.LayoutParams.dodgeInsetEdges</a3></c2> 设置为闪避相同内缩边缘的任何子 view 都将被适当移动，以使 view 不重叠。
Any child views which are set to dodge the same inset edges by <c2><a3>dodgeInsetEdges</a3></c2> will be moved appropriately so that the views do not overlap.
通过 <c2><a3>dodgeInsetEdges</a3></c2> 设置为躲避相同插入边缘的任何子 view 都将被适当移动，以使 view 不重叠。
Any content drawn by this method will be drawn after the item views are drawn and will thus appear over the views.
该方法绘制的任何内容将在 item views 绘制之后被绘制，因此将显示在 views 的上层。
Any content drawn by this method will be drawn before the item views are drawn, and will thus appear underneath the views.
该方法绘制的任何内容将在 item views 绘制之前被绘制，因此将显示在 views 的下层。
Any disk I/O, deserialization, or tight loops that might be occurring during the bottleneck.
在瓶颈期间可能发生的任何磁盘 I/O，反序列化或紧密循环。
Any exception thrown by the <c0>finalize</c0> method causes the finalization of this object to be halted, but is otherwise ignored.
由 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法抛出的任何异常都会导致此对象的终止被暂停，但会被忽略。
Any global singleton objects it initializes.
它初始化的任何全局单例对象。
Any global singleton objects your app initializes.
你的应用初始化的任何全局单例对象。
Any logging that is meant to be read by other people and to be available in release builds should be terse without being cryptic, and should be reasonably understandable.
任何供其他人阅读并且在发布版本中提供的日志记录都应当简洁明了、合理易懂。
Any non-negative integer smaller than or equal to the value returned by this method is guaranteed to be a valid group index for this matcher.
任何小于等于由此方法返回的值的非负整数保证是此匹配器的有效组索引。
Any string building will be stripped out of release builds and needs to appear inside the <c2>if (LOCAL_LOGV)</c2> block.
所有字符串编译都将从发布版本中删除，并且需要在 <c2>if (LOCAL_LOGV)</c2> 块中显示。

Any time a user hits a directional key, such as a D-pad direction, the view device will exit touch mode, and find a view to take focus, so that the user may resume interacting with the user interface without touching the screen again.
任何时候用户按下方向键，比如 D-pad 方向，设备将会退出 touch mode，并寻找一个 view 来取得焦点，这样用户可以在不触屏的的情况下继续与用户界面交互。
Any time a view calls <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0>, the Android UI system needs to traverse the entire view hierarchy to find out how big each view needs to be.
每当 view 调用 <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0> 时，Android UI 系统都需要遍历整个 view 层次结构，以找出每个 view 需要的大小。
Any undecoded lines in the image will be blank.

Any value <= 1 is treated the same as 1.
任何值 <= 1 的处理都与 1 相同。

在此 view 设置为闪避的同一边缘上插入的任何 view 将导致移动此 view，以使 view 不重叠。

By default, TextView's layout rendering sets the text padding in LTR on initial rendering and it only renders correctly after the layout has been invalidated so you need to ensure that initial rendering has the correct layout.
默认情况下，TextView 的布局渲染在初始渲染时设置 LTR 中的文本填充，并且只有在布局失效后才能正确渲染，因此你需要确保初始渲染具有正确的布局。
By default, VideoView requests audio focus with <c0><a1>AudioManager#AUDIOFOCUS_GAIN</a1></c0>.
默认情况下，VideoView 使用 <c0><a1>AudioManager#AUDIOFOCUS_GAIN</a1></c0> 请求音频焦点。

By default, Views are created using the theme of the Context object supplied to their constructor; however, a different theme may be specified by using the <c0><a1>android:theme</a1></c0> attribute in layout XML or by passing a <c2><a3>ContextThemeWrapper</a3></c2> to the constructor from code.
默认情况下，view 使用提供给它们的构造函数的 Context 对象的主题来创建，然而，也可以申明不同的主题，在 XML 文件中使用 <c0><a1>android:theme</a1></c0> 属性或在代码中给构造方法传递一个 <c2><a3>ContextThemeWrapper</a3></c2>。

By default, a <c0><a1>Bitmap</a1></c0> created by <c2><a3>ImageDecoder</a3></c2> (including one that is inside a <c4><a5>Drawable</a5></c4>) will be immutable (i.e. <c6><a7>Bitmap.isMutable()</a7></c6> returns <c8>false</c8>), and it will typically have <c9>Config</c9> <c10><a11>Bitmap.Config.HARDWARE</a11></c10>.

默认情况下，由 <c2><a3>ImageDecoder</a3></c2> 创建的 <c0><a1>Bitmap</a1></c0>（包括 <c4><a5>Drawable</a5></c4> 内部的那个）将是不可变的（即 <c6><a7>Bitmap.isMutable()</a7></c6> 返回 <c8>false</c8>），它通常会有 <c9>Config</c9> <c10><a11>Bitmap.Config.HARDWARE</a11></c10>。
By default, a <c0><a1>Bitmap</a1></c0> created by <c2><a3>decodeBitmap</a3></c2> will be immutable i.e. <c4><a5>Bitmap.isMutable()</a5></c4> returns <c6>false</c6>.

默认情况下，ImageButton 看起来像常规 <c0><a1>Button</a1></c0>，标准按钮背景在不同的按钮状态下会更改颜色。

默认的，每一个 item 占据 1 个 span。

默认情况下，chip 在多行上回流。

默认情况下，输出大小将匹配编码图像的大小，可以从 <c2><a3>onHeaderDecoded</a3></c2> 中的 <c0><a1>ImageInfo</a1></c0> 检索编码图像的大小。

默认情况下，当进度值达到 100 时，进度条已满。
By default, the region contains all of the matcher's input.
默认情况下，此区域包含全部的匹配器输入。

By default, the space is evenly distributed between each view that's set to "match constraints," but you can assign a weight of importance to each view using the <c4>layout_constraintHorizontal_weight</c4> and <c5>layout_constraintVertical_weight</c5> attributes.

By doing so, you increase the readability and maintainability of your code and reduce the likelihood of error.
这样做有助于提高代码的可读性和可维护性，并降低出错的可能性。
By returning <c2>true</c2> from this method, the parent indicates that the child should not fling its own internal content as well.
通过从此方法返回 <c2>true</c2>，父级指示子级也不应该 fling 他自己的内部内容。

通过为 CoordinatorLayout 的子 view 指定 <c0><a1>Behaviors</a1></c0>，你可以在单个父级中提供许多不同的交互，并且这些 view 也可以相互交互。

Call this to remove all cached loaded layout resources from the Resources object.

Call this view's OnClickListener, if it is defined.

Called by RecyclerView to display the data at the specified position.

Called by RecyclerView when it stops observing this Adapter.

Called by the garbage collector on an object when garbage collection determines that there are no more references to the object.

Called by zygote when it is done preloading resources, to change back to normal Resources operation.

Called to inform the adapter of which item is currently considered to be the "primary", that is the one show to the user as the current page.

Called to lay out each individual child view unless a <c0><a1>Behavior</a1></c0> is present.

Called when RecyclerView needs a new <a0>ViewHolder</a0> of the given type to represent an item.
当 RecyclerView 需要指定类型的新 <a0>ViewHolder</a0> 来表示项时调用。
Called when a change in the shown pages is going to start being made.
当显示页面的更改将要开始时调用。
Called when a child does not want this parent and its ancestors to intercept touch events with <c0><a1>onInterceptTouchEvent(MotionEvent)</a1></c0>.
当一个子 view 不想它的 parent 及祖先 view 通过 <c0><a1>onInterceptTouchEvent(MotionEvent)</a1></c0> 拦截事件时调用该方法。
Called when a child of the view associated with this behavior wants a particular rectangle to be positioned onto the screen.
当与此行为关联的 view 的子项想要将特定矩形定位到屏幕上时调用。
Called when a child of this group wants a particular rectangle to be positioned onto the screen.

Called when a key up event occurs.

在目标消耗任何滚动距离之前，当正在进行的嵌套滚动即将更新时调用。

Called when a new hardware key event occurs.

Called when a new key event occurs.
当一个新的按键事件发生时调用。
Called when a touch screen motion event occurs.
当发生触摸屏运动事件时调用。
Called when a trackball motion event occurs.
当轨迹球移动事件发生时调用。
Called when a view created by this adapter has been attached to a window.
当此适配器创建的 view 已附加到窗口时调用。
Called when a view created by this adapter has been detached from its window.
当此适配器创建的 view 与其窗口分离时调用。
Called when a view created by this adapter has been recycled.
当此适配器创建的 view 被回收时调用。
Called when a view is set to dodge view insets.
当 view 设置为闪避 view 插入时调用。
Called when an item view is attached to this RecyclerView.
当一个 item view 添加到该 RecyclerView 时调用。
Called when an item view is detached from this RecyclerView.
当一个 item view 从该 RecyclerView 脱离时调用。Called when an item view is detached from this RecyclerView.
Called when the Behavior has been attached to a LayoutParams instance.
将行为附加到 LayoutParams 实例时调用。
Called when the Behavior has been detached from its holding LayoutParams instance.
当行为已从其持有的 LayoutParams 实例中分离时调用。
Called when the a change in the shown pages has been completed.
当所显示的页面的更改已完成时调用。
Called when the hidden state (as returned by <c0><a1>isHidden()</a1></c0> of the fragment has changed.
当 Fragment 的隐藏状态(和 <c0><a1>isHidden()</a1></c0> 返回的一致)改变时调用。
Called when the parent CoordinatorLayout is about the lay out the given child view.
在父级 CoordinatorLayout 将要布局给定子 view 时调用。
Called when the parent CoordinatorLayout is about to measure the given child view.
当父 CoordinatorLayout 即将测量给定的子 view 时调用。
Called when the scroll state of this RecyclerView changes.
当该 RecyclerView 的滚动状态改变时调用。
Called when the size of this view has changed.
当 view 的尺寸发生变化时调用。
Called when the view gains or loses focus.
当 view 获得或失去焦点时调用。
Called when the view is attached to a window.
当 view 附加到窗体上时调用。
Called when the view is detached from its window.
当 view 从窗体上取消附加时调用。
Called when the view should render its content.
当 view 应渲染内容时调用。
Called when the visibility of the window containing the view has changed.
当容纳该 view 的窗体的可见性发生变化时调用。
Called when the window containing the view gains or loses focus.
当容纳该 view 的窗体获得或失去焦点时调用。
Called when the window insets have changed.
窗口插入更改时调用。
Called when this view should assign a size and position to all of its children.
当 view 为其所有子 view 指定大小和位置时调用。
Calling the superclass' <c7><a8>onMeasure(int, int)</a8></c7> is a valid use.
调用父类的 <c7><a8>onMeasure(int, int)</a8></c7> 是一个可用的方法。
Calling this method is mandatory.
调用此方法是必需的。

使用值 <c6>true</c6> 调用此方法将导致 <c7><a8>decodeBitmap(ImageDecoder.Source)</a8></c7> 返回 <c9><a10>Bitmap</a10></c9> 具有未经倍增的像素。

调用它将通知解码器它应该取消它的操作。

Drawable 用于按钮图形(例如，复选框和单选按钮)。
Drawable used for the check mark graphic.
Drawable 用于复选标记图形。
Drawable used for the indeterminate mode.
Drawable 用于不确定模式。
Drawable used for the progress mode.
Drawable 用于进度模式。
Drawable used to draw the divider between tabs.
Drawable 用于在选项卡之间绘制分隔符。
Drawable used to draw the left part of the strip underneath the tabs.
Drawable 用于在标签下方绘制条带的左侧部分。
Drawable used to draw the right part of the strip underneath the tabs.

Drawer positioning and layout is controlled using the <c0>android:layout_gravity</c0> attribute on child views corresponding to which side of the view you want the drawer to emerge from: left or right (or start/end on platform versions that support layout direction.) Note that you can only have one drawer view for each vertical edge of the window.
使用子 view 上的 <c0>android:layout_gravity</c0> 属性控制抽屉定位和布局，该属性对应于你希望抽屉出现的 view 的哪一侧：左侧或右侧（或支持的平台版本上的开始/结束布局方向。）请注意，窗口的每个垂直边缘只能有一个抽屉 view。
DrawerLayout acts as a top-level container for window content that allows for interactive "drawer" views to be pulled out from one or both vertical edges of the window.
DrawerLayout 充当窗口内容的顶级容器，允许从窗口的一个或两个垂直边缘拉出交互式“抽屉”view。
Drawers commonly use <c3>match_parent</c3> for height with a fixed width.
抽屉通常使用 <c3>match_parent</c3> 作为高度并具有固定宽度。
Drawing
绘制
Drawing a UI is only one part of creating a custom view.
绘制 UI 只是创建自定义 view 的一部分。
Drawing is handled by walking the tree and recording the drawing commands of any View that needs to update.
绘制操作，先遍厉一遍 view 树，记录需要更新的 view 的绘制命令。
Draws remaining destination pixels over source pixels.
剩余的目标像素绘制在源像素上。
Draws remaining source pixels over destination pixels.
剩余的源像素绘制在目标像素上。
Draws remaining source pixels.
绘制剩余的源像素。
Draws the thumb on a seekbar.
在 seekbar 上绘制 thumb。
Due to expensive nature of rounded corner clipping, on platforms before Lollipop, CardView does not clip its children that intersect with rounded corners.
由于圆角切割的昂贵性质，在 Lollipop 之前的平台上，CardView 不会剪切与圆角相交的子项。
Dump it from the cache.
从缓存中转储它。
Duration of the indeterminate animation.
不确定动画的持续时间。
Duration, in milliseconds, of the fade out effect after the user is done drawing a gesture.
用户完成绘制手势后的淡出效果的持续时间(以毫秒为单位)。

During layout, GridLayout solves the constraints so as to return the unique solution to those constraints for which all variables are less-than-or-equal-to the corresponding value in any other valid solution.
在布局期间，GridLayout 处理约束，以便将唯一解决方案返回到那些约束，其中所有变量都小于或等于任何其他有效解决方案中的相应值。
During the build process, first <a1>ProGuard</a1> removes unused code but leaves unused resources.
在构建过程中，首先 <a1>ProGuard</a1> 移除未使用的代码但保留未使用的资源。
During this pass each parent is responsible for positioning all of its children using the sizes computed in the measure pass.
在这个过程中，每个父 view 负责它所有的子 view 的定位，它使用测量过程的尺寸结果。
E.g., a blue image by default, an orange one for when focused, and a yellow one for when pressed.
例如，默认为蓝色图像，聚焦时为橙色图像，按下时为黄色图像。
END aligns the result to the right and bottom edges of dst.
END 将结果与 dst 的右边和底边对齐。
EXACTLY: This is used by the parent to impose an exact size on the child.
EXACTLY：用于父 view 强加给子 view 一个确切的尺寸。
Each <c3>View.setHasTransientState(true)</c3> call must be matched by a <c4>View.setHasTransientState(false)</c4> call, otherwise, the state of the View may become inconsistent.
每个 <c3>View.setHasTransientState(true)</c3> 调用都必须与 <c4>View.setHasTransientState(false)</c4> 调用匹配，否则，View 的状态可能会变得不一致。
Each approach allows you to specify how diffs should be computed based on item data.
每种方法都允许你指定应如何根据项目数据计算差异。

Each call to this method returns a new instance of a Context object; Context objects are not shared, however common state (ClassLoader, other Resources for the same configuration) may be so the Context itself can be fairly lightweight.
每次调用此方法都会返回 Context 对象的新实例；上下文对象不是共享的，但是常见的状态(ClassLoader，相同配置的其他资源)可能因此 Context 本身可以相当轻量级。
Each channel (RGB and alpha for translucency) is stored with 8 bits of precision (256 possible values.) This configuration is very flexible and offers the best quality.
每个通道(用于半透明的 RGB 和 alpha)都以 8 位精度(256 个可能值)进行存储。此配置非常灵活，可提供最佳质量。
Each component ranges between 0..255 with 0 meaning no contribution for that component, and 255 meaning 100% contribution.
每个组件的范围在 0..255 之间，0 表示对该组件没有贡献，255 表示 100％贡献。
Each constraint defines the view's position along either the vertical or horizontal axis; so each view must have a minimum of one constraint for each axis, but often more are necessary.
每一个约束都定义了 View 在水平或垂直方向的位置：因此每一个 View 与轴线（垂直和水平方向）都至少应该有一个约束。
Each constraint handle can be used for just one constraint, but you can create multiple constraints (from different views) to the same anchor point.
每个约束句柄只能用于一个约束，但你可以创建多个约束(从不同的 view)到同一个定位点。
Each constraint represents a connection or alignment to another view, the parent layout, or an invisible guideline.
每一个约束表示到另一个 view，父布局，或者不可见的参考线的连接或者对齐。
Each decor view's position can be controlled via its <c2>android:layout_gravity</c2> attribute.
每个装饰 view 的位置都可以通过其 <c2>android:layout_gravity</c2> 属性进行控制。
Each field of <c0>outRect</c0> specifies the number of pixels that the item view should be inset by, similar to padding or margin.
<c0>outRect</c0> 的每一个字段指定了 item view 应该内凹的像素值，类似于 padding 或 margin。
Each line of text in your code should be at most 100 characters long.
你的代码中每一行文本的长度都应该不超过 100 个字符。
Each menu item title, icon and enabled state will be used for displaying bottom navigation bar items.
每个菜单项标题，图标和启用状态将用于显示底部导航栏项。
Each of the margins so defined may be independently overridden by an assignment to the appropriate layout parameter.
如此定义的每个边距可以通过对适当布局参数的赋值独立地覆盖。
Each of these methods returns a boolean indicating success or failure.
每个方法都返回一个表示成功或失败的布尔值。
Each parent up the view hierarchy will be given an opportunity to respond and claim the nested scrolling operation by returning <c2>true</c2>.
view 层次结构中的每个父级都将有机会通过返回 <c2>true</c2> 来响应并声明嵌套滚动操作。
Each pixel is stored as a single translucency (alpha) channel.
每个像素都存储为单个半透明(alpha)通道。

Each pixel is stored on 2 bytes and only the RGB channels are encoded: red is stored with 5 bits of precision (32 possible values), green is stored with 6 bits of precision (64 possible values) and blue is stored with 5 bits of precision.
每个像素存储在 2 个字节上，并且只有 RGB 通道被编码：红色以 5 位精度(32 个可能值)存储，绿色以 6 位精度(64 个可能值)存储，蓝色以 5 位精度。
Each pixel is stored on 2 bytes.
每个像素都存储在 2 个字节中。
Each pixel is stored on 4 bytes.
每个像素存储在 4 个字节中。
Each row has zero or more cells; each cell can hold one <c2><a3>View</a3></c2> object.
每行有零个或多个单元格；每个单元格可以容纳一个 <c2><a3>View</a3></c2> 对象。
Each spec defines the set of rows or columns that are to be occupied; and how children should be aligned within the resulting group of cells.
每个规格定义了要占用的行或列集；以及子项应该如何在最终的单元格组中对齐。
Each variable should be declared in the innermost block that encloses all uses of the variable.
每个变量应该在包含变量所有使用场合的最内层的块中进行声明。
Each view pushes dimension specifications down the tree during the recursion.
在递归期间，每个 view 都会在树中向下推送尺寸规格。

Enables the fast scroll thumb that can be dragged to quickly scroll through the list.
启用可以拖动的快速滚动滑块以快速滚动列表。
Ends all animations on the view created by the <c0><a1>RecyclerView.ItemAnimator</a1></c0>.

Even if only one app uses your view, that app needs to handle different screen sizes, multiple screen densities, and various aspect ratios in both portrait and landscape mode.
即使只有一个应用程序使用你的 view，该应用程序也需要在纵向和横向模式下处理不同的屏幕尺寸，多个屏幕密度和各种宽高比。
Even if sharing is allowed, the implementation may still decide to make a deep copy of the input data.
即使允许共享，实现仍可能决定对输入数据进行深层复制。

Every button is styled using the system's default button background, which is often different from one version of the platform to another.
每个按钮都使用系统的默认按钮背景进行样式化，这通常不同于平台的不同版本。
Every class and nontrivial public method you write <e0>must</e0> contain a Javadoc comment with at least one sentence describing what the class or method does.
你编写的每个类和重要的公开方法都必须包含 Javadoc 备注，至少用一句话说明类或方法的用途。
Every file should have a copyright statement at the top, followed by package and import statements (each block separated by a blank line) and finally the class or interface declaration.
每个文件都应该在顶部放置版权声明，其后是 package 和 import 语句(各个块之间用空行分隔)，最后是类或接口声明。
Every method you write, public or otherwise, would benefit from Javadoc.
你所编写的每一种方法（无论是公开方法还是其他方法）都将受益于 Javadoc。
Every view implements <c2><a3>onDraw()</a3></c2> differently, but there are some common operations that most views share:

Every view must have at least two constraints: one horizontal and one vertical.
每一个 view 必须至少有两个约束：一个水平和一个垂直约束。

可扩展列表能够在每个项目旁边显示一个指示符，以显示项目的当前状态(状态通常是扩展组，折叠组，子项或最后一个项目之一)。

扩展浮动操作按钮用于特殊类型的提升操作。
Extended floating action buttons may have icon and text, but may also hold just an icon or text.
扩展浮动操作按钮可以具有图标和文本，但也可以仅包含图标或文本。

Extra menu information provided to the <c0><a1>View.OnCreateContextMenuListener.onCreateContextMenu(ContextMenu, View, ContextMenuInfo)</a1></c0> callback when a context menu is brought up for this AdapterView.

FileProvider is a special subclass of <c0><a1>ContentProvider</a1></c0> that facilitates secure sharing of files associated with an app by creating a <c2>content://</c2> <c3><a4>Uri</a4></c3> for a file instead of a <c5>file:///</c5> <c6><a7>Uri</a7></c6>.

Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: Requests the navigation bar to draw in a mode that is compatible with light navigation bar backgrounds.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：请求导航栏以与光导航栏背景兼容的模式进行绘制。
Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: Requests the status bar to draw in a mode that is compatible with light status bar backgrounds.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：请求状态栏以与亮色状态栏背景兼容的模式进行绘制。
Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: View has requested that the system navigation be temporarily hidden.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：View 已请求暂时隐藏系统导航。
Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: View has requested the system UI to enter an unobtrusive "low profile" mode.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：View 已请求系统 UI 进入不显眼的“低调”模式。

Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: View has requested to go into the normal fullscreen mode so that its content can take over the screen while still allowing the user to interact with the application.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：View 已请求进入正常的全屏模式，以便其内容可以接管屏幕，同时仍允许用户与应用程序进行交互。
Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: View would like its window to be laid out as if it has requested <c2><a3>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a3></c2>, even if it currently hasn't.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：view 要将其窗口布局，就好像它已请求 <c2><a3>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a3></c2> ，即使它目前还没有。
Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: View would like its window to be laid out as if it has requested <c2><a3>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_HIDE_NAVIGATION</a3></c2>, even if it currently hasn't.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：view 会将其窗口布局为就好像它已请求 <c2><a3>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_HIDE_NAVIGATION</a3></c2> 一样，即使它目前还没有。

用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：使用 <c2><a3>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_HIDE_NAVIGATION</a3></c2> 隐藏导航栏时，view 希望保持交互状态。

Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: View would like to remain interactive when hiding the status bar with <c2><a3>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a3></c2> and/or hiding the navigation bar with <c4><a5>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_HIDE_NAVIGATION</a5></c4>.

Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: When using other layout flags, we would like a stable view of the content insets given to <c2><a3>fitSystemWindows(Rect)</a3></c2>.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：当使用其他布局标志时，我们希望一个稳定的 view，其内容 insets 由 <c2><a3>fitSystemWindows(Rect)</a3></c2> 给定。

Flag for <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0>: When using other layout flags, we would like a stable view of the content insets given to <c2><a3>fitSystemWindows(android.graphics.Rect)</a3></c2>.
用于 <c0><a1>setSystemUiVisibility(int)</a1></c0> 的标志：当使用其他布局标志时，我们希望一个稳定的 view，其内容 insets 由 <c2><a3>fitSystemWindows(android.graphics.Rect)</a3></c2> 给定。

If D calls startActivity() with an Intent that resolves to the component of activity B, then B will be brought to the front of the history stack, with this resulting order: A, C, D, B. This flag will be ignored if <c0><a1>FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP</a1></c0> is also specified.

For example, consider a task consisting of the activities: A, B, C, D. If D calls startActivity() with an Intent that resolves to the component of activity B, then C and D will be finished and B receive the given Intent, resulting in the stack now being: A, B.

If <c0><a1>inJustDecodeBounds</a1></c0> is set to false, this will be width of the output bitmap after any scaling is applied.
如果 <c0><a1>inJustDecodeBounds</a1></c0> 设置为 false，那么在应用任何缩放后，这将是输出位图的宽度。
If <c0>true</c0>, <c1><a2>decodeDrawable</a2></c1> will return an <c3><a4>AnimatedImageDrawable</a4></c3>.
如果 <c0>true</c0>，<c1><a2>decodeDrawable</a2></c1> 将返回 <c3><a4>AnimatedImageDrawable</a4></c3>。
If <c4>null</c4>, colors are distributed evenly between the center and edge of the circle.
如果为 <c4>null</c4>，颜色均匀分布在圆的中心和边缘之间。
If <c5>color</c5> is not opaque, consider setting <c6><a7>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_STABLE</a7></c6> and <c8><a9>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_FULLSCREEN</a9></c8>.
如果 <c5>color</c5> 不透明，请考虑设置 <c6><a7>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_STABLE</a7></c6> 和 <c8><a9>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_FULLSCREEN</a9></c8> 。
If <c6><a7>onPartialImage</a7></c6> returns <c8>true</c8>, a partial image will be created.
如果 <c6><a7>onPartialImage</a7></c6> 返回 <c8>true</c8>，将创建​​部分图像。
If FOREVER_NS is passed, this method will not fail to create/bind the holder if needed.
如果传递了 FOREVER_NS，则如果需要，此方法将会创建/绑定 holder 而不会失败。
If FOREVER_NS is passed, this method will not fail to create/bind the holder if needed.
如果传递了 FOREVER_NS，则如果需要，此方法将会创建/绑定 holder 而不会失败。
If ViewHolder isRecyclable is false, recycleViewHolderInternal() will not recycle it, endAnimation() will reset isRecyclable flag and recycle the view.
如果 ViewHolder isRecyclable 为 false，则 recycleViewHolderInternal() 将不回收它，endAnimation() 将重置 isRecyclable 标志并回收 view。
If a TableRow's parent is not a TableLayout, the TableRow will behave as an horizontal <c2><a3>LinearLayout</a3></c2>.
如果 TableRow 的父级不是 TableLayout，则 TableRow 将表现为水平 <c2><a3>LinearLayout</a3></c2>。

If a View object sets the NinePatch as its background and then specifies the View's text, it will stretch itself so that all the text fits inside only the area designated by the right and bottom lines (if included).
如果一个 View 对象设置了 NinePatch 作为它的背景，并申明的 view 的文字，它将缩放自己以使得所有的文字处于右边和上边的线申明的区域内。(如果包含右边或上边的线)。
If a ViewHolder is aquired and must be bound but not enough time remains, an unbound holder is returned.
如果获取了一个 ViewHolder 并且必须被绑定，但是没有足够的时间，则返回一个未绑定的 holder。
If a ViewHolder must be constructed and not enough time remains, null is returned.
如果必须构造一个 ViewHolder，并且没有足够的时间，则返回 null。

If a child does not specify the row and column indices of the cell it wishes to occupy, GridLayout assigns cell locations automatically using its: <c0><a1>GridLayout#setOrientation(int)</a1></c0>, <c2><a3>GridLayout#setRowCount(int)</a3></c2> and <c4><a5>GridLayout#setColumnCount(int)</a5></c4> properties.

如果子项没有指定它希望占用的单元格的行和列索引，GridLayout 将使用以下命令自动分配单元格位置：<c0><a1>GridLayout#setOrientation(int)</a1></c0>，<c2><a3>GridLayout#setRowCount(int)</a3></c2> 和 <c4><a5>GridLayout#setColumnCount(int)</a5></c4> 属性。

If a child view's <c1><a2>LayoutParams</a2></c1> indicates a <c3><a4>Gravity</a4></c3> value of <c5><a6>Gravity#CENTER_HORIZONTAL</a6></c5> the view will attempt to center within the available space remaining in the Toolbar after all other elements have been measured.
如果子 view 的 <c1><a2>LayoutParams</a2></c1> 指定了 <c5><a6>Gravity#CENTER_HORIZONTAL</a6></c5> 的 <c3><a4>Gravity</a4></c3> 值，在测量完所有其他元素后，view 将尝试在工具栏中剩余的可用空间内居中。

If a child view's <c1><a2>Toolbar.LayoutParams</a2></c1> indicates a <c3><a4>Gravity</a4></c3> value of <c5><a6>CENTER_HORIZONTAL</a6></c5> the view will attempt to center within the available space remaining in the Toolbar after all other elements have been measured.
如果子 view 的 <c1><a2>Toolbar.LayoutParams</a2></c1> 指定了值为 <c5><a6>CENTER_HORIZONTAL</a6></c5> 的 <c3><a4>Gravity</a4></c3>，在测量完所有其他元素后，view 将尝试以工具栏中剩余的可用空间为中心。
If a comment line contains an example command or a literal URL longer than 100 characters, that line may be longer than 100 characters for ease of cut and paste.
如果备注行包含长度超过 100 个字符的示例命令或文字网址，那么为了便于剪切和粘贴，该行可以超过 100 个字符。

If a custom view not equipped to properly measure with the MeasureSpec mode <c5><a6>UNSPECIFIED</a6></c5> was placed in a RelativeLayout, this would silently work anyway as RelativeLayout would pass a very large <c7><a8>AT_MOST</a8></c7> MeasureSpec instead.
如果未通过 MeasureSpec 模式 <c5><a6>UNSPECIFIED</a6></c5> 进行正确测量的自定义 view 被放置在 RelativeLayout 中，那么无论如何，这将无声地工作，因为 RelativeLayout 将传递非常大的 <c7><a8>AT_MOST</a8></c7> MeasureSpec。
If a deadlineNs other than <a0>#FOREVER_NS</a0> is passed, this method early return rather than constructing or binding a ViewHolder if it doesn't think it has time.
如果传递了除 <a0>#FOREVER_NS</a0> 以外的 deadlineNs，则此方法在它认为没有时间的情况下将提前返回，而不会构造或绑定 ViewHolder。
If a hint is specified on the child EditText in XML, the TextInputLayout might still work correctly; TextInputLayout will use the EditText's hint as its floating label.
如果在 XML 中的子 EditText 上指定了提示，则 TextInputLayout 可能仍然可以正常工作；TextInputLayout 将使用 EditText 的提示作为其浮动标签。
If a library was designed for a server or desktop, it can include many objects and methods that your app doesn’t need.
如果库是为服务器或桌面设计的，则它可以包含你的应用程序不需要的许多对象和方法。
If a method exceeds 40 lines or so, think about whether it can be broken up without harming the structure of the program.
如果某个方法的代码超出 40 行，请考虑是否可以在不破坏程序结构的前提下对其拆解。
If a nested scrolling child view would normally fling but it is at the edge of its own content, it can use this method to delegate the fling to its nested scrolling parent instead.
如果嵌套的滚动子 view 正常 fling 但它位于其自己内容的边缘，则可以使用此方法将 fling 委托给其嵌套的滚动父级。
If a nested scrolling parent is consuming motion as part of a <c0><a1>pre-scroll</a1></c0>, it may be appropriate for it to also consume the pre-fling to complete that same motion.
如果嵌套滚动父级将 <c0><a1>pre-scroll</a1></c0> 的一部分动作消耗，则它也可能适合消耗 pre-fling 来完成相同的动作。
If a single thread issues a sequence of method invocations that violates the contract of an object, the object may throw this exception.
如果单线程发出违反对象协定的方法调用序列，则该对象可能抛出此异常。
If a start-aligned icon is added to this button, please use a style like one of the ".Icon" styles specified in the default MaterialButton styles.
如果向此按钮添加了一个开始对齐的图标，请使用类似于默认 MaterialButton 样式中指定的“.Icon”样式之类的样式。
If a variable is initialized with the return value of a method that throws a checked exception, it must be initialized inside a try block.
如果通过一个会抛出受检异常的方法的返回值来初始化变量，则必须在 try 块中进行初始化。
If a warning passes this "impossible to eliminate" test, the @SuppressWarnings annotation <e1>must</e1> be used, so as to ensure that all warnings reflect actual problems in the code.
如果某个警告通过了 "无法消除" 测试，则必须使用 @SuppressWarnings 注释，以确保所有警告都会反映出代码中的实际问题。
If all of your application’s activities are still resident in memory, then the app can avoid having to repeat object initialization, layout inflation, and rendering.
如果所有应用程序的 activity 仍然驻留在内存中，那么应用程序可以避免重复对象初始化，布局加载和渲染。
If an <c0><a1>anchor</a1></c0> is present the keyline will be ignored.
如果存在 <c0><a1>anchor</a1></c0>，则将忽略 keyline。
If an <c6><a7>anchor</a7></c6> is also specified, the gravity describes how this child view should be positioned relative to its anchored position.
如果还指定了 <c6><a7>anchor</a7></c6>，则 gravity 描述了此子 view 相对于其锚定位置的定位方式。
If an activity wishes to show just the progress animation, it should call setRefreshing(true).
如果 activity 希望仅显示进度动画，则应调用 setRefreshing(true)。
If an app uses a logo image it should strongly consider omitting a title and subtitle.
如果应用使用 logo 图片，则应强烈考虑省略标题和副标题。

If an instance is passed to <c0><a1>setOnPartialImageListener</a1></c0>, a <c2><a3>DecodeException</a3></c2> that would otherwise have been thrown can be inspected inside <c4><a5>onPartialImage</a5></c4>.
如果实例被传递到 <c0><a1>setOnPartialImageListener</a1></c0>，则本应抛出的 <c2><a3>DecodeException</a3></c2> 可以在 <c4><a5>onPartialImage</a5></c4> 内进行检查。
If an item view has large or expensive data bound to it such as large bitmaps, this may be a good place to release those resources.
如果项目 view 绑定了大量或昂贵的数据(如大型位图)，则这可能是释放这些资源的好地方。
If an item view has large or expensive data bound to it such as large bitmaps, this may be a good place to release those resources.</p2>
如果项目 view 绑定了大量或昂贵的数据(如大型位图)，则这可能是释放这些资源的好地方。</p2>
If an uncaught exception is thrown by the finalize method, the exception is ignored and finalization of that object terminates.
如果 finalize 方法引发未捕获的异常，则忽略该异常，并终止该对象的终止。
If any sibling views before this one do not have this flag, then this value has no effect.
如果在此之前的任何兄弟 view 没有此标志，则此值无效。
If applied to an int array, every element in the array represents a color integer.
如果应用于一个 int 数组，数组中的每个元素都代表一个颜色的整型。
If both the width and height are set to match constraints, you can click <b0>Toggle Aspect Ratio Constraint</b0> to select which dimension is based on a ratio of the other.
如果宽度和高度都设置为 match constraints，你可以单击 <b0>Toggle Aspect Ratio Constraint</b0> 来选择哪个尺寸基于另一个比率。
If combined with <c0><a1>setTargetSize(int, int)</a1></c0> and/or <c2><a3>setCrop(Rect)</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>PostProcessor.onPostProcess(Canvas)</a5></c4> occurs last.
如果与 <c0><a1>setTargetSize(int, int)</a1></c0> 和/或 <c2><a3>setCrop(Rect)</a3></c2> 组合，<c4><a5>PostProcessor.onPostProcess(Canvas)</a5></c4> 最后发生。
If decoding is interrupted after having decoded a partial image, this method will be called.
如果在解码部分图像之后中断解码，则将调用该方法。
If either <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>invalidate()</a3></c2> were called, the framework will take care of measuring, laying out, and drawing the tree as appropriate.
如果 <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0> 或者 <c2><a3>invalidate()</a3></c2> 被调用，框架将负责计算、布局及绘制适当的 view 树。
If either a weight or alignment were defined along a given axis then the component is taken as <e2>flexible</e2> in that direction.
如果沿给定轴定义了权重或对齐，则该组件在该方向上被视为 <e2>flexible (灵活)</e2>。
If either or both of the axes are not specified, they are treated by CoordinatorLayout as <c2><a3>TOP</a3></c2> or <c4><a5>START</a5></c4>.
如果未指定其中一个或两个轴，则 CoordinatorLayout 将它们视为 <c2><a3>TOP</a3></c2> 或 <c4><a5>START</a5></c4>。
If false, no state will be saved for this view when it is being frozen.
如果为 false，则在冻结此 view 时不会保存任何状态。
If false, the chip acts like a button.
如果为 false，chip 就像一个按钮。
If gravity was defined, then the gone-marked view has no effect on the layout and the container should be laid out as if the view had never been added to it.
如果定义了重力，则标记 gone 的 view 对布局没有影响，并且应该布置容器，就好像从未添加过 view 一样。
If in the course of processing the event, the view's bounds may need to be changed, the view will call <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0>.
在处理事件的过程中，如果 view 的边界可能需要改变，view 将会调用 <c0><a1>requestLayout()</a1></c0> 方法。
If inPurgeable is false, then this field is ignored.
如果 inPurgeable 为 false，则该字段将被忽略。
If inPurgeable is true, then this field determines whether the bitmap can share a reference to the input data (inputstream, array, etc.) or if it must make a deep copy.
如果 inPurgeable 为 true，那么此字段确定位图是否可以共享对输入数据(输入流，数组等)的引用，或者是否必须进行深度复制。
If intercepted, start normal event dispatch.
如果被拦截，启动正常事件分发。
If it cannot find a suitable View, Recycler will call the <a1>#getViewForPositionAndType(Recycler, int, int)</a1> before checking <a2>RecycledViewPool</a2>.
如果找不到合适的 view，Recycler 将在检查 <a2>RecycledViewPool</a2> 之前调用 <a1>#getViewForPositionAndType(Recycler, int, int)</a1>。
If it finds conflicting measurements, it may need to traverse the hierarchy multiple times.
如果发现有冲突的测量，则可能需要多次遍历层次结构。

If it has declared its launch mode to be "multiple" (the default) and you have not set <c0><a1>FLAG_ACTIVITY_SINGLE_TOP</a1></c0> in the same intent, then it will be finished and re-created; for all other launch modes or if <c2><a3>FLAG_ACTIVITY_SINGLE_TOP</a3></c2> is set then this Intent will be delivered to the current instance's onNewIntent().

如果它已声明其启动模式为“multiple”(默认值)，并且你没有在相同的 intent 中设置 <c0><a1>FLAG_ACTIVITY_SINGLE_TOP</a1></c0>，则它将 finish 并重新创建；对于所有其他启动模式，或者如果设置了 <c2><a3>FLAG_ACTIVITY_SINGLE_TOP</a3></c2>，则此 intent 将传递到当前实例的 onNewIntent()。

If it is null, which is the default, or the request cannot be met, the decoder will pick either the color space embedded in the image or the <c1><a2>ColorSpace</a2></c1> best suited for the requested image configuration (for instance <c3><a4>sRGB</a4></c3> for the <c5><a6>Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888</a6></c5> configuration).
如果它为 null（默认值）或无法满足请求，解码器将选择图像中嵌入的颜色空间或 <c1><a2>ColorSpace</a2></c1> 最适合于请求的映像配置（例如 <c3><a4>sRGB</a4></c3> 用于 <c5><a6>Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888</a6></c5> 配置）。
If it isn't, it means that a fling or programmatic pan operation is still in progress.
如果不是，则意味着仍在进行 fling 或 programmatic pan 操作。
If it returns true, this ViewParent will become the target view's nested scrolling parent for the duration of the scroll operation in progress.
如果返回 true，则此 ViewParent 将在正在进行的滚动操作期间成为目标 view 的嵌套滚动父级。
If it's not obvious what the property "Foo" means, you should document it.
如果属性 "Foo" 的意思不明确，你也应该添加备注。
If known, the color space the decoded bitmap will have.
如果已知，则解码的位图将具有的颜色空间。
If known, this string is set to the mimetype of the decoded image.
如果已知，则将该字符串设置为解码图像的 mimetype。
If margins are specified on connections, they will be taken in account.
如果在链上指定了 margins，它们将会被考虑在内。
If marked as shrinkable, the column width can be shrunk to fit the table into its parent object.
如果标记为可收缩，则可以缩小列宽以使表适合其父对象。
If marked as stretchable, it can expand in width to fit any extra space.
如果标记为可拉伸，则可以扩展宽度以适应任何额外空间。
If mode is null, then SRC_OVER is assumed.
如果模式为空，则假定为 SRC_OVER。
If no match has yet been attempted, or if the previous match operation failed
如果没有尝试任何匹配或者以前的匹配操作失败
If no weight or alignment was set, the component is instead assumed to be <e3>inflexible</e3>.
如果没有设置权重或对齐，则假定该组件 <e3>inflexible (不灵活)</e3>。
If non-null, the decoder will try to decode into <c0>colorSpace</c0>.
如果为非 null，则解码器将尝试解码为 <c0>colorSpace</c0>。
If none of the prebuilt widgets or layouts meets your needs, you can create your own View subclass.
如果预制的组件和布局都不能满足你的需求，你可以创建自己的 View 子类。
If not know, or there is an error, it is set to null.
如果不知道，或者有错误，则将其设置为空。
If not known (when the config is <c0><a1>Bitmap.Config.ALPHA_8</a1></c0> for instance), or there is an error, it is set to null.
如果未知(例如，当配置 <c0><a1>Bitmap.Config.ALPHA_8</a1></c0> 时)，或者存在错误，则将其设置为 null。
If one or more elements are using <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0>, they will use the available empty space (equally divided among themselves).
如果一个或多个元素使用 <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0>，它们将使用可用的空白空间(在它们之前平分)。
If positions is NULL, then the colors are automatically spaced evenly.
如果位置为 NULL，则颜色自动均匀分布。
If possible, consider using the <c1>@IntDef</c1> annotation and <a2>ProGuard</a2> to strip enumerations out and convert them to integers.
如果可能，请考虑使用 <c1>@IntDef</c1> 注释和 <a2>ProGuard</a2> 来删除枚举并将其转换为整数。
If pre-layout, check the changed scrap for an exact match.
如果预先布局，检查更改的废料是否完全匹配。
If requested, can automatically flip between each child at a regular interval.
如果需要，可以定期在每个子项之间自动翻转。

If set and this intent is being used to launch a new activity from an existing one, the current activity will not be counted as the top activity for deciding whether the new intent should be delivered to the top instead of starting a new one.
如果设置并且这个 intent 用于从现有的一个新的 activity 中启动，当前 activity 将不被视为决定新的 intent 是否应该被交付到顶层而不是启动新的 activity 的顶部 activity。
If set and this intent is being used to launch a new activity from an existing one, then the reply target of the existing activity will be transfered to the new activity.
如果设置并且这个 intent 用于从现有的一个 activity 中启动新的 activity，那么现有 activity 的回复目标将被转移到新的 activity。
If set in an Intent passed to <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0>, this flag will cause a newly launching task to be placed on top of the current home activity task (if there is one).
如果在传递给 <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0> 的 intent 中设置，则此标志将导致新启动的 task 置于当前主 activity task 的顶部(如果有)。

If set in an Intent passed to <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0>, this flag will cause any existing task that would be associated with the activity to be cleared before the activity is started.
如果在传入 <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0> 的 Intent 中设置，该标志将导致将与 activity 相关的任何现有 task 在 activity 开始之前被清除。
If set in an Intent passed to <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0>, this flag will cause the launched activity to be brought to the front of its task's history stack if it is already running.
如果在传递给 <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0> 的 intent 中设置此标志，则如果已启动的 activity 已在运行，则此标志将导致其被带到任务历史堆栈的前面。
If set in an Intent passed to <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0>, this flag will prevent the system from applying an activity transition animation to go to the next activity state.
如果在传递给 <c0><a1>Context.startActivity()</a1></c0> 的 intent 中设置，则此标志将阻止系统应用 activity 转换动画以转到下一个 activity 状态。
If set on a nine-patch image, the nine-patch data is ignored.
如果设置在 .9 图像上，则忽略 .9 数据。
If set to a value > 1, requests the decoder to subsample the original image, returning a smaller image to save memory.
如果设置为大于 1 的值，则请求解码器对原始图像进行二次采样，返回较小的图像以节省存储空间。
If set to true, the <c0><a1>AppBarLayout</a1></c0> will animate to the lifted, or elevated, state when content is scrolled beneath it.
如果设置为 true，则 <c0><a1>AppBarLayout</a1></c0> 将动画到 lifted 或 elevated 状态，当其下方内容滚动时。
If set to true, the decoder will return null (no bitmap), but the out...
如果设置为 true，解码器将返回 null (无位图)，但...
If set, a button is displayed to toggle between the password being displayed as plain-text or disguised, when your EditText is set to display a password.
如果设置，则当 EditText 设置为显示密码时，将显示一个按钮，用于在显示为纯文本或伪装的密码之间切换。
If set, a button is displayed when text is present and clicking it clears the EditText field.
如果设置，则在显示文本时会显示一个按钮，单击它会清除 EditText 字段。

If set, and the activity being launched is already running in the current task, then instead of launching a new instance of that activity, all of the other activities on top of it will be closed and this Intent will be delivered to the (now on top) old activity as a new Intent.
如果设置，并且正在启动的 activity 已在当前 task 中运行，则不会启动该 activity 的新实例，而是关闭其上的所有其他 activity，并将此 intent 作为新 intent 传递给(现在位于顶部)旧 activity。
If set, and this activity is either being started in a new task or bringing to the top an existing task, then it will be launched as the front door of the task.
如果设置，这个 activity 要么是在一个新 task 中启动，要么是放到一个现有 task 顶层，然后它将作为 task 的前门启动。
If set, decode methods that take the Options object will attempt to reuse this bitmap when loading content.
如果设置，则在加载内容时，采用 Options 对象的解码方法将尝试重新使用此位图。
If set, decode methods will always return a mutable Bitmap instead of an immutable one.
