If true, changes will affect ViewHolder's pre-layout position, if false, they'll be applied before the second layout pass
如果为 true，则更改将影响 ViewHolder 的预布局位置，如果为 false，则在第二个布局过程之前应用这些更改
If true, it will be the height of the input image without any accounting for scaling.
如果为 true，那么将是输入图像的高度，而不考虑缩放比例。
If true, it will be the width of the input image without any accounting for scaling.
如果为 true，那将是输入图像的宽度，而不考虑缩放比例。
If true, the image view will be baseline aligned with based on its bottom edge.
如果为 true，则图像 view 将基于其底边基线对齐。
If true, the image will be cropped to fit within its padding.
如果为 true，则将裁剪图像以适合其 padding。
If value is not a valid number, 80 is substituted.
如果值不是有效的数字，将会使用 80 代替。
If value is not a valid number, die.
如果值不是有效的数字，结束。
If you absolutely need it, define a close() method (or the like) and document exactly when that method needs to be called (see InputStream for an example).
如果你的确需要终结器，请定义一个 close() 方法（或类似方法），并注明需要调用该方法的确切时间（有关示例，请参阅 InputStream）。
If you add opposing constraints on a view, the constraint lines become squiggly like a spring to indicate the opposing forces, as shown in video 2.
如果在 view 上添加了相反的约束，约束线会变成像弹簧一样扭曲来表示相反的力，就像视频 2。
If you are converting more than one image, click <b0>Next</b0> to advance to the next image.
如果要转换多个图像，请单击 <b0>Next</b0> 以前进到下一图像。
If you are converting more than one image, the conversion is a single step, and can be undone to revert all the images you converted at once.
如果要转换多个图像，转换只需一步，即可撤消以立即还原所有转换的图像。

如果你打算以这种方式使用它，你需要了解一些线程语义：

如果你正在实现示例中所示的 XML 布局属性，那么它们将在 <c0>res/values/attrs.xml</c0> 中进行相应的定义：
If you are not doing this, you may need to adjust some Gallery properties, such as the spacing.
如果你不这样做，则可能需要调整一些 Gallery 属性，例如间距。
If you are not overriding <c2><a3>getSpanIndex(int, int)</a3></c2>, you should set this to true for better performance.
如果你正重写 <c2><a3>getSpanIndex(int, int)</a3></c2>，你应该设置该值为 true 以获得更好的性能。
If you are not satisfied with the default button style, you can customize it.
如果你对默认按钮样式不满意，可以自定义它。
If you are using ActionBar in overlay mode with <c0><a1>Window.FEATURE_ACTION_BAR_OVERLAY</a1></c0>, this flag will also impact the insets it adds to those given to the application.
如果在 overlay 模式下使用 ActionBar 并使用 <c0><a1>Window.FEATURE_ACTION_BAR_OVERLAY</a1></c0>，则此标志还会影响它添加到给定应用程序的中的 insets。
If you are writing an adapter it will always be more efficient to use the more specific change events if you can.
如果你正在编写适配器，那么如果可以的话，使用更具体的更改事件总是更有效的。
If you do so, you'll usually want to wrap this ChipGroup in a <c4><a5>HorizontalScrollView</a5></c4>.
如果这样做，通常需要将此 ChipGroup 包装在 <c4><a5>HorizontalScrollView</a5></c4> 中。
If you don't include resources for a specific screen density, Android automatically scales existing resources originally designed for other screen densities.
如果你不包含特定屏幕密度的资源，Android 会自动扩展最初为其他屏幕密度设计的现有资源。
If you don't specify a column number for a child cell, it will autoincrement to the next available column.
如果没有为子单元格指定列号，它将自动增加到下一个可用列。

If you don't want to create a completely customized component, but instead are looking to put together a reusable component that consists of a group of existing controls, then creating a Compound Component (or Compound Control) might fit the bill.
如果你不想创建完全自定义的组件，而是想创建一个由一组已存在的控件组成的可复用的组件，那么创建一个组合组件(或组合控件)可以满足你的需求。
If you don't yet have enough information to initialize a variable sensibly, postpone the declaration until you do.
如果你还没有足够的信息来合理地初始化某个变量，请推迟到信息充足时再进行声明。
If you fail to call this method from an overridden <c5>onMeasure()</c5> method, the result will be an exception at measurement time.
如果你在重写 <c5>onMeasure()</c5> 方法时没有成功调用该方法，在测量时这个结果将会出错。
If you have a complex UI, consider writing a custom <c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0> to perform its layout.
如果你有复杂的 UI，请考虑编写自定义 <c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0> 来执行其布局。
If you have a faster way to calculate span index for your items, you should override this method.
如果你有更快的方法来计算 item 的 span index，则重写该方法。
If you have already depended on this class, consider copying the implementation from AOSP into your project or re-implementing a similar widget by yourselves
如果你已经依赖此类，请考虑将实现从 AOSP 复制到你的项目中或者自己重新实现类似的小部件
If you haven't done so already, import the NotePad sample into Android Studio (or just look at the source using the link provided).
如果你还没看过这个 demo，可以导入 Android Studio (或者用提供的链接看下源代码。)。
If you instead want the view to stretch its size to meet the constraints, <a0>switch the size to "match constraints"</a0>.
如果你想拉伸 view 的尺寸以满足约束， <a0>switch the size to "match constraints"</a0>。

If you instead want the view to stretch its size to meet the constraints, <a0>switch the size to "match constraints"</a0>; or if you want to keep the current size but move the view so that it is not centered, <a1>adjust the constraint bias</a1>.
如果你想拉伸 view 的尺寸以满足约束， <a0>switch the size to "match constraints"</a0>；或者如果你想保留当前的大小，但想移动 view 使其不居中，<a1>adjust the constraint bias</a1>。
If you know that only a small percentage of your users have devices with specific densities, consider whether you need to bundle those densities into your app.
如果你知道只有一小部分用户拥有具有特定密度的设备，请考虑是否需要将这些密度捆绑到你的应用中。
If you learn that your display times are slower than you’d like, you can go on to try to identify the bottlenecks in the startup process.
如果你了解到显示时间比你想要的慢，你可以继续尝试识别启动过程中的瓶颈。
If you need finer control over your view's layout parameters, implement <c0><a1>onMeasure()</a1></c0>.
如果需要更好地控制 view 的布局参数，请实现 <c0><a1>onMeasure()</a1></c0>。
If you need the position of an item later on (e.g. in a click listener), use <a2>ViewHolder#getAdapterPosition()</a2> which will have the updated adapter position.
如果以后需要某个项的位置(例如在点击监听器中)，请使用 <a2>ViewHolder#getAdapterPosition()</a2> 方法，它具有更新的适配器位置。
If you need to access Adapter for additional data, you can call <c0><a1>getChildAdapterPosition(View)</a1></c0> to get the adapter position of the View.
如果你需要访问 Adapter 以获取更多的数据，你可以调用 <c0><a1>getChildAdapterPosition(View)</a1></c0> 来获得该 view 的 adapter 位置。
If you need to access a MaterialCardView directly, set an <c2>android:id</c2> and use <c3><a4>findViewById(int)</a4></c3>.
如果需要直接访问 MaterialCardView，请设置 <c2>android:id</c2> 并使用 <c3><a4>findViewById(int)</a4></c3>。
If you need to access a View directly, set an <c2>android:id</c2> and use <c3><a4>findViewById(int)</a4></c3>.
如果你需要直接访问 View，请设置 <c2>android:id</c2> 并使用 <c3><a4>findViewById(int)</a4></c3>。
If you omit this call, the <c4><a5>View</a5></c4> class throws a runtime exception.
如果省略此调用，<c4><a5>View</a5></c4> 类将引发运行时异常。
If you only need to make small adjustments to an existing widget or layout, you can simply subclass the widget or layout and override its methods.
如果你只需要对现有的 widget 或 layout 作小的调整，你可以简单地创建它们的子类并重写相关方法。

If you only want to process a few gestures, you can extend <c4><a5>GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener</a5></c4> instead of implementing the <c6><a7>GestureDetector.OnGestureListener</a7></c6> interface.
如果你只想处理几个手势，可以继承 <c4><a5>GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener</a5></c4>，而不是实现 <c6><a7>GestureDetector.OnGestureListener</a7></c6> 界面。
If you override this method, you need to make sure it is consistent with <c0><a1>getSpanSize(int)</a1></c0>.
如果你重写该方法，你需要确保它与 <c0><a1>getSpanSize(int)</a1></c0> 一致。
If you press the button and select something from the list, it populates the EditText field, but the user can also type something directly into the EditText if they prefer.
如果你按下按钮并从列表中选择了某项，它会填充 EditText，但是如果用户想要，也可以直接在 EditText 中输入。

If you return <c7>false</c7> from <c8><a9>onDown()</a9></c8>, as <c10><a11>GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener</a11></c10> does, the system assumes that you want to ignore the rest of the gesture, and the other methods of <c12><a13>GestureDetector.OnGestureListener</a13></c12> never get called.

如果从 <c8><a9>onDown()</a9></c8> 返回 <c7>false</c7>，像 <c10><a11>GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener</a11></c10> 一样，则系统假定你要忽略手势的其余部分，并且永远不会调用 <c12><a13>GestureDetector.OnGestureListener</a13></c12> 的其他方法。

If you return true from here, you will not receive any following events: the target view will receive the same event but with the action <a0>MotionEvent#ACTION_CANCEL</a0>, and all further events will be delivered to your onTouchEvent() method and no longer appear here.
如果从此处返回 true，则不会收到任何后续事件：目标 view 将接收相同的事件，但操作是 <a0>MotionEvent#ACTION_CANCEL</a0>，所有其他事件将被传递到你的 onTouchEvent() 方法，不再出现在这里。

If you return true from here, you will not receive any following events: the target view will receive the same event but with the action <c0><a1>MotionEvent#ACTION_CANCEL</a1></c0>, and all further events will be delivered to your onTouchEvent() method and no longer appear here.
如果从此处返回 true，则不会收到任何后续事件：目标 view 将接收相同的事件，但操作是 <c0><a1>MotionEvent#ACTION_CANCEL</a1></c0>，所有其他事件将被传递到你的 onTouchEvent() 方法，不再出现在这里。
If you see old code that has a @deprecated Javadoc tag, please add the @Deprecated annotation.
如果你看到带有 @deprecated Javadoc 标记的旧代码，请添加 @Deprecated 注释。
If you select lossy encoding, set the encoding quality, and choose whether or not to view a preview of each converted image before saving.
如果选择有损编码，请设置编码质量，并选择是否在保存之前查看每个转换图像的预览。
If you selected lossless conversion above, the conversion happens immediately.
如果你选择了上面的无损转换，则会立即进行转换。

If you selected lossy conversion, and you chose to view a preview of each converted image before saving, Android Studio shows you each image during the conversion so you can inspect the conversion result.
如果你选择了有损转换，并且选择在保存之前查看每个转换图像的预览，Android Studio 会在转换过程中显示每个图像，以便你可以检查转换结果。
If you selected lossy conversion, continue on to the next step.
如果你选择了有损转换，请继续执行下一步。
If you set a background drawable for a View, then the View will draw it before calling back to its <c0>onDraw()</c0> method.
如果你为 view 设置了一个背景 drawable，view 将在回调 <c0>onDraw()</c0> 之前绘制背景。
If you skip a column number, it will be considered an empty cell in that row.
如果跳过列号，则该行将被视为空单元格。
If you supply an initial capacity of 0, the sparse array will be initialized with a light-weight representation not requiring any additional array allocations.
如果初始容量为 0，稀疏数组将使用不需要任何额外数组分配的轻量级表示进行初始化。
If you use AppBarLayout within a different <c2><a3>ViewGroup</a3></c2>, most of its functionality will not work.
如果你在不同的 <c2><a3>ViewGroup</a3></c2> 中使用 AppBarLayout，则其大部分功能将无效。
If you use a navigation icon you should also set a description for its action using <c0><a1>setNavigationContentDescription(int)</a1></c0>.
如果使用导航图标，则还应使用 <c0><a1>setNavigationContentDescription(int)</a1></c0> 为其操作设置描述。
If you use the @Deprecated annotation, you must also have a @deprecated Javadoc tag and it should name an alternate implementation.
如果你使用 @Deprecated 注释，则还必须为其添加 @deprecated Javadoc 标记，并且该标记应该指定一个替代实现方案。
If you want more control, <c6><a7>DiffUtil</a7></c6> is the lower-level API you can use to compute the diffs yourself.
如果你想要更多控制，<c6><a7>DiffUtil</a7></c6> 是你可以用来自己计算差异的低级 API。
If you want the search field to always be visible, then call <c0><a1>setIconifiedByDefault(false)</a1></c0>.
如果希望搜索域始终可见，则调用 <c0><a1>setIconifiedByDefault(false)</a1></c0>。
If you want the search field to always be visible, then call setIconifiedByDefault(false).
如果希望搜索域始终可见，则调用 setIconifiedByDefault(false)。
If you want to change elevation dynamically, you should call <c4><a5>setMaxCardElevation(float)</a5></c4> when CardView is initialized.
如果要动态更改高程，则应在初始化 CardView 时调用 <c4><a5>setMaxCardElevation(float)</a5></c4>。
If you want to maintain compatibility with previous versions, you should send one content URI at a time in the <c3><a4>Intent</a4></c3>.
如果你想保持与以前版本的兼容性，你应该一次在 <c3><a4>Intent</a4></c3> 中发送一个 content URI。

If you want to override any of the default behavior of FileProvider methods, extend the FileProvider class and use the fully-qualified class name in the <c0>android:name</c0> attribute of the <c1><provider></c1> element.
如果要覆盖 FileProvider 方法的任何默认行为，请继承 FileProvider 类并在 <c1><provider></c1> 的 <c0>android:name</c0> 属性中使用完全限定的类名称。
If you want to specify a distance that leads to visually consistent results across various densities, use the following formula:
如果要指定一个在不同密度下产生视觉一致结果的距离，请使用以下公式：
If you want to use 3D graphics, you must extend <c1><a2>SurfaceView</a2></c1> instead of View, and draw from a separate thread.
如果你想要使用 3D 图形，你必须继承 <c1><a2>SurfaceView</a2></c1> 而不是 View，并从一个独立的线程画图。

If you want to use a WebP image from your project for another purpose (for example, in a web page that needs to correctly display images in a browser without WebP support), you can use Android Studio to convert WebP images to PNG format.
如果要将项目中的 WebP 图像用于其他目的(例如，在需要在没有 WebP 支持的浏览器中正确显示图像的网页中)，可以使用 Android Studio 将 WebP 图像转换为 PNG 格式。
If you wish to change this at runtime then you can do so via <c1><a2>setBackgroundTintList(ColorStateList)</a2></c1>.
如果你希望在运行时更改此设置，则可以通过 <c1><a2>setBackgroundTintList(ColorStateList)</a2></c1> 进行更改。
If you wish to change this at runtime then you can do so via <c1><a2>setBackgroundTintList(android.content.res.ColorStateList)</a2></c1>.
如果你希望在运行时更改此设置，则可以通过 <c1><a2>setBackgroundTintList(android.content.res.ColorStateList)</a2></c1> 进行更改。
If you'd like more information about the Layout Editor itself, see the Android Studio guide to <a3>Build a UI with Layout Editor</a3>.
如果你想了解有关布局编辑器本身的更多信息，请参阅 Android Studio 指南 <a3>Build a UI with Layout Editor</a3>。
If you're developing your app for API level 11 and higher <e2>only</e2>, you should instead use the framework <c3><a4>SearchView</a4></c3> class.
如果你 <e2>仅</e2> 为 API 级别 11 及更高级别开发应用程序，则应使用框架 <c3><a4>SearchView</a4></c3> 类。
If you're editing code, take a few minutes to look at the surrounding code and determine its style.
如果你正在修改代码，请花几分钟时间看一下周围的代码并确定其样式。
If you're familiar with <c6>layout_weight</c6> in a <a7>linear layout</a7>, this works the same way.
如果你熟悉 <a7>linear layout</a7> 中的 <c6>layout_weight</c6> 它们的工作方式是相同的。
If you're using a <c0><a1>ViewPager</a1></c0> together with this layout, you can call <c2><a3>setupWithViewPager(ViewPager)</a3></c2> to link the two together.
如果你将 <c0><a1>ViewPager</a1></c0> 与此布局一起使用，则可以调用 <c2><a3>setupWithViewPager(ViewPager)</a3></c2> 来链接两个在一起。

If your RecyclerView is displaying a list that is re-fetched from scratch for each update (e.g. from the network, or from a database), <c0><a1>DiffUtil</a1></c0> can calculate the difference between versions of the list.
如果你的 RecyclerView 正在显示从头开始为每次更新(例如从网络或数据库)重新获取的列表，<c0><a1>DiffUtil</a1></c0> 可以计算版本之间的差异的清单。
If your RecyclerView receives updates incrementally, e.g. item X is inserted, or item Y is removed, you can use <c0><a1>SortedList</a1></c0> to manage your list.
如果你的 RecyclerView 以递增方式接收更新，例如插入项目 X，或移除项目 Y，你可以使用 <c0><a1>SortedList</a1></c0> 来管理列表。

If your TODO is of the form "At a future date do something" make sure that you either include a very specific date ("Fix by November 2005") or a very specific event ("Remove this code after all production mixers understand protocol V7.").
如果你的 TODO 采用 "在未来的某个日期做某事" 的形式，请确保在其中包含一个非常具体的日期("在 2005 年 11 月前修复 ")或者一个非常具体的事件(" 在所有生产环境合成器都可处理 V7 协议后移除此代码")。
If your activity has an options menu, you can make select items accessible directly from the action bar as "action items".
如果你的 activity 有一个选项菜单，你可以直接从操作栏中选择可以访问的选项作为“操作项”。
If your app needs only scaled images, you can save even more space by having a single variant of an image in <c0>drawable-nodpi/</c0>.
如果你的应用只需要缩放图像，则可以通过在 <c0>drawable-nodpi/</c0> 中使用单个图像变体来节省更多空间。
If your app uses native code and the Android NDK, you can also reduce the size of the release version of your app by optimizing your code.
如果你的应用使用 native 代码和 Android NDK，你还可以通过优化代码来缩小应用发布版本的大小。
If your code must compile under Java 1.3, you must omit the exception that is the cause.
如果你的代码必须采用 Java 1.3 进行编译，则必须忽略表示原因的异常。
If your custom View component is not defined as an inner class, then you can, alternatively, declare the View component with the XML element name, and exclude the <c0>class</c0> attribute.
如果你的自定义 View 组件没有定义为内部类，你也可以用 XML 的元素名字来申明 View 组件，而不需要 <c0>class</c0> 属性。
If your debug logs are dominating the log then you probably should be using verbose logging.
如果你的调试日志是主要日志，那么你可能应采用 VERBOSE 级别的日志记录。
If your icon is end-aligned, you cannot use a ".Icon" style and must instead manually adjust your padding such that the visual adjustment is mirrored.
如果你的图标是末端对齐的，则不能使用“.Icon”样式，而必须手动调整 padding，以便镜像可视调整。
If your layout configures more than one drawer view per vertical edge of the window, an exception will be thrown at runtime.
如果你的布局为窗口的每个垂直边缘配置了多个抽屉 view，则会在运行时抛出异常。
If your view class is an inner class, you must further qualify it with the name of the view's outer class.
如果你的 view 类是内部类，则必须使用 view 人外部类的名称进一步限定它。
If your view doesn't need special control over its size, you only need to override one method: <c2><a3>onSizeChanged()</a3></c2>.
如果你的 view 不需要对其大小进行特殊控制，则只需重写一个方法：<c2><a3>onSizeChanged()</a3></c2>。
If you’re tracking logcat output from the command line, or in a terminal, finding the elapsed time is straightforward.
如果你正在从命令行或终端中跟踪 logcat 输出，则查找已用时间非常简单。
If you’ve overloaded <c0><a1>Application.onCreate()</a1></c0> in your own app, the system invokes the <c2>onCreate()</c2> method on your app object.
如果你在自己的应用程序中重载了 <c0><a1>Application.onCreate()</a1></c0>，系统会在你的应用程序对象上调用 <c2>onCreate()</c2> 方法。

If, due to lazy loading, an app’s initial display does not include all resources, you might consider the completed loading and display of all resources and views as a separate metric: For example, your UI might be fully loaded, with some text drawn, but not yet display images that the app must fetch from the network.
如果由于延迟加载，应用程序的初始显示不包含所有资源，你可能会将所有资源和视图的完成加载和显示视为单独的度量标准：例如，你的 UI 可能已完全加载，并绘制了一些文本，但尚未显示应用必须从网络中获取的图像。
If, for example, a gone-marked view was alone in a column, that column would itself collapse to zero width if and only if no gravity was defined on the view.
例如，如果在列中单独存在 gone 标记的 view，则当且仅当 view 上未定义重力时，该列本身将折叠为零宽度。
Image files need to use 256 or fewer colors for the <c0>aapt</c0> tool to optimize them.
图像文件需要使用 256 或更少的颜色才能由 <c0>aapt</c0> 工具进行优化。
ImageView is also commonly used to <c4><a5>apply tints to an image</a5></c4> and handle <c6><a7>image scaling</a7></c6>.
ImageView 也常用于 <c4><a5>将色调应用到图像上</a5></c4> 并处理 <c6><a7>图像缩放</a7></c6>。

In <c2><a3>KITKAT</a3></c2> and below, if this is set to true, then the resulting bitmap will allocate its pixels such that they can be purged if the system needs to reclaim memory.
在 <c2><a3>KITKAT</a3></c2> 及以下版本中，如果将其设置为 true，则生成的位图将分配其像素，以便在系统需要回收内存时清除它们。
In <c2><a3>KITKAT</a3></c2> and below, this field works in conjuction with inPurgeable.

在 <c2><a3>M</a3></c2> 及以下，如果 dither 为 true，解码器将尝试 dither 解码图像。
In <c2><a3>M</a3></c2> and below, if inPreferQualityOverSpeed is set to true, the decoder will try to decode the reconstructed image to a higher quality even at the expense of the decoding speed.
在 <c2><a3>M</a3></c2> 及以下，如果 inPreferQualityOverSpeed 设置为 true，则解码器将尝试将重构图像解码为更高质量，即使牺牲解码速度。
In <c2><a3>M</a3></c2> and below, if this can be called from another thread while this options object is inside a decode... call.
在 <c2><a3>M</a3></c2> 及其以下，如果可以从另一个线程调用此选项对象在 decode ...调用中时调用此选项。

在 Android Gradle Plugin 0.7 及更高版本中，你可以声明应用支持的配置。

In a chain of modules, other than at the VERBOSE level, when a lower-level module detects invalid data coming from a higher-level module, the lower-level module should only log this situation to the DEBUG log, and only if logging provides information that is not otherwise available to the caller.
在一个模块链中，除了 VERBOSE 级别之外，当较低级别的模块检测到来自较高级别模块的无效数据时，低级模块应该只在 DEBUG 日志中记录该情况，并且仅当该日志提供的信息对调用者来说无法获取时进行记录。

在冷启动时，你的应用程序从头开始。
In a hot start, all the system does is bring your activity to the foreground.
在热启动中，系统所做的就是把你的 activity 带到前台。
In a nutshell, this brings together a number of more atomic controls (or views) into a logical group of items that can be treated as a single thing.
简而言之，它把更多的原子的控件(或 view)组合在成一个有逻辑的项目组，你可以把它单独的东西来对待。

除了控制内容呈现方式的一些基本方法之外，它还提供了一种将输入事件分派给连接的 TvInputService 以便为 TV 输入启用自定义键操作的方法。

In figure 1, the layout looks good in the editor, but there's no vertical constraint on view C. When this layout draws on a device, view C horizontally aligns with the left and right edges of view A, but appears at the top of the screen because it has no vertical constraint.
在图 1，在布局编辑器上看起来不错，但是在 view C 上没有垂直约束。当这个布局在设备上绘制的时候，view C 与 view A 的左边缘和右边缘水平对齐，但它会出现在屏幕的顶部，因为它没有垂直约束。
In figure 2, with the quality set to 75%, there's almost no difference between the two images.
在图 2 中，质量设置为 75％，两个图像之间几乎没有差异。
In figure 4, the left side of the view is connected to the left edge of the parent layout.
在图 4，view 的左侧连接到父布局的左边缘。
In figure 5, B is constrained to always be to the right of A, and C is constrained below A. However, these constraints do not imply alignment, so B can still move up and down.
在图 5，B 被约束为总是在 A 的右边，并且 C 被约束在 A 的下面。然而，这些约束并不意味着对齐，所以 B 仍然可以上下移动。
In figure 6, the left side of B is aligned to the left side of A. If you want to align the view centers, create a constraint on both sides.
在图 6，B 的左侧与 A 的左侧对齐。如果你要对齐 view 的中心，请在两侧分别创建约束。

在图 8，B 的第一行与 A 中的文本对齐。

为了将多个按钮内聚在一起，MaterialButtonToggleGroup 会重写添加到此布局的任何子项的开始和结束边距，以便子项按钮直接相邻放置。

Invalid data coming from any untrusted source (including any file on shared storage, or data coming through just about any network connection) is considered expected and should not trigger any logging at a level higher than DEBUG when it's detected to be invalid (and even then logging should be as limited as possible).
来自任何不受信任来源(包括共享存储空间中的任何文件或通过任何网络连接获取的数据)的无效数据被视为符合预期，在被检测到无效时不应触发高于 DEBUG 级别的任何日志记录(甚至应该尽可能地限制日志记录)。

Invokes the context menu if the OnLongClickListener did not consume the event.

Issues that justify some logging at the ERROR level are typically good candidates to be reported to a statistics-gathering server.

Issues that justify some logging at the WARNING level might also be considered for reporting to a statistics-gathering server.

请注意，如果你自定义这些字符串，则你有责任提供适合格式化用户区域设置中的日期和/或时间的字符串。
Note that it is possible to add your own parameters as well, and we will touch on this again below.
注意，你也可以添加自己的参数，我们将在后面再讨论。
Note that just like with an Activity, you can use either the declarative (XML-based) approach to creating the contained components, or you can nest them programmatically from your code.
注意，就像 Activity 一样，你既可以用申明的方式来创建这种容器组件(基于 XML)，也可以在代码中用编程的方式嵌套它们。
Note that properties that are known at build time can be set in the XML layout files.
注意在构建时可知的属性可以设置到 XML 文件中。

Note that some flags must be set before the window decoration is created (by the first call to <c0><a1>setContentView(View, android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams)</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>getDecorView()</a3></c2>: <c4><a5>WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_LAYOUT_IN_SCREEN</a5></c4> and <c6><a7>WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_LAYOUT_INSET_DECOR</a7></c6>.

请注意，一些标志必须在创建窗口修饰之前设置（创建窗口可通过第一次调用 <c0><a1>setContentView(View, android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams)</a1></c0> 或 <c2><a3>getDecorView()</a3></c2>：<c4><a5>WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_LAYOUT_IN_SCREEN</a5></c4> 和 <c6><a7>WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_LAYOUT_INSET_DECOR</a7></c6>。
Note that some groups, for example <t1>(a*)</t1>, match the empty string.
注意，某些组，比如 <t1>(a*)</t1> 匹配空字符串。
Note that some patterns, for example <t0>a*</t0>, match the empty string.
注意，某些模式，比如 <t0>a*</t0> 匹配空字符串。
Note that span offsets always start with 0 and are not affected by RTL.
注意 span 偏移总是从 0 开始的，并且不受 RTL 影响。

Note that the array is not required to be homogeneous, so you can create an array of mixed resource types, but you must be aware of what and where the data types are in the array so that you can properly obtain each item with the <c2><a3>TypedArray</a3></c2>'s <c4>get...()</c4> methods.
请注意，数组不需要是同类的，因此你可以创建混合资源类型的数组，但是你必须知道数组中数据类型的位置和位置，以便你可以使用 <c2><a3>TypedArray</a3></c2> 的 <c4>get...()</c4> 方法正确获取每个项目。
Note that the output color space is not guaranteed to be the color space the bitmap is encoded with.
请注意，输出颜色空间不能保证是位图编码的颜色空间。
Note that the width and height are set to "wrap_content" to make the button fit neatly around the text.
注意宽度和高度是设置为了 "wrap_content" 以使按钮整齐地包围文字。

Note that this <e1>may</e1> contain characters that need to be escaped outside of CDATA sections and that, depending on the character encoding ("charset") chosen for serialization, it may be impossible to write out some characters as part of a CDATA section.
请注意，<e1>可能</e1> 包含需要在 CDATA 部分之外转义的字符，并且根据为序列化选择的字符编码("charset")，可能无法将某些字符写为 CDATA 部分的一部分。
Note that this container keeps its mappings in an array data structure, using a binary search to find keys.
注意，这个容器将其映射保存在一个数组数据结构中，使用二分搜索来查找键。
Note that this exception does not always indicate that an object has been concurrently modified by a <i0>different</i0> thread.
注意，此异常不会始终指出对象已经由 <i0>different</i0> 线程并发修改。
Note that this implementation is not intended to be appropriate for data structures that may contain large numbers of items.
请注意，此实现不适用于可能包含大量项的数据结构。

Note that this will be non-null slightly before <c0><a1>getActivity()</a1></c0>, during the time from when the fragment is placed in a <c2><a3>FragmentTransaction</a3></c2> until it is committed and attached to its activity.
注意：它将在 <c0><a1>getActivity()</a1></c0> 的稍之前是非空的，从 fragment 被放于 <c2><a3>FragmentTransaction</a3></c2> 中到它被提交并附加到它的 activity 之间这段时间。(译注：我也不知道啥意思)。

Note that unlike <a0>android.widget.ListView</a0>, RecyclerView will not call this method again if the position of the item changes in the data set unless the item itself is invalidated or the new position cannot be determined.
请注意，与 <a0>android.widget.ListView</a0> 不同，如果项在数据集中的位置发生更改，RecyclerView 将不会再次调用此方法，除非项本身无效或无法确定新位置。

Note that when all animations are created by <a0>RecyclerView.ItemAnimator</a0>, you should never receive this callback because RecyclerView keeps those Views as children until their animations are complete.
请注意，当所有动画都由 <a0>RecyclerView.ItemAnimator</a0> 创建时，你不应该收到此回调，因为 RecyclerView 将这些 view 保留为子 view，直到它们的动画完成为止。
Note that you also might introduce your own attributes and parameters into the XML that can be pulled out and used by your constructor.
注意，你也可以在 XML 文件中引入一些自己的属性和参数，然后在构造方法中取出来使用。
Note that you cannot have a circular dependency between the size of the RelativeLayout and the position of its children.
请注意，RelativeLayout 的大小与其子项的位置之间不能存在循环依赖关系。
Note that you cannot have a circular dependency in constraints.
请注意，你不能在约束中具有循环依赖关系。
Note that, Recycler never sends Views to this method to be cached.
请注意，Recycler 从不将 view 发送到此方法来进行缓存。
Note that, if you specify exact dimensions for the CardView, because of the shadows, its content area will be different between platforms before Lollipop and after Lollipop.
请注意，如果你为 CardView 指定精确尺寸，由于阴影，其内容区域在 Lollipop 之前和 Lollipop 之后的平台之间会有所不同。
Note the order: we must call endAnimation() after recycleViewHolderInternal() to avoid recycle twice.
注意顺序：我们必须在 recycleViewHolderInternal() 之后调用 endAnimation()，以避免回收两次。

Note, however, that some code conversion libraries at the time of writing do not return an error or exception when a character is missing from the encoding, making the task of ensuring that data is not corrupted on serialization more difficult.
但请注意，编写时某些代码转换库在编码中缺少某个字符时不会返回错误或异常，因此确保数据在序列化时不会损坏的任务更加困难。
Note, many examples use <c0><a1>ListActivity</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>ListFragment</a3></c2> to display a list view.
注意，许多示例使用 <c0><a1>ListActivity</a1></c0> 或 <c2><a3>ListFragment</a3></c2> 来显示列表 view。

Note: If this <c0>Source</c0> is passed to <c1><a2>decodeDrawable</a2></c1>, and the encoded image is animated, the returned <c3><a4>AnimatedImageDrawable</a4></c3> will continue reading from the <c5>buffer</c5>, so its contents must not be modified, even after the <c6>AnimatedImageDrawable</c6> is returned.
注意：如果将 <c0>Source</c0> 传递给 <c1><a2>decodeDrawable</a2></c1>，并对编码图像进行动画处理，则返回 <c3><a4>AnimatedImageDrawable</a4></c3> 将继续从 <c5>buffer</c5> 读取，因此即使在返回 <c6>AnimatedImageDrawable</c6> 之后也不得修改其内容。
Note: Styling must applied to each child button individually.
注意：样式必须单独应用于每个子按钮。
Note: The Android framework is responsible for measuring, laying out and drawing views.
注：安卓框架负责测量、布局和绘制 view。
Note: The Material Design Guidelines caution against using an <c0><a1>ExtendedFloatingActionButton</a1></c0> with a <c2><a3>BottomAppBar</a3></c2>, so there is limited support for that use case.
注意：“材料设计指南”提醒不要将 <c0><a1>ExtendedFloatingActionButton</a1></c0> 与 <c2><a3>BottomAppBar</a3></c2> 一起使用，因此对此的支持有限用例。
Note: The entire view tree is single threaded.
注意：整个 view 树是单线程的。
Note: as of <c2><a3>KITKAT</a3></c2>, any bitmap created with this configuration will be created using <c4><a5>ARGB_8888</a5></c4> instead.
注意：从 <c2><a3>KITKAT</a3></c2> 中，使用此配置创建的任何位图都将使用 <c4><a5>ARGB_8888</a5></c4> 创建。

Note: not all Formats support all bitmap configs directly, so it is possible that the returned bitmap from BitmapFactory could be in a different bitdepth, and/or may have lost per-pixel alpha (e.g. JPEG only supports opaque pixels).
注意：并非所有格式都直接支持所有位图配置，因此 BitmapFactory 返回的位图可能处于不同的位深度，并且/或者可能每像素阿尔法值丢失(例如 JPEG 仅支持不透明像素)。
Note: the decoder uses a final value based on powers of 2, any other value will be rounded down to the nearest power of 2.
注意：解码器使用基于 2 的幂的最终值，任何其他值将向下舍入到最接近的 2 的幂。
Notes:
注意事项：
Notice how the width and height of the button varies with the text, and the background image stretches to accommodate it.
注意不管按钮的宽高因文字如何变，变景图片总能缩放以适应它。
Notice how there are no actual permission names listed in the annotation.
注意没有实际的权限名称在注解中列出来。

Notice that the <c0>MyEditText</c0> class is now a separate class file.
注意此时的 <c0>MyEditText</c0> 类是一个独立的类文件。
Notice that the <c0>android:id</c0> value does not include the plus sign in the ID reference, because the ID already exists, as defined in the <c1>ids.xml</c1> example above.

Notice that the value refers to a <b2>subdirectory</b2>, not an individual file or files.

Notify any registered observers that the <c0>itemCount</c0> items previously located at <c1>positionStart</c1> have been removed from the data set.
通知所有注册的观察者先前位于 <c1>positionStart</c1> 的 <c0>itemCount</c0> 个项已从数据集中移除。

通知所有注册观察者 <c0>itemCount</c0> 个项，从 <c1>positionStart</c1> 已更改。

通知所有注册的观察者，从 <c1>positionStart</c1> 开始的当前反射的 <c0>itemCount</c0> 个项目已被新插入。
Notify any registered observers that the data set has changed.
通知所有注册的观察者数据集已更改。
Notify any registered observers that the item at <c0>position</c0> has changed with an optional payload object.
通知所有注册的观察者 <c0>position</c0> 处的项目已更改，带有可选的有效载荷对象。
Notify any registered observers that the item at <c0>position</c0> has changed.
通知所有注册观察者 <c0>position</c0> 处的项目已更改。
Notify any registered observers that the item previously located at <c0>position</c0> has been removed from the data set.
通知所有注册观察者先前位于 <c0>position</c0> 处的项目已从数据集中移除。
Notify any registered observers that the item reflected at <c0>fromPosition</c0> has been moved to <c1>toPosition</c1>.
通知所有注册观察者，<c0>fromPosition</c0> 反射的项目已移动到 <c1>toPosition</c1>。
Notify any registered observers that the item reflected at <c0>position</c0> has been newly inserted.
通知所有注册观察者 <c0>position</c0> 处反映的项目已被新插入。
Notify the scroller that we've reached a horizontal boundary.
通知滚动器我们已到达水平边界。
Notify the scroller that we've reached a vertical boundary.

Now that you have a well-designed view that responds to gestures and transitions between states, ensure that the view runs fast.
既然你有一个精心设计的 view 来响应手势和状态之间的转换，请确保 view 快速运行。
Now the entire size is dictated by the height of the view (which can be defined in any way) as shown in figure 11.
现在整个尺寸由 view 的高度(其可以以任何方式定义)来决定，如图 11 所示。
Now you're ready to build your layout with <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0>.
现在你已经准备好用 <c0>ConstraintLayout</c0> 来构建布局了。

通常，有机会优化这项工作以实现性能改进。
On a high density display, the default distance is 1920.
在高密度显示器上，默认距离为 1920。
Once completed, your new extension class can be used in place of the view upon which it was based.
一旦完成，你的新继承类就可以用来代替它的基类。
Once created, a matcher can be used to perform three different kinds of match operations:
创建匹配器后，可以使用它执行三种不同的匹配操作：
Once the app process has completed the first draw, the system process swaps out the currently displayed background window, replacing it with the main activity.
应用程序进程完成第一次绘制后，系统进程会交换当前显示的背景窗口，将其替换为主 activity。

Once the application supplies the URI for a specific TV channel to <c0><a1>tune(String, Uri)</a1></c0> method, it takes care of underlying service binding (and unbinding if the current TvView is already bound to a service) and automatically allocates/deallocates resources needed.
一旦应用程序将特定电视频道的 URI 提供给 <c0><a1>tune(String, Uri)</a1></c0> 方法，它就会处理底层服务绑定(如果当前的 TvView 已经绑定到一个服务，则解除绑定)并自动分配/释放所需的资源。
Once the scrolling view has reached the end of it's scroll range, the remainder of this view will be scrolled into view.
当滚动 view 到达滚动范围的末尾后，此 view 的其余部分将滚动到 view 中。
Once the width and height are calculated, the <c0>setMeasuredDimension(int width, int height)</c0> method must be called with the calculated measurements.
一旦计算出了宽度和高度，必须用计算的结果调用 <c0>setMeasuredDimension(int width, int height)</c0> 方法。

Once visible, the progress bar will be visible for a minimum amount of time to avoid "flashes" in the UI when an event could take a largely variable time to complete (from none, to a user perceivable amount)
一旦可见，进度条将在最短时间内可见，以避免在事件可能需要大量可变时间(从无到用户可感知的时间)完成时在用户界面中“闪烁”。
Once you define the custom attributes, you can use them in layout XML files just like built-in attributes.
定义自定义属性后，可以像布局属性一样在布局 XML 文件中使用它们。
Once you have created a tree of views, there are typically a few types of common operations you may wish to perform:
一旦你创建了一个 view 树，代表一些通用的操作你可能希望完成。
Once you have your object creation and measuring code defined, you can implement <c0><a1>onDraw()</a1></c0>.
一旦定义了对象创建和测量代码，就可以实现 <c0><a1>onDraw()</a1></c0>。

Once you've implemented <c17><a18>GestureDetector.OnGestureListener</a18></c17> and created an instance of <c19><a20>GestureDetector</a20></c19>, you can use your <c21><a22>GestureDetector</a22></c21> to interpret the touch events you receive in <c23><a24>onTouchEvent()</a24></c23>.

一旦实现了 <c17><a18>GestureDetector.OnGestureListener</a18></c17> 并创建了 <c19><a20>GestureDetector</a20></c19> 的实例，就可以使用 <c21><a22>GestureDetector</a22></c21> 解释你在 <c23><a24>onTouchEvent()</a24></c23> 中收到的触摸事件。
Once you’ve made the appropriate settings, you can easily search for the correct term to see the time.
完成适当的设置后，你可以轻松搜索正确的术语以查看时间。
One <c8>Source</c8> even used simultaneously in multiple threads.
一个 <c8>Source</c8> 甚至在多个线程中同时使用。

One common way is for the client app to start your app by calling <c0><a1>startActivityResult()</a1></c0>, which sends an <c2><a3>Intent</a3></c2> to your app to start an <c4><a5>Activity</a5></c4> in your app.
一种常见的方式是客户端应用程序通过调用 <c0><a1>startActivityResult()</a1></c0> 来启动你的应用程序，该程序发送 <c2><a3>Intent</a3></c2> 到你的应用程序，在你的应用程序中启动 <c4><a5>Activity</a5></c4> 。
One of the purposes of this class is to provide a surface in which a secondary thread can render into the screen.
此类的目的之一是提供一个 surface，其中辅助线程可以呈现到屏幕中。
One of the simple ways to make your APK smaller is to reduce the number and size of the resources it contains.
使 APK 更小的一种简单方法是减少其包含的资源的数量和大小。
One of your Play Store app URLs

打开文件描述符以读取原始资源。

Open navigation
Open your layout in Android Studio and click the <s0>Design</s0> tab at the bottom of the editor window.
在 Android Studio 打开你的布局，点击编辑窗口底部的 <s0>Design</s0> 标签。
Optional parameter, use null to identify a "full" update
可选参数，使用 null 标识“完全”更新
Optionally wraps, traces, and/or error-checks the renderer's OpenGL calls.

所回 true，如果 LayoutManager 绑定的 RecyclerView 拥有或包含焦点。

Scale the image uniformly (maintain the image's aspect ratio) so that both dimensions (width and height) of the image will be equal to or larger than the corresponding dimension of the view (minus padding).

Scrap views may be reused without becoming fully detached from the parent RecyclerView, either unmodified if no rebinding is required or modified by the adapter if the view was considered <e1>dirty</e1>.
Scrap views 可能会被重复使用，而不会完全脱离父 RecyclerView，在复用时，如果不需要重新绑定，则无需修改；如果 view 被认为是 <e1>dirty</e1> 的，则会被 adapter 修改。

SlidingDrawer can be used vertically or horizontally.
SlidingDrawer 可以垂直或水平使用。
SlidingDrawer hides content out of the screen and allows the user to drag a handle to bring the content on screen.
SlidingDrawer 将内容隐藏在屏幕外，并允许用户拖动句柄以将内容显示在屏幕上。
SlidingDrawer should be used as an overlay inside layouts.
SlidingDrawer 应该用作布局内的叠加层。
SlidingPaneLayout is distinct from a navigation drawer as described in the design guide and should not be used in the same scenarios.
SlidingPaneLayout 与设计指南中描述的导航抽屉不同，不应在相同的场景中使用。
SlidingPaneLayout provides a horizontal, multi-pane layout for use at the top level of a UI.
SlidingPaneLayout 提供了一个水平的多窗格布局，可以在 UI 的顶层使用。
SlidingPaneLayout should be thought of only as a way to allow a two-pane layout normally used on larger screens to adapt to smaller screens in a natural way.
SlidingPaneLayout 应该被认为只是一种允许通常在较大屏幕上使用的双窗格布局以自然方式适应较小屏幕的方法。
Smile: the compiler just made it easier for you to catch runtime problems in your code.
你应该微笑：因为编译器让你能够更加轻松地捕获代码中的运行时错误。

<c0>aapt</c0> 工具不会缩小 <c1>asset/</c1> 文件夹中包含的 PNG 文件。
The <c0>aapt</c0> tool may inflate PNG files that have already been compressed.
<c0>aapt</c0> 工具可能会放大已经压缩的 PNG 文件。
The <c0>finalize</c0> method is never invoked more than once by a Java virtual machine for any given object.
对于任何给定的对象，Java 虚拟机从不会多次调用 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法。
The <c0>finalize</c0> method of class <c1>Object</c1> performs no special action; it simply returns normally.
类 <c1>Object</c1> 的 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法不执行特殊操作;它只是正常返回。
The <c0>null</c0> resource ID.
<c0>null</c0> 资源 ID。
The <c0>onDraw()</c0> and <c1>onMeasure()</c1> methods (plus most of the other <c2>on...</c2> methods) will likely have suitable behavior so you don't have to override them.
<c0>onDraw()</c0> 和 <c1>onMeasure()</c1> 方法（加上其他的 <c2>on...</c2> 方法) 已经有合适的行为了，不需要重写它们。

The <c0>onDraw()</c0> method delivers you a <c1><a2>Canvas</a2></c1> upon which you can implement anything you want: 2D graphics, other standard or custom components, styled text, or anything else you can think of.
<c0>onDraw()</c0> 方法给你提供一个 <c1><a2>Canvas</a2></c1>，在其中你可以实现任何你想要的东西。2D 图形，其他标准或自定义的组件，带风格的文字，以及任何你想要的别的东西。
The <c0>pngcrush</c0> tool is particularly effective: This tool iterates over PNG filters and zlib (Deflate) parameters, using each combination of filters and parameters to compress the image.
<c0>pngcrush</c0> 工具特别有效：此工具使用过滤器和参数的每个组合来迭代 PNG 过滤器和 zlib(Deflate)参数以压缩图像。
The <c0>sampleSize</c0> is the number of pixels in either dimension that correspond to a single pixel in the output.
<c0>sampleSize</c0> 是任一维度中与输出中的单个像素对应的像素数。
The <c0>total</c0> time measurement begins at the app process start, and could include another activity that was started first but did not display anything to the screen.
<c0>total</c0> 时间量始于应用程序进程开始，可能包括另一个先启动但未向屏幕显示任何内容的 activity。
The <c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1> subclass is the base class for <e3>layouts</e3>, which are invisible containers that hold other Views (or other ViewGroups) and define their layout properties.
子类 <c1><a2>ViewGroup</a2></c1> 是 <e3>layouts</e3> 的基类，它是不可见的容器，持有其他 view(或其他 ViewGroup)并确定他们的布局特性。

The <c1>finalize</c1> method may take any action, including making this object available again to other threads; the usual purpose of <c2>finalize</c2>, however, is to perform cleanup actions before the object is irrevocably discarded.
<c1>finalize</c1> 方法可以采取任何操作，包括使该对象再次可用于其他线程;然而，<c2>finalize</c2> 的通常目的是在对象被不可撤销地丢弃之前执行清理操作。
The <c1>total</c1> time measurement is only shown when there is a difference between the single activity and total startup times.
仅当单个 activity 与总启动时间之间存在差异时，才会显示 <c1>total</c1> 时间量。
The <c2><a3>MaterialButton</a3></c2>s in this group will be shown on a single line.
此组中的 <c2><a3>MaterialButton</a3></c2> 将显示在一行中。
The <c2><a3>SurfaceTexture</a3></c2> can then be used to render content.
然后可以使用 <c2><a3>SurfaceTexture</a3></c2> 来呈现内容。
The <c2><color></c2> element's <c3>name</c3> will be used as the resource ID.
<c2><color></c2> 元素的 <c3>name</c3> 将用作资源 ID。
The <c2>PieChart</c2> example does this in a method called <c3>init</c3>, which is called from the constructor from Java, but we can initialise inline in Kotlin:
<c2>PieChart</c2> 示例在名为 <c3>init</c3> 的方法中执行此操作，该方法是从 Java 的构造函数中调用的，但我们可以在 Kotlin 中初始化内联：
The <c3><bool></c3> element's <c4>name</c4> will be used as the resource ID.
<c3><bool></c3> 元素的 <c4>name</c4> 将用作资源 ID。

The <c3>finalize</c3> method may take any action, including making this object available again to other threads; the usual purpose of <c4>finalize</c4>, however, is to perform cleanup actions before the object is irrevocably discarded.
<c3>finalize</c3> 方法可以采取任何操作，包括使该对象再次可用于其他线程;然而，<c4>finalize</c4> 的通常目的是在对象被不可撤销地丢弃之前执行清理操作。
The <c6><a7>Canvas</a7></c6> class defines methods for drawing text, lines, bitmaps, and many other graphics primitives.
<c6><a7>Canvas</a7></c6> 类定义了绘制文本，线条，位图和许多其他图形基元的方法。
The Android <a0>property animation framework</a0>, introduced in Android 3.0, makes smooth transitions easy.
Android 3.0 中引入的 <a0>property animation framework</a0> 使平滑过渡变得容易。
The Android SDK tools compile your application's resources into the application binary at build time.
Android SDK 工具在构建时将应用程序的资源编译为应用程序二进制文件。
The Android framework provides a set of base classes and XML tags to help you create a view that meets all of these requirements.
Android 框架提供了一组基类和 XML 标记，可帮助你创建满足所有这些要求的视图。
The Android resource compiler does a lot of work for you to make calling <c0><a1>obtainStyledAttributes()</a1></c0> easier.
Android 资源编译器为你做了很多工作，使你更容易调用 <c0><a1>obtainStyledAttributes()</a1></c0>。
The Android resource system keeps track of all non-code assets associated with an application.
Android 资源系统跟踪与应用程序关联的所有非代码资产。
The Basic Approach
基本的方法
The Bottom App Bar is an extension of Toolbar that supports a shaped background that "cradles" an attached <c0><a1>FloatingActionButton</a1></c0>.
底部应用栏是工具栏的扩展，支持形状背景“cradles”附加的 <c0><a1>FloatingActionButton</a1></c0>。
The Chip widget is a thin view wrapper around the <c0><a1>ChipDrawable</a1></c0>, which contains all of the layout and draw logic.
Chip 小部件是 <c0><a1>ChipDrawable</a1></c0> 的薄 view 包装器，它包含所有布局和绘制逻辑。
The Color class defines methods for creating and converting color ints.
Color 类定义了创建和转换颜色 int 的方法。
The CustomView sample in the <a0>API Demos</a0> provides an example of a customized View.
在 <a0>API Demos</a0> 中的 CustomView 的示例提供一个自定义 View 的示例。

The EditText is created with these parameters when it is inflated from an XML layout file, thus, our constructor needs to both take them and pass them to the superclass constructor as well.

The IME options to set on the query text field.
要在查询文本域上设置的 IME 选项。

Java 编程语言不能保证哪个线程将调用任何给定对象的 <c0>finalize</c0> 方法。
The LabelView sample demonstrates a number of different aspects of custom components:
该 LabelView 示例展示了几个自定义组件不同的方面：
The MediaController will create a default set of controls and put them in a window floating above your application.
MediaController 将创建一组默认控件，并将它们放在浮动应用程序上方的窗口中。
The Path class encapsulates compound (multiple contour) geometric paths consisting of straight line segments, quadratic curves, and cubic curves.
Path 类封装了由直线段，二次曲线和三次曲线组成的复合(多个轮廓)几何路径。
The PieChart example is a little different: it uses the current scroll y position to set the rotational angle of the chart.
饼图示例略有不同：它使用当前滚动 y 位置来设置图表的旋转角度。
The PieChart example shows how to extend <c2><a3>ViewGroup</a3></c2> as part of a custom view.
PieChart 示例显示如何将 <c2><a3>ViewGroup</a3></c2> 继承为自定义 view 的一部分。
The PieChart example uses the second approach.
PieChart 示例使用第二种方法。

The RecyclerView instance which started observing this adapter.

RecyclerView 当前正在被外部的输入（比如用户的触摸输入）拖动。

The Surface will be created for you while the SurfaceView's window is visible; you should implement <c0><a1>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceCreated</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceDestroyed</a3></c2> to discover when the Surface is created and destroyed as the window is shown and hidden.
当 SurfaceView 的窗口可见时，将为你创建 Surface;你应该实现 <c0><a1>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceCreated</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceDestroyed</a3></c2> 在窗口显示和隐藏时发现 Surface 的创建和销毁。
The SwipeRefreshLayout does not provide accessibility events; instead, a menu item must be provided to allow refresh of the content wherever this gesture is used.
SwipeRefreshLayout 不提供辅助功能事件；相反，必须提供菜单项以允许在使用该手势的任何地方刷新内容。
The SwipeRefreshLayout should be used whenever the user can refresh the contents of a view via a vertical swipe gesture.
只要用户可以通过垂直滑动手势刷新 view 的内容，就应该使用 SwipeRefreshLayout。

The SwipeRefreshLayout will notify the listener each and every time the gesture is completed again; the listener is responsible for correctly determining when to actually initiate a refresh of its content.
SwipeRefreshLayout 将在每次手势再次完成时通知监听器；监听器负责正确地确定何时实际启动其内容的刷新。
The TvView class provides a high level interface for applications to show TV programs from various TV sources that implement <c0><a1>TvInputService</a1></c0>.
TvView 类为应用程序提供高级接口，以显示实现 <c0><a1>TvInputService</a1></c0> 的各种电视源的电视节目。

The VideoView class can load images from various sources (such as resources or content providers), takes care of computing its measurement from the video so that it can be used in any layout manager, and provides various display options such as scaling and tinting.
VideoView 类可以从各种来源(例如资源或内容提供者)加载图像，负责从视频计算其测量值，以便可以在任何布局管理器中使用，并提供各种显示选项，如缩放和着色。
The View class exposes an <c0><a1>ALPHA</a1></c0> property, as well as several transform-related properties, such as <c2><a3>TRANSLATION_X</a3></c2> and <c4><a5>TRANSLATION_Y</a5></c4>.
View 类公开 <c0><a1>ALPHA</a1></c0> 及一些移动相关的属性，比如 <c2><a3>TRANSLATION_X</a3></c2> 、<c4><a5>TRANSLATION_Y</a5></c4> 等。
The View created by inflating the layout resource "mySubTree" can be found using the id "subTree," specified by the inflatedId property.
通过加载布局资源“mySubTree”创建的view可以使用由 inflatedId 属性指定的 id “subTree”找到。
The View will be displayed as a single row that spans all the table columns.
view 将显示为跨越所有表列的单行。
The ViewGroup into which the new View will be added after it is bound to an adapter position.

The ViewStub then replaces itself in its parent with the inflated View or Views.
然后，ViewStub 会在其父级中使用加载的 view 或 views 替换自身。
The ViewStub thus defined can be found using the id "stub." After inflation of the layout resource "mySubTree," the ViewStub is removed from its parent.
可以使用 id “stub”找到如此定义的 ViewStub。在布局资源“mySubTree”加载之后，ViewStub 将从其父级中移除。
The WebP format provides lossy compression (like JPEG) as well as transparency (like PNG) but can provide better compression than either JPEG or PNG.
WebP 格式提供有损压缩(如 JPEG)以及透明度(如 PNG)，但可以提供比 JPEG 或 PNG 更好的压缩。

The accessibility focus didn't handle the event, so clear the flag and do a normal dispatch to all children.
无障碍焦点无法处理该事件，因此请清除标志并对所有子项执行正常分派。
The action bar appears at the top of an activity's window when the activity uses the AppCompat's <c0><a1>AppCompat</a1></c0> theme (or one of its descendant themes).
当 activity 使用 AppCompat 的 <c0><a1>AppCompat</a1></c0> 主题(或其后代主题之一)时，操作栏将显示在 activity 窗口的顶部。

操作栏可以由应用程序布局中的任何工具栏部件(Toolbar widget)表示。

The adapter is responsible for removing the view from its container, although it only must ensure this is done by the time it returns from <c0><a1>finishUpdate(ViewGroup)</a1></c0>.
适配器负责从其容器中删除视图，尽管它只必须确保在从 <c0><a1>finishUpdate(ViewGroup)</a1></c0> 返回的时间完成此操作。

位图可以通过设置 tiling mode （平铺模式）来重复或镜像。

链的 '头部' view(水平链中最左侧的 view 和垂直链中最顶部的 view)在 XML 中定义为链的样式。

子项必须保证它和它的所有后代都适合这个尺寸。

The general contract of <c0>finalize</c0> is that it is invoked if and when the Java<f1><s2>TM</s2></f1> virtual machine has determined that there is no longer any means by which this object can be accessed by any thread that has not yet died, except as a result of an action taken by the finalization of some other object or class which is ready to be finalized.
<c0>finalize</c0> 的通用协议是它的执行时机为，如果 Java <f1><s2>TM</s2></f1> 虚拟机确定这个对象不再被任何尚未死亡的线程访问，除非是由于某个其他准备 finalize 的对象或类的准备而产生的动作的结果。

The general contract of <c0>finalize</c0> is that it is invoked if and when the Java™ virtual machine has determined that there is no longer any means by which this object can be accessed by any thread that has not yet died, except as a result of an action taken by the finalization of some other object or class which is ready to be finalized.
<c0>finalize</c0> 的通用协议是它的执行时机为，如果 Java™ 虚拟机确定这个对象不再被任何尚未死亡的线程访问，除非是由于某个其他准备 finalize 的对象或类的准备而产生的动作的结果。

The hash code of a primitive value <t0><i1>v</i1></t0> is equal to <t2><i3>WrapperType</i3>.valueOf(<i4>v</i4>).hashCode()</t2>, where <t5><i6>WrapperType</i6></t5> is the wrapper type corresponding to the primitive type of <t7><i8>v</i8></t7> (<c9><a10>Byte</a10></c9>, <c11><a12>Character</a12></c11>, <c13><a14>Double</a14></c13>, <c15><a16>Float</a16></c15>, <c17><a18>Integer</a18></c17>, <c19><a20>Long</a20></c19>, <c21><a22>Short</a22></c21>, or <c23><a24>Boolean</a24></c23>).

基本类型的哈希码 <t0><i1>v</i1></t0> 等于 <t2><i3>WrapperType</i3>.valueOf(<i4>v</i4>).hashCode()</t2> ， <t5><i6>WrapperType</i6></t5> 是基本类型 <t7><i8>v</i8></t7> 对应的包装类型 (<c9><a10>Byte</a10></c9>, <c11><a12>Character</a12></c11>, <c13><a14>Double</a14></c13>, <c15><a16>Float</a16></c15>, <c17><a18>Integer</a18></c17>, <c19><a20>Long</a20></c19>, <c21><a22>Short</a22></c21>, 或者 <c23><a24>Boolean</a24></c23>)。

The hash code of an annotation is the sum of the hash codes of its members (including those with default values), as defined below: The hash code of an annotation member is (127 times the hash code of the member-name as computed by <c0><a1>hashCode()</a1></c0>) XOR the hash code of the member-value, as defined below:
注解的哈希码是它的成员的哈希码之和（包括那些默认值）；注解的成员的哈希码是 (127 乘以成员名的哈希码，由 <c0><a1>hashCode()</a1></c0> 计算 )，再 XOR 成员值的哈希码；:
The head is the left-most widget for horizontal chains, and the top-most widget for vertical chains.
链头是水平链式最左边的部件，对于垂直链式是最顶部的部件。

child 的水平偏心将会影响打包后的元素的位

child 的水平或垂直偏差属性将影响包装后的元素的位置。
The horizontal orientation.

The id of the child radio button that should be checked by default within this radio group.

按钮表面上的图像由 <c3><ImageButton></c3> XML 元素中的 <c2>android:src</c2> 属性或 <c4><a5>ImageView.setImageResource(int)</a5></c4> 方法定义。

The implementation can inspect the <c0><a1>DecodeException</a1></c0> and optionally finish the rest of the decode creation process to create a partial <c2><a3>Drawable</a3></c2> or <c4><a5>Bitmap</a5></c4>.

The implementation is not intended to be appropriate for data structures that may contain large numbers of items.

The implementation should report how any pixels of the scroll reported by dx, dy were consumed in the <c3>consumed</c3> array.
该实现应该在 <c3>consumed</c3> 数组报告滚动消耗了多少像素，滚动由 dx，dy 报告。

匹配器的隐式状态包括输入字符序列和 <i0>append position</i0>，最初是零，然后由 <c1><a2>appendReplacement</a2></c1> 方法更新。
The imports people want to look at first tend to be at the top (<c0>android</c0>).
用户希望先看到的导入往往位于顶部(<c0>android</c0>)。
The imports people want to look at least tend to be at the bottom (<c0>java</c0>).

The increased level of file access security offered by a content URI makes FileProvider a key part of Android's security infrastructure.
由 content URI 提供的文件访问安全级别的提高使得 FileProvider 成为 Android 安全基础设施的关键部分。
The index of an attached child view as used in a call to <c1><a2>getChildAt(int)</a2></c1>.
已经附加的子 view 的索引，可用于调用 <c1><a2>getChildAt(int)</a2></c1> 时使用的参数。
The index of the first character captured by the group, or <t0>-1</t0> if the match was successful but the group itself did not match anything
组捕获的第一个字符的索引；如果匹配成功但组本身没有匹配项，则返回 <t0>-1</t0> 。
The index of the first character matched
返回匹配的初始索引。
The index of the horizontal keyline specified to the parent CoordinatorLayout that this child should align relative to.
指向此子项应相对的父 CoordinatorLayout 的水平 keyline 的索引。
The index of the span group including the item at the given adapter position
包含所给 adapter position 对应的 item 的 span group 的 index。
The individual elements are typically controlled using this container object, rather than setting values on the child elements themselves.
通常使用此容器对象控制各个元素，而不是在子元素本身上设置值。
The inflated View is added to the ViewStub's parent with the ViewStub's layout parameters.
使用 ViewStub 的布局参数将加载的 view 添加到 ViewStub 的父级。

加载的 view 最终被赋予 120dip 的宽度和 40dip 的高度。

初始水平滚动偏移，以像素为单位。
The initial vertical scroll offset, in pixels.
初始垂直滚动偏移，以像素为单位。
The input type to set on the query text field.
要在查询文本域上设置的输入类型。

SlidingPaneLayout 表示的交互模式意味着窗格之间的物理性和直接信息层次结构，而不一定存在于应该使用导航抽屉的场景中。
The item at <c1>position</c1> retains the same identity.
<c1>position</c1> 处的项保持相同的标识。
The item at <c1>position</c1> retains the same identity.</p2>
<c1>position</c1> 处的项保持相同的标识。</p2>

以前位于 <c1>position</c1> 的项目现在位于 <c2>position + 1</c2> 位置。

这些项目来自与此 view 关联的 <c2><a3>ExpandableListAdapter</a3></c2>。
The items in the Spinner come from the <c0><a1>Adapter</a1></c0> associated with this view.
Spinner 中的项目来自与此 view 关联的 <c0><a1>Adapter</a1></c0>。
The items in the given range retain the same identity.
给定范围内的项目保持相同的标识。
The items in the given range retain the same identity.</p0>
给定范围内的项目保持相同的标识。</p0>

The items previously located at <c2>positionStart</c2> and beyond can now be found starting at position <c3>positionStart + itemCount</c3>.
以前位于 <c2>positionStart</c2> 及以后的项目现在可以从 <c3>positionStart + itemCount</c3> 开始的位置找到。

以前位于 <c1>position</c1> 和之后的项目现在可以在 <c2>oldPosition - 1</c2> 找到。
The items previously located at and after <c2>positionStart + itemCount</c2> may now be found at <c3>oldPosition - itemCount</c3>.
以前位于 <c2>positionStart + itemCount</c2> 处和之后的项目现在可以在 <c3>oldPosition - itemCount</c3> 处找到。

The keys corresponding to indices in ascending order are guaranteed to be in ascending order, e.g., <c0>keyAt(0)</c0> will return the smallest key and <c1>keyAt(size()-1)</c1> will return the largest key.
与按升序排列的索引对应的键保证按升序排列，例如，<c0>keyAt(0)</c0> 将返回最小键，<c1>keyAt(size()-1)</c1> 将返回最大键。

<c0><a1>getContentInsetEnd()</a1></c0> 的值较大，在布局期间将使用此值。
The larger value of <c0><a1>getContentInsetStart()</a1></c0> and this value will be used during layout.
<c0><a1>getContentInsetStart()</a1></c0> 的值较大，布局过程中将使用此值。
The larger your view hierarchy, the more time the app takes to inflate it.
视图层次结构越大，应用程序对其进行加载的时间就越长。
The last element of the array represents the bottom of the stack, which is the least recent method invocation in the sequence.
数组的最后一个元素表示堆栈的底部，这是序列中最远的方法调用。
The last year (inclusive), for example "2010".
最后一年(含)，例如“2010”。

view 的左边。

The list will automatically scroll to the bottom when a data set change notification is received and only if the last item is already visible on screen.
当收到数据集更改通知时，列表将自动滚动到底部，并且仅当最后一个项目已在屏幕上可见时才会自动滚动到底部。

无论当前可见的项目如何，列表都将自动滚动到底部。
The list year's selected circle color in the list.
列表中列表年份的选定圆圈颜色。

The logcat output sometimes includes a <c0>total</c0> time, as discussed in <a1>Time to initial display</a1>.

组合两个路径时​​可以执行的逻辑操作。
The logo cannot be clicked.
无法点击 logo。

The main purpose of this method is to indicate that you believe a method can be called from any thread; static tools can then check that nothing you call from within this method or class have more strict threading requirements.
此方法的主要目的是表明你相信可以从任何线程调用方法；静态工具可以检查在该方法或类中调用的任何线程都没有更严格的线程需求。

The name of the parent class is an homage to the work of Thomas Porter and Tom Duff, presented in their seminal 1984 paper titled "Compositing Digital Images".
父类的名字是对 Thomas Porter 和 Tom Duff 的工作的致敬，他们在 1984 年发表的题为 "合成数字图像" 的开创性论文中作了介绍。

按照惯例，styleable 实体的名称与定义自定义 view 的类的名称相同。

导航按钮出现在工具栏的开头(如果存在)。

如果设置，导航按钮在工具栏的最小高度内垂直对齐。
The new ViewHolder will be used to display items of the adapter using <a0>#onBindViewHolder(ViewHolder, int, List)</a0>.

此匹配器模式中的捕获组数

The number of stars (or rating items) to show.
要显示的星数(或评级项)。

The only difference is that your custom attributes belong to a different namespace.
唯一的区别是你的自定义属性属于不同的命名空间。

The only situations that should trigger logging at the INFORMATIVE level or higher is when a module or application detects an error at its own level or coming from a lower level.
应该触发 INFORMATIVE 级别或更高级别日志记录的唯一情况是，模块或应用在其自身级别或更低级别检测到错误。

import 语句的顺序为：
The orientation property is not used during layout.
布局期间不使用 orientation 属性。

The output will always be high quality.

The overridden <c0>onMeasure()</c0> method is called with width and height measure specifications (<c1>widthMeasureSpec</c1> and <c2>heightMeasureSpec</c2> parameters, both are integer codes representing dimensions) which should be treated as requirements for the restrictions on the width and height measurements you should produce.
重写的 <c0>onMeasure()</c0> 方法调用时会传递宽高的测量规格。(<c1>widthMeasureSpec</c1> 和 <c2>heightMeasureSpec</c2> 参数，两者都是整型表示的尺寸)，宽高的测量规格应该被视为你计算的宽高测量结果的限制。
The packaging tool extracts this XML content, compiles it to binary form, and archives the content.
打包工具提取此 XML 内容，将其编译为二进制形式，并归档内容。
The padding is expressed in pixels for the left, top, right and bottom parts of the view.

The surface is Z ordered so that it is behind the window holding its SurfaceView; the SurfaceView punches a hole in its window to allow its surface to be displayed.
surface 是 Z 有序的，因此它位于窗口后面，保持着 SurfaceView; SurfaceView 在其窗口中打孔以允许其 surface 显示。
The system evicts your app from memory, and then the user re-launches it.

使 surface 可见的透明区域基于 view 层次结构中的布局位置。
The tree is largely recorded and drawn in order, with parents drawn before (i.e., behind) their children, with siblings drawn in the order they appear in the tree.

用户可以触摸 thumb 并向左或向右拖动以设置当前进度级别或使用箭头键。

使用默认大小 RatingBar 时，用户可以触摸/拖动或使用箭头键设置评级。

通常需要从某种类型的的 Layout 开始，所以创建一个继承 Layout 的类。
The value always begins with a pound (#) character and then followed by the Alpha-Red-Green-Blue information in one of the following formats:
值始终以井号(#)开头，然后是以下列格式之一的 Alpha-Red-Green-Blue 信息：

通过垂直投掷来更改该值。
The value you set affects both horizontal and vertical alignment of all child views within the single row or column.
你设置的值会影响单个行或列中所有子 view 的水平和垂直对齐方式。
The values are unpremultiplied, meaning any transparency is stored solely in the alpha component, and not in the color components.
这些值没有预乘，这意味着任何透明度都仅存储在 alpha 组件中，而不是存储在颜色组件中。

The values corresponding to indices in ascending order are guaranteed to be associated with keys in ascending order, e.g., <c0>valueAt(0)</c0> will return the value associated with the smallest key and <c1>valueAt(size()-1)</c1> will return the value associated with the largest key.
升序索引对应的值保证与升序键关联，例如，<c0>valueAt(0)</c0> 将返回与最小键关联的值，<c1>valueAt(size()-1)</c1> 将返回与最大键关联的值。
The vertical bias attribute of the child will then affect the positioning of the packed elements
child 的垂直偏心属性将会影响打包后的元素的定位。
The vertical orientation.
垂直方向。
The view drawing cache was largely made obsolete with the introduction of hardware-accelerated rendering in API 11.
随着 API 11 中硬件加速渲染的引入，view 绘制缓存在很大程度上已经过时。
The view handles the event and notifies any listeners.
该 view 处理事件并通知任意的（译注：所有的）监听器。
