We may do a double iteration but this is safer given the timeframe.
我们可以做两次迭代，但考虑到时间范围，这样做更安全。
We now have our custom component, but how can we use it?
我们现在有自己的自定义组件了，怎么使用呢？We now have our custom component, but how can we use it?
We present global style rules here so people know the vocabulary, but local style is also important.
我们在此提出整体样式规则，让用户都知道这一词汇表，但局部样式也很重要。
We recognize that long methods are sometimes appropriate, so no hard limit is placed on method length.
我们了解，有些情况下较长的方法是恰当的，因此对方法的代码长度没有做出硬性限制。
We recognize that not all existing code follows these rules, but we expect all new code to be compliant.
我们知道，并非所有的现有代码都遵守了这些规则，但我们希望所有新代码都能遵守这些规则。
We recommend that every app include at least an <c1>xxhdpi</c1> image variant.
我们建议每个应用至少包含一个 <c1>xxhdpi</c1> 图像变体。
We recommend that you always optimize based on an assumption of a cold start.
我们建议你始终根据冷启动的假设进行优化。
We recommend that, rather than disabling the preview window, you follow the common <a0> Material Design</a0> patterns.
我们建议你不要禁用预览窗口，而是遵循常见的 <a0> Material Design</a0> 模式。
We recommend you start with <c0><a1>ListAdapter</a1></c0>, the higher-level API that builds in <c2><a3>List</a3></c2> diffing on a background thread, with minimal code.
我们建议你从 <c0><a1>ListAdapter</a1></c0> 开始，这是在后台线程上以 <c2><a3>List</a3></c2> 构建的更高级别的 API，用最少的代码。
We recommend, however, that you reuse the same set of resources, customizing them as needed at runtime.
但是，我们建议你重用同一组资源，并在运行时根据需要自定义它们。
We require braces around the statements for a conditional.
我们需要在条件语句周围添加大括号。
We still need to call this method to handle the cases where performClick() was called externally, instead of through performClickInternal()
我们仍然需要调用此方法来处理外部调用 performClick() 而不是通过 performClickInternal() 调用 performClick() 的情况
We use eight (8) space indents for line wraps, including function calls and assignments.
我们使用八 (8) 个空格来缩进自动换行，包括函数调用和赋值。
We use four (4) space indents for blocks and never tabs.
我们使用四 (4) 个空格来缩进块，而不要使用制表符。
We will add a 'dummy view' to the Toolbar which allows us to work out the available space for the title.
我们将在工具栏中添加一个“虚拟 view”，以便我们计算出标题的可用空间。
Wear
Wear
WebView objects allow you to display web content as part of your activity layout, but lack some of the features of fully-developed browsers.
WebView 对象允许你将 Web 内容显示为 activity 布局的一部分，但缺少完全开发的浏览器的一些功能。

Weight on a pane that becomes covered indicates that the pane should be sized to fill all available space except a small minimum strip that the user may use to grab the slideable view and pull it back over into a closed state.
被覆盖的窗格上的权重表示窗格的大小应该填充所有可用空间，除了用户可以用来抓住可滑动 view 并将其拉回到关闭状态的小的最小条带。
Weighted chain -- in <c0>CHAIN_SPREAD</c0> mode, if some widgets are set to <c1>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c1>, they will split the available space
加权链 -- 在 <c0>CHAIN_SPREAD</c0> 模式下，如果一些部件设置为 <c1>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c1> 它们将拆分可用的空间
Weighted chains
加权链
Well-written custom views can also be added and styled via XML.
编写良好的自定义 view 也可以通过 XML 添加和设置样式。
What happens in this case is that the constraints act like opposite forces pulling the widget apart equally (Fig. 4); such that the widget will end up being centered in the parent container.
在这种情况下发生的是，约束就像是从两边用相反的力拉小部件(图 4)，所以最终使得小部在父容器中居中。
When <a0>Recycler#getViewForPosition(int)</a0> is called, Recycler checks attached scrap and first level cache to find a matching View.
当调用 <a0>Recycler#getViewForPosition(int)</a0> 时，Recycler 会检查附加的废料和一级缓存以找到匹配的 view。
When <c0><a1>inflate()</a1></c0> is invoked, the ViewStub is replaced by the inflated View and the inflated View is returned.
当调用 <c0><a1>inflate()</a1></c0> 时，ViewStub 将由加载的 View 替换，并返回加载的 View。
When a @SuppressWarnings annotation is necessary, it must be prefixed with a TODO comment that explains the "impossible to eliminate" condition.
当需要 @SuppressWarnings 注释时，必须在前面添加一个 TODO 备注，用于说明 "无法消除" 情况。
When a @SuppressWarnings annotation is required, the code should be refactored to isolate the software elements where the annotation applies.
当需要 @SuppressWarnings 注释时，你应该重构代码以分离出需要使用该注释的软件元素。
When a ViewGroup is passed a View whose layout params do not pass the test of <c0><a1>checkLayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams)</a1></c0>, this method is invoked.
当 ViewGroup 传递一个 View，其布局参数不通过 <c0><a1>checkLayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams)</a1></c0> 的测试时，将调用此方法。
When a ViewStub is made visible, or when <c0><a1>inflate()</a1></c0> is invoked, the layout resource is inflated.
当让 ViewStub 可见时，或者调用 <c0><a1>inflate()</a1></c0> 时，布局资源会加载。

When a condition that would normally justify some logging is likely to occur many times, it can be a good idea to implement some rate-limiting mechanism to prevent overflowing the logs with many duplicate copies of the same (or very similar) information.
当事实证明某些日志记录可能会发生多次时，最好实施一种频率限制机制来防止出现具有相同(或非常相似)信息的大量重复日志副本。
When a linear layout is part of another layout that is baseline aligned, it can specify which of its children to baseline align to (that is, which child TextView).
当线性布局是基线对齐的另一个布局的一部分时，它可以指定要与哪个子 view 的基线对齐(即，哪个子 TextView)。
When a user downloads your app, their device receives the correct APK based on the device's features and settings.
当用户下载你的应用时，他们的设备会根据设备的功能和设置收到正确的 APK。
When a user is navigating a user interface via directional keys such as a D-pad, it is necessary to give focus to actionable items such as buttons so the user can see what will take input.
当一个用户使用方向型按键，如 D-pad，操作用户界面时，很必要给可控的项目焦点，如按钮，这样用户才能看到哪一个将获取输入。
When a view is created from an XML layout, all of the attributes in the XML tag are read from the resource bundle and passed into the view's constructor as an <c0><a1>AttributeSet</a1></c0>.
从 XML 布局创建 view 时，XML 标记中的所有属性都从资源包中读取，并作为 <c0><a1>AttributeSet</a1></c0> 传递到 view 的构造函数中。
When a view's measure() method returns, its <c0><a1>getMeasuredWidth()</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>getMeasuredHeight()</a3></c2> values must be set, along with those for all of that view's descendants.
当一个 view 的 measure() 方法返回，它的 <c0><a1>getMeasuredWidth()</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>getMeasuredHeight()</a3></c2> 值必须要设置，其所有子 view 的值也要设置。
When an Xfermode is assigned to an Paint, then objects drawn with that paint have the xfermode applied.
将 Xfermode 分配给 Paint 时，使用该 Paint 绘制的对象将应用 xfermode。
When an animation is started, the framework will take care of redrawing the appropriate views until the animation completes.
当开始一个动画时，框架负责绘制合适的 view 直到动画完成。

When building the release version of your app, package uncompressed <c0>.so</c0> files in the APK by setting <c1>android:extractNativeLibs="false"</c1> in the <a2><c3><application></c3></a2> element of your app's manifest.
在构建应用程序的发布版本时，通过在 app 的 manifest 的 <a2><c3><application></c3></a2> 元素中设置 <c1>android:extractNativeLibs="false"</c1> 来打包未压缩的 <c0>.so</c0> 文件。
When caching is disabled, default implementation traverses all items from 0 to <c2>position</c2>.
当缓存不可用时，默认的实现将从 0 到 <c2>position</c2> 遍历所有的 item。
When caching is enabled, it calculates from the closest cached value before the <c3>position</c3>.
当缓存可用时，它从 <c3>position</c3> 之前最近的缓存的值开始计算。
When creating constraints, remember the following rules:
创建约束时，请记住以下规则：
When creating new components however, never use deprecated libraries.
不过，在创建新组件时，请不要再使用已弃用的库。
When decorating a method call parameter, this denotes that the parameter can legitimately be null and the method will gracefully deal with it.
在修饰方法调用参数时，指示该参数可以合理地为 null ，该方法将优雅地处理它。
When decorating a method, this denotes the method might legitimately return null.
在修饰一个方法时，指示该方法可以合理地返回 null 。
When developing an Android app, you usually use external libraries to improve your app's usability and versatility.
在开发 Android 应用程序时，通常使用外部库来提高应用程序的可用性和多功能性。
When enabled, the framework will discard touches that are received whenever the view's window is obscured by another visible window.
启用后，只要 view 的窗口被另一个可见窗口遮挡，框架就会丢弃接收到的触摸。
When entering (scrolling on screen) the view will scroll on any downwards scroll event, regardless of whether the scrolling view is also scrolling.
当进入(滚入屏幕)时，无论滚动 view 是否也在滚动，view 都将基于任何向下的滚动事件而滚动。
When exiting (scrolling off screen) the view will be scrolled until it is 'collapsed'.
退出(滚出屏幕)时，view 将滚动直到“折叠”。
When feasible, keep methods small and focused.
在可行的情况下，尽量编写短小精炼的方法。
When in doubt, be consistent with the surrounding code.
如果你有疑问，请与周围的代码保持一致。

When in touch mode (see notes below) views indicate whether they still would like focus via <c4><a5>isFocusableInTouchMode()</a5></c4> and can change this via <c6><a7>setFocusableInTouchMode(boolean)</a7></c6>.
当在触摸模式时（见下文），view 通过 <c4><a5>isFocusableInTouchMode()</a5></c4> 指明是否想获取焦点，并通过 <c6><a7>setFocusableInTouchMode(boolean)</a7></c6> 设置是否想要获取焦点。

When java-style was asked, the preferred styles varied wildly and it came down to Android needing to simply "pick an ordering and be consistent." So we chose a style, updated the style guide, and made the IDEs obey it.
当提及 Java 样式时，开发者们喜欢的样式五花八门，最终针对 Android 简单归结为 "选择一种兼容一致的排序方式"。因此我们选择了一种样式，更新了样式指南，并让 IDE 遵循该指南。
When pages are not visible to the user, their entire fragment may be destroyed, only keeping the saved state of that fragment.
当页面对用户不可见时，它们的整个 fragment 可能被 destroy，只保留该 fragment 的保存状态。
When placing this in a view hierarchy, after inflating the hierarchy you must call <c2><a3>setup(Context, FragmentManager, int)</a3></c2> to complete the initialization of the tab host.
将此放置在 view 层次结构中时，在对层次结构进行加载后，必须调用 <c2><a3>setup(Context, FragmentManager, int)</a3></c2> 以完成 tab host 的初始化。
When possible, logging should be kept on a single line if it makes sense.
在内容有意义的情况下尽可能使日志记录在一行之内。
When rendered in software, TextureView will draw nothing.
在软件中渲染时，TextureView 不会绘制任何内容。
When rotating large views, it is recommended to adjust the camera distance accordingly.
当旋转大 view 时，建议相应地调整相机距离。
When running on Android 3.0 or above, this implementation is still used; it does not try to switch to the framework's implementation.
当运行在 Android 3.0 及以上时，该实现仍然可用，它不会试图切换到框架的实现。
When running on a higher density screen, the number of pixels used to draw 1dp is scaled up by a factor appropriate for the screen's dpi.
在更高密度的屏幕上运行时，用于绘制 1dp 的像素数按照适合屏幕 dpi 的系数放大。
When scroll state is changed to <c0><a1>SCROLL_STATE_IDLE</a1></c0>, StaggeredGrid will check if there are gaps in the because of full span items.
当滚动状态改变为 <c0><a1>SCROLL_STATE_IDLE</a1></c0> 时 StaggeredGrid 将检查是否有由于 full span item 造成间隙。
When set to alignMargins, causes alignment to take place between the outer boundary of a view, as defined by its margins.
设置为 alignMargins 时，会导致在 view 的外边界之间进行对齐，如边距所定义。
When set to false, prevents the layout from aligning its children's baselines.
设置为 false 时，阻止布局对齐其子项的基线。
When set to false, the ListView will not draw the divider after each header view.
设置为 false 时，ListView 将不会在每个 header view 后绘制分隔符。
When set to false, the ListView will not draw the divider before each footer view.
设置为 false 时，ListView 不会在每个 footer view 之前绘制分隔符。
When set to true, all children with a weight will be considered having the minimum size of the largest child.
设置为 true 时，所有具有 weight 的子 view 将被视为具有最大 weight 的子 view 的最小尺寸。
When set to true, forces column boundaries to appear in the same order as column indices.
设置为 true 时，强制列边界以与列索引相同的顺序显示。
When set to true, forces row boundaries to appear in the same order as row indices.
设置为 true 时，强制行边界以与行索引相同的顺序显示。
When set to true, tells GridLayout to use default margins when none are specified in a view's layout parameters.
设置为 true 时，告诉 GridLayout 在 view 的布局参数中未指定任何边距时使用默认边距。
When set to true, the list uses a drawing cache during scrolling.
设置为 true 时，列表在滚动期间使用绘制缓存。
When set to true, the list will filter results as the user types.
设置为 true 时，列表将按用户键入过滤结果。
When set to true, the list will use a more refined calculation method based on the pixels height of the items visible on screen.
设置为 true 时，列表将根据屏幕上可见项目的像素高度使用更精确的计算方法。
When set to true, the selector will be drawn over the selected item.
设置为 true 时，将在所选项目上绘制选择器。

When setting the attribute <c0>layout_constraintHorizontal_chainStyle</c0> or <c1>layout_constraintVertical_chainStyle</c1> on the first element of a chain, the behavior of the chain will change according to the specified style (default is <c2>CHAIN_SPREAD</c2>).
当在链的第一个元素上设置 <c0>layout_constraintHorizontal_chainStyle</c0> 或 <c1>layout_constraintVertical_chainStyle</c1> 属性时，链的行为将会根据指定的样式(默认是 <c2>CHAIN_SPREAD</c2>)变化。
When several radio buttons live inside a radio group, checking one radio button unchecks all the others.
当多个单选按钮位于一个单选组中时，选中一个单选按钮将取消选中所有其他按钮。

When specified on a parameter, the annotation indicates that the method requires a permission which depends on the value of the parameter (and typically the corresponding field passed in will be one of a set of constants which have been annotated with a <c0>@RequiresPermission</c0> annotation.)
当指示于一个参数时，该注解指示该方法需要的权限取决于参数的值。(通常所传递的相应字段将是使用 <c0>@RequiresPermission</c0> 注解的一组常量。)
When specified on a parameter, the annotation indicates that the method requires a permission which depends on the value of the parameter.
当指示于一个参数时，该注解指示该方法需要的权限取决于参数的值。
When system bars are hidden in immersive mode, they can be revealed temporarily with system gestures, such as swiping from the top of the screen.
当系统条隐藏在沉浸式模式中时，可以使用系统手势暂时显示它们，例如从屏幕顶部滑动。

When the <c0><a1>R.styleable.DatePicker_datePickerMode</a1></c0> attribute is set to <c2>calendar</c2>, the month and day can be selected using a calendar-style view while the year can be selected separately using a list.
当 <c0><a1>R.styleable.DatePicker_datePickerMode</a1></c0> 属性设置为 <c2>calendar</c2> 时，可以使用日历样式 view 选择月和日，可以使用列表单独选择年。

When the <c0><a1>R.styleable.DatePicker_datePickerMode</a1></c0> attribute is set to <c2>spinner</c2>, the date can be selected using year, month, and day spinners or a <c3><a4>CalendarView</a4></c3>.
当 <c0><a1>R.styleable.DatePicker_datePickerMode</a1></c0> 属性设置为 <c2>spinner</c2> 时，可以使用年，月，日旋转器或 <c3><a4>CalendarView</a4></c3>。

When the <c0><a1>android:theme</a1></c0> attribute is used in XML, the specified theme is applied on top of the inflation context's theme (see <c2><a3>LayoutInflater</a3></c2>) and used for the view itself as well as any child elements.
当在 XML 文件中使用 <c0><a1>android:theme</a1></c0> 属性时，所指明的主题应用于加载的 context 的主题之上(见 <c2><a3>LayoutInflater</a3></c2>)，并且用于 view 自身及其所有子元素。

When the <c10><a11>GridLayout#setUseDefaultMargins(boolean)</a11></c10> property is set, default margins around children are automatically allocated based on the prevailing UI style guide for the platform.
设置 <c10><a11>GridLayout#setUseDefaultMargins(boolean)</a11></c10> 属性后，将根据平台的主流 UI 样式指南自动分配子项周围的默认边距。
When the <c3>lint</c3> tool discovers a potentially unused resource in your project, it prints a message like the following example.
当 <c3>lint</c3> 工具发现项目中可能未使用的资源时，它会输出类似以下示例的消息。
When the SearchView is used in an <c0><a1>ActionBar</a1></c0> as an action view, it's collapsed by default, so you must provide an icon for the action.
当 SearchView 在 <c0><a1>ActionBar</a1></c0> 中用作操作 view 时，默认情况下会将其折叠，因此你必须为操作提供图标。
When the SearchView is used in an ActionBar as an action view for a collapsible menu item, it needs to be set to iconified by default using <c0><a1>setIconifiedByDefault(true)</a1></c0>.
当 SearchView 在 ActionBar 中用作可折叠菜单项的操作 view 时，需要使用 <c0><a1>setIconifiedByDefault(true)</a1></c0> 将其设置为图标化。
When the bugs are fixed in the support library you can remove these color definitions.
当错误在支持库中修复时，你可以移除这些颜色定义。
When the button is pressed or clicked, the state changes automatically.
按下或单击按钮时，状态会自动更改。
When the class is nested in the <c1>NoteEditor</c1> class, this technique will not work.
当这个类嵌套在 <c1>NoteEditor</c1> 类中时，这个技巧将无效。
When the compiler complains you're not catching an exception, don't scowl.
当编译器抱怨你没有捕获异常时，别闷闷不乐！。
When the id of another view is set on a placeholder (using <c0>setContent()</c0>), the placeholder effectively becomes the content view.
当在占位符上设置另一个 view 的 id 时(使用 <c0>setContent()</c0>)，占位符实际上成为内容 view。
When the mode is applied, it will be given the result from shader A as its "dst", and the result from shader B as its "src".
在应用模式时，将会将着色器 A 的结果作为其 "dst"，并将着色器 B 的结果作为其 "src"。
When the nested scroll is finished this ViewParent will receive a call to <c0><a1>onStopNestedScroll(View)</a1></c0>.
嵌套滚动完成后，此 ViewParent 将接收对 <c0><a1>onStopNestedScroll(View)</a1></c0> 的调用。
When the principle of flexibility does not provide complete disambiguation, GridLayout's algorithms favour rows and columns that are closer to its <e0>right</e0> and <e1>bottom</e1> edges.
当灵活性原则不能提供完全消歧时，GridLayout 的算法更倾向于更靠近 <e0>right (右)</e0> 和 <e1>bottom (底部)</e1> 边缘的行和列。
When the radio button is unchecked, the user can press or click it to check it.
当单选按钮未选中时，用户可以按或单击来选中它。
When the stack finishes, the permissions are automatically removed.
堆栈完成后，权限将自动删除。
When the user selects a tab, this object sends a message to the parent container, TabHost, to tell it to switch the displayed page.
当用户选择一个选项卡时，该对象会向父容器 TabHost 发送一条消息，告诉它切换显示的页面。
When this attribute is set to true, the view gets its drawable state (focused, pressed, etc.) from its direct parent rather than from itself.
当此属性设置为 true 时，view 将从其直接父级而不是从其自身获取其 drawable 状态(聚焦，按下等)。

When this flag is enabled for a window, it automatically sets the system UI visibility flags <c0><a1>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_STABLE</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_FULLSCREEN</a3></c2>.
为窗口启用此标志后，它会自动设置系统 UI 可见性标志 <c0><a1>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_STABLE</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_FULLSCREEN</a3></c2>。

When this flag is set, if <c0><a1>inDensity</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>inTargetDensity</a3></c2> are not 0, the bitmap will be scaled to match <c4><a5>inTargetDensity</a5></c4> when loaded, rather than relying on the graphics system scaling it each time it is drawn to a Canvas.
设置此标志时，如果 <c0><a1>inDensity</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>inTargetDensity</a3></c2> 不为 0，则会缩放位图以匹配 <c4><a5>inTargetDensity</a5></c4> 加载时，而不是依赖图形系统每次将其绘制到 Canvas 时缩放它。
When this flag is used with <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL</a1></c0>, the drag recipient will be able to request read access to the content URI(s) contained in the <c2><a3>ClipData</a3></c2> object.
当此标志与 <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL</a1></c0> 一起使用时，拖动收件人将能够请求对 <c2><a3>ClipData</a3></c2> 对象中包含的内容 URI 的读访问权限。
When this flag is used with <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL</a1></c0>, the drag recipient will be able to request write access to the content URI(s) contained in the <c2><a3>ClipData</a3></c2> object.
当此标志与 <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL</a1></c0> 一起使用时，拖动收件人将能够请求对 <c2><a3>ClipData</a3></c2> 对象中包含的内容 URI 的写访问权限。

When this flag is used with <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_READ</a1></c0> and/or <c2><a3>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_WRITE</a3></c2>, the URI permission grant applies to any URI that is a prefix match against the original granted URI.
当此标志与 <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_READ</a1></c0> 和/或 <c2><a3>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_WRITE</a3></c2> 一起使用时，URI 权限授予适用于任何 URI 与原始授权 URI 匹配的前缀。

When this flag is used with <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_READ</a1></c0> and/or <c2><a3>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_WRITE</a3></c2>, the URI permission grant can be persisted across device reboots until explicitly revoked with <c4><a5>Context.revokeUriPermission(Uri, int)</a5></c4> Context.revokeUriPermission}.

当此标志与 <c0><a1>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_READ</a1></c0> 和/或 <c2><a3>DRAG_FLAG_GLOBAL_URI_WRITE</a3></c2> 一起使用时，URI 权限授权可以在设备重新启动后保留直到用 <c4><a5>Context.revokeUriPermission(Uri, int)</a5></c4> Context.revokeUriPermission} 显式撤销。
When this happens, both this flag and <c0><a1>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a1></c0> will be cleared automatically, so that both elements reappear at the same time.
发生这种情况时，此标志和 <c0><a1>SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN</a1></c0> 将自动清除，以便两个元素同时重新出现。

When this is combined with incompatible options, like <c0><a1>setMutableRequired(true)</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>setDecodeAsAlphaMaskEnabled(true)</a3></c2>, <c4><a5>decodeDrawable</a5></c4> or <c6><a7>decodeBitmap</a7></c6> will throw an <c8><a9>IllegalStateException</a9></c8>.

当这与不兼容的选项结合使用时，例如 <c0><a1>setMutableRequired(true)</a1></c0> 或 <c2><a3>setDecodeAsAlphaMaskEnabled(true)</a3></c2>，<c4><a5>decodeDrawable</a5></c4> 或 <c6><a7>decodeBitmap</a7></c6> 将抛出 <c8><a9>IllegalStateException</a9></c8>。
When this occurs the user may slide the topmost view out of the way by dragging it, or by navigating in the direction of the overlapped view using a keyboard.
当发生这种情况时，用户可以通过拖动最上面的 view 来滑动，或者通过使用键盘在重叠 view 的方向上导航。
When true, automatically start animating.
如果为 true，则自动开始动画。
When turned on, it automatically creates two or more constraints for each view as you add them to the layout, but only when appropriate to constrain the view to the parent layout.
打开时，它会在你将每个 view 添加到布局时自动为其创建两个或多个约束，但只有在适当时才将 view 约束到父布局。
When using FragmentPagerAdapter the host ViewPager must have a valid ID set.
当使用 FragmentPagerAdapter 时，ViewPager 必须设置一个有效的 ID。
When using a RatingBar that supports user interaction, placing widgets to the left or right of the RatingBar is discouraged.
使用支持用户交互的 RatingBar 时，不建议将小部件放在 RatingBar 的左侧或右侧。
When using a start icon, the 'start/left' compound drawable of the EditText will be overridden.
使用开始图标时，将覆盖 EditText 的 'start/left' 复合 drawable。
When using the CPU Profiler, pay attention to your app’s <c0><a1>Application</a1></c0> subclass constructors and <c2>com.example.customApplication.onCreate()</c2> methods.
使用 CPU Profiler 时，请注意应用程序的 <c0><a1>Application</a1></c0> 子类构造函数和 <c2>com.example.customApplication.onCreate()</c2> 方法。

When using this flag, if a task is already running for the activity you are now starting, then a new activity will not be started; instead, the current task will simply be brought to the front of the screen with the state it was last in.
使用此标志时，如果任务已在为你正在启动的 activity 运行，则不会启动新的 activity；相反，当前任务只会带到屏幕前面，并显示其上次所处的状态。
When using this flag, the application should provide some easy facility for the user to go out of it.
使用此标志时，应用程序应为用户提供一些简单的便利设施。
When views do not overlap weight behaves as it does in a LinearLayout.
当 view 不重叠时，权重的行为与在 LinearLayout 中的行为相同。
When views do overlap, weight on a slideable pane indicates that the pane should be sized to fill all available space in the closed state.
当 view 重叠时，可滑动面板上的权重指示应调整窗格大小以填充处于关闭状态的所有可用空间。
When we are finished, the new class will be able to substitute for a normal <c1>EditText</c1> view.
当我们完成后，新的类可以替换一个正常的 <c1>EditText</c1> 类。
When working with nested scrolling often the parent view may want an opportunity to consume the scroll before the nested scrolling child does.
在使用嵌套滚动时，父 view 可能希望有机会在嵌套滚动子项之前使用滚动。
When working with such code, it's okay to continue the existing style.
使用此类代码时，可以继续遵循现有样式。

When writing a <c0><a1>RecyclerView.LayoutManager</a1></c0> you almost always want to use layout positions whereas when writing an <c2><a3>RecyclerView.Adapter</a3></c2>, you probably want to use adapter positions.
当你在写 <c0><a1>RecyclerView.LayoutManager</a1></c0> 时，你几乎总是想要使用 layout positions，反之当写 <c2><a3>RecyclerView.Adapter</a3></c2> 时，你几乎总是想要使用 adapter positions。
When writing a custom view, implement this interface to return the default behavior when used as a direct child of an <c0><a1>CoordinatorLayout</a1></c0>.
编写自定义 view 时，实现此接口以在用作 <c0><a1>CoordinatorLayout</a1></c0> 的直接子项时返回默认行为。

When you add a constraint to both sides of a view (and the view size for the same dimension is either "fixed" or "wrap content"), the view becomes centered between the two constraints with a bias of 50% by default.
当向 view 的两侧添加约束时(并且 view 的尺寸的大小为 "fixed" 或 "wrap content")，默认情况下，view 将在两个约束之间居中，偏差为 50%。
When you add a view in a <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1>, it displays a bounding box with square resizing handles on each corner and circular constraint handles on each side.
当你在 <c1>ConstraintLayout</c1> 中添加一个 view 时，它会显示一个边框，每个角上都有方形调整大小的手柄，每边都有圆形的约束手柄。
When you call <c10><a11>Intent.setFlags()</a11></c10> on the <c12><a13>Intent</a13></c12> to set temporary access permissions, the same permissions are applied to all of the content URIs.
在 <c12><a13>Intent</a13></c12> 上调用 <c10><a11>Intent.setFlags()</a11></c10> 来设置临时访问权限时，将应用相同的权限到所有的 content URI。
When you create an <c0><a1>Intent</a1></c0> containing a content URI, in order to send the content URI to a client app, you can also call <c2><a3>Intent.setFlags()</a3></c2> to add permissions.
当你创建包含 content URI 的 <c0><a1>Intent</a1></c0> 时，为了将 content URI 发送到客户端应用程序，还可以调用 <c2><a3>Intent.setFlags()</a3></c2> 添加权限。
When you define an edit text widget, you must specify the <c0><a1>R.styleable.TextView_inputType</a1></c0> attribute.
定义编辑文本小部件时，必须指定 <c0><a1>R.styleable.TextView_inputType</a1></c0> 属性。
When you drop a view into the Layout Editor, it stays where you leave it even if it has no constraints.
当你拖动一个 view 到布局编辑器中，它会停留在你放开它的地方，即使它没有任何约束。
When you pass <c0><a1>onTouchEvent()</a1></c0> a touch event that it doesn't recognize as part of a gesture, it returns <c2>false</c2>.
当你传递 <c0><a1>onTouchEvent()</a1></c0> 触摸事件时，它无法识别为手势的一部分，它将返回 <c2>false</c2>。
When you release, the constraint is made, with <a0>a default margin</a0> separating the two views.
当你松开时，约束就会创建，两个 view 间用 <a0>a default margin</a0> 隔开。
When you set the <c0><a1>app:singleSelection</a1></c0> attribute, checking one chip that belongs to a chip group unchecks any previously checked chip within the same group.
设置 <c0><a1>app:singleSelection</a1></c0> 属性时，选中属于 chip 组的一个 chip 将取消选中同一组中之前已选中的 chip。
When you use this approach, you can add multiple <c6><a7>ClipData</a7></c6> objects to the <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8>, each with its own content URI.
当你使用这种方法时，你可以添加多个 <c6><a7>ClipData</a7></c6> 对象到 <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8> ，每个都有其自己的 content URI 。
When you use this method, the value that logcat displays is the time elapsed from the creation of the application object to the moment <c2><a3>reportFullyDrawn()</a3></c2> is called.
使用此方法时，logcat 显示的值是从创建应用程序对象到调用 <c2><a3>reportFullyDrawn()</a3></c2> 的时间。
When you want to use class Bar from package foo,there are two possible ways to import it:
当你想要使用 foo 包中的 Bar 类时，可以使用以下两种方式导入：
When your application launches, the blank starting window remains on the screen until the system finishes drawing the app for the first time.
当你的应用程序启动时，空白的启动窗口将保留在屏幕上，直到系统首次完成绘制应用程序。
When your view is assigned a size, the layout manager assumes that the size includes all of the view's padding.
为 view 指定大小时，布局管理器会假定该大小包含所有 view 的 padding。
Whenever <c4><a5>setText(java.lang.CharSequence)</a5></c4> is called, TextSwitcher animates the current text out and animates the new text in.
每当调用 <c4><a5>setText(java.lang.CharSequence)</a5></c4> 时，TextSwitcher 会将当前文本设置为动画，并为其中的新文本设置动画。
Whether do show week numbers.
是否显示周数。
Whether items in data set have unique identifiers or not.
数据集中的项是否具有唯一标识符。
Whether or not this view is a heading for accessibility purposes.
此 view 是否是用于辅助功能的标题。
Whether or not you use <c0><a1>GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener</a1></c0>, you must always implement an <c2><a3>onDown()</a3></c2> method that returns <c4>true</c4>.
无论你是否使用 <c0><a1>GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener</a1></c0>，你必须始终实现返回 <c4>true</c4> 的 <c2><a3>onDown()</a3></c2> 方法。
Whether the calendar view is shown.
是否显示日历 view。
Whether the image is animated.
图像是否动画。
Whether the problem lies with unnecessary initializations or disk I/O, the solution calls for lazy-initializing objects: initializing only those objects that are immediately needed.
无论问题在于不必要的初始化还是磁盘 I/O，解决方案都会调用延迟初始化对象：仅初始化那些立即需要的对象。
Whether the spinners are shown.
是否显示微调器。
Whether this View should use a default focus highlight when it gets focused but doesn't have <c0><a1>R.attr.state_focused</a1></c0> defined in its background.
此 view 在聚焦时是否应使用默认焦点高亮，但在其背景中未定义 <c0><a1>R.attr.state_focused</a1></c0>。
Whether this rating bar is an indicator (and non-changeable by the user).
此分级栏是否为指示器(用户不可更改)。
Whether this view has elements that may overlap when drawn.
此 view 是否具有在绘制时可能重叠的元素。
Whether this view is a default-focus view.
此 view 是否为默认焦点 view。
Whether this view is a root of a keyboard navigation cluster.
此 view 是否是键盘导航集群的根。
Whether this view should be treated as a focusable unit by screen reader accessibility tools.
是否应将此视图视为屏幕阅读器辅助功能工具的可聚焦单元。
Whether to draw on/off text.
是否绘制开/关文本。
Whether to split the track and leave a gap for the thumb drawable.
是否分割轨道并留下 thumb drawable 的间隙。

While a <c3>MaterialToolbar</c3> with a transparent background can be used within an <c4><a5>AppBarLayout</a5></c4>, in terms of elevation overlays its main value comes into play with the standalone <c6>Toolbar</c6> case, when using the <c7>Widget.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Surface</c7> style with elevation.
虽然具有透明背景的 <c3>MaterialToolbar</c3> 可以在 <c4><a5>AppBarLayout</a5></c4> 中使用，但就高程覆盖而言，其主要值与独立 <c6>Toolbar</c6> 案例，当使用带有高程的 <c7>Widget.MaterialComponents.Toolbar.Surface</c7> 样式时。

While an action bar is traditionally part of an <c2><a3>Activity's</a3></c2> opaque window decor controlled by the framework, a Toolbar may be placed at any arbitrary level of nesting within a view hierarchy.
虽然操作栏传统上是框架控制的 <c2><a3>Activity's</a3></c2> 不透明窗口装饰的一部分，但工具栏可以放置在 view 层次结构中的任意嵌套层级。
While both have default behavior, the default <c2>onDraw()</c2> will do nothing, and the default <c3>onMeasure()</c3> will always set a size of 100x100 — which is probably not what you want.
虽然这 2 个方法都有默认的行为，默认的 <c2>onDraw()</c2> 什么也不做，默认的 <c3>onMeasure()</c3> 将设置尺寸为 100x100 — 这可能并不是你想的。

While inPurgeable can help avoid big Dalvik heap allocations (from API level 11 onward), it sacrifices performance predictability since any image that the view system tries to draw may incur a decode delay which can lead to dropped frames.
虽然 inPurgeable 可以帮助避免大 Dalvik 堆分配(从 API 级别 11 开始)，但它牺牲了性能可预测性，因为视图系统尝试绘制的任何图像都可能导致解码延迟，从而导致丢帧。
While it is not possible to uncheck a particular radio button, the radio group can be cleared to remove the checked state.
虽然无法取消选中特定单选按钮，但可以清除单选组以移除选中状态。
While logging is necessary, it has a significantly negative impact on performance and quickly loses its usefulness if not kept reasonably terse.
虽然日志记录非常有必要，但对性能却有明显的负面影响，如果不能保持一定程度的简洁性，就会迅速失去其实用性。
While much discussion has surrounded this rule, the decision remains that 100 characters is the maximum <e0>with the following exceptions</e0>:
虽然关于此规则存在很多争论，但最终决定仍是以 100 个字符为上限，<e0>with the following exceptions</e0>：
While the <c0>name</c0> attribute is a URI path segment, the <c1>path</c1> value is an actual subdirectory name.
虽然 <c0>name</c0> 属性是一个 URI 路径段，但 <c1>path</c1> 值是一个实际的子目录名称。
While they can be handy for doing cleanup (particularly of external resources), there are no guarantees as to when a finalizer will be called (or even that it will be called at all).
虽然终结器非常便于进行资源清理(尤其是外部资源)，但并不能保证终结器何时被调用(甚至根本不会被调用)。

While you may think your code will never encounter this error condition or that it is not important to handle it, ignoring exceptions as above creates mines in your code for someone else to trigger some day.
虽然你可能认为自己的代码永远不会遇到这种错误，或者无需费心处理这种错误，但像上例那样忽略异常会在你的代码中埋下隐患，这种错误总有一天会被他人触发。
Widget used to show an image with the standard QuickContact badge and on-click behavior.
窗口小部件用于显示具有标准 QuickContact 徽章和点击行为的图像。
Widgets are referenced by being added to a comma separated list of ids, e.g:
通过添加到逗号分隔的 id 列表来引用小部件，例如：
Widgets can then be constrained to a Guideline, allowing multiple widgets to be positioned easily from one Guideline, or allowing reactive layout behavior by using percent positioning.
然后，部件可以由 Guideline 限制，允许多个部件根据 Guideline 轻松地定位，或通过百分比定位来允许响应式布局。
Widgets can then be positioned by constraining them to such guidelines.
然后部件可以通过这样的 guideline 来约束定位。
Widgets dimension constraints
小部件尺寸约束
Width is always <c1>MATCH_PARENT</c1>.
宽度始终为 <c1>MATCH_PARENT</c1>。
Width of the dropdown in spinnerMode="dropdown".
spinnerMode="dropdown" 中下拉列表的宽度。
Width of the stroke used to draw the gesture.
用于绘制手势的笔划宽度。
Will be called if there is an error in the input.
如果输入中有错误，将被调用。
Will typically result in a <c0><a1>Bitmap.Config.HARDWARE</a1></c0> allocation, but may be software for small images.
通常会产生 <c0><a1>Bitmap.Config.HARDWARE</a1></c0> 分配，但如果是小图像则为软件分配。
Window flag: request a translucent status bar with minimal system-provided background protection.
窗口标志：请求半透明状态栏，系统提供的背景保护最小。
With a <c2><a3>VectorDrawable</a3></c2> object, a 100-byte file can generate a sharp image the size of the screen.
使用 <c2><a3>VectorDrawable</a3></c2> 对象，100 字节的文件可以生成与屏幕大小相同的清晰图像。
With an intent, the app uses only a subset of the previously initialized state data.
根据 intent，应用程序仅使用先前初始化的状态数据的子集。
With hardware-acceleration, intermediate cache layers are largely unnecessary and can easily result in a net loss in performance due to the cost of creating and updating the layer.
通过硬件加速，中间缓存层在很大程度上是不必要的，并且由于创建和更新层的成本，很容易导致性能的净损失。
With this configuration, each pixel requires 1 byte of memory.
采用这种配置，每个像素需要 1 个字节的内存。
Within a given module, other than at the VERBOSE level, an error should only be reported once if possible.
在指定模块中，除了 VERBOSE 级别之外，一个错误应该只报告一次（如果可能的话）。

Within a single chain of function calls within a module, only the innermost function should return the error, and callers in the same module should only add some logging if that significantly helps to isolate the issue.
在模块内的单个函数调用链中，只有最内层的函数应当返回错误，同一模块中的调用者只能添加一些明显有助于隔离问题的日志记录。
Without a <c2>strokeColor</c2>, the card will not render a stroked border, regardless of the <c3>strokeWidth</c3> value.
如果没有 <c2>strokeColor</c2>，则无论 <c3>strokeWidth</c3> 值如何，卡都不会呈现描边边框。
Without one, an error will result in an <c0>Exception</c0> being thrown.
若没有设置一个，错误将导致抛出 <c0>Exception</c0>。

You add a text watcher using the <c2><a3>TextView#addTextChangedListener</a3></c2> method.

You also can receive callbacks as a user changes text by adding a <c0><a1>TextWatcher</a1></c0> to the edit text.
通过向编辑文本添加 <c0><a1>TextWatcher</a1></c0>，当用户更改文本时，你也可以接收回调。
You also need to make your view respond to user input in a way that closely resembles the real-world action you're mimicking.
你还需要使 view 以与你模仿的真实动作非常相似的方式响应用户输入。
You can add a vertical or horizontal guideline to which you can constrain views, and the guideline will be invisible to app users.
你可以添加可以约束 view 的垂直或者水平的参考线，并且该参考线对于应用用户而言是不可见的。
You can add views either from code or by specifying a tree of views in one or more XML layout files.
你即可以通过代码添加 view，也可以在一个或多个 XML 文件中申明 view 树。
You can address this issue as follows:
你可以按如下方式解决此问题：
You can adjust this default by setting the <c4><a5>android:max</a5></c4> attribute.
你可以通过设置 <c4><a5>android:max</a5></c4> 属性来调整此默认值。
You can also add items to TabLayout in your layout through the use of <c0><a1>TabItem</a1></c0>.
你还可以通过使用 <c0><a1>TabItem</a1></c0> 将项目添加到布局中的 TabLayout。
You can also choose to skip converting any files where the encoded version would be larger than the original, or any files with transparency or an alpha channel.
你还可以选择跳过转换编码版本大于原始文件的任何文件，或任何具有透明度或 Alpha 通道的文件。

You can also create listeners for events that your contained views might generate, for example, a listener method for the List Item Click Listener to update the contents of the EditText if a list selection is made.
你也可以监听器来临听内部容纳的 view 产生的事件，比如如果设置了 list 选项，可以设置 List Item 的点击监听器来更新 EditText 的内容。
You can also define an optional drawable section of the image (effectively, the padding lines) by drawing a line on the right and bottom lines.
你可以选择，通过在右边框或上边框画线，来定义图片的绘制区域，(本质上，就是 paddding 线。)。
You can also define one dimension of a widget as a ratio of the other one.
你还可以把一个小部件的一个尺寸定义为相对于另一个的比例。
You can also gain insight into potential bottlenecks through inline tracing inside of your apps’ and activities’ <c0>onCreate()</c0> methods.
你还可以通过内嵌跟踪应用程序和 activity 的 <c0>onCreate()</c0> 方法来深入了解潜在的瓶颈。
You can also measure the time to initial display by running your app with the <a0>ADB Shell Activity Manager</a0> command.
你还可以使用 <a0>ADB Shell Activity Manager</a0> 命令运行应用程序来测量初始显示的时间。
You can also modify various characteristics of the action bar or remove it completely.
你还可以修改操作栏的各种特征或完全移除它。
You can also omit resources that are only a rotated equivalent of another resource.
你还可以省略仅与另一个资源的旋转等价的资源。
You can also put the content URI in a <c0><a1>ClipData</a1></c0> object and then add the object to an <c2><a3>Intent</a3></c2> you send to a client app.
你也可以将 content URI 放在 <c0><a1>ClipData</a1></c0> 对象中，然后将该对象添加到发送给客户端应用的 <c2><a3>Intent</a3></c2> 。
You can also reduce your APK size by procedurally rendering your images.
你还可以通过程序化渲染图片来缩小 APK 尺寸。
You can also select all the views you want to align, and then click <b0>Align</b0> <i1> in the toolbar to select the alignment type.
你还可以选择所有要对齐的 view，然后单击工具栏中的 <b0>Align</b0> <i1>来选择对齐方式。

You can also specify gravity, which specifies the alignment of all the child elements by calling <c2><a3>setGravity()</a3></c2> or specify that specific children grow to fill up any remaining space in the layout by setting the <e4>weight</e4> member of <c5><a6>LinearLayoutCompat.LayoutParams</a6></c5>.
你还可以通过调用 <c2><a3>setGravity()</a3></c2> 指定重力，指定所有子元素的对齐方式，或者指定特定子项增长以填充布局中的任何剩余空间，通过设置 <c5><a6>LinearLayoutCompat.LayoutParams</a6></c5> 的 <e4>weight</e4> 成员。
You can also use a color resource when a drawable resource is expected in XML (for example, <c0>android:drawable="@color/green"</c0>).
当 XML 中需要可绘制资源时，你也可以使用颜色资源(例如，<c0>android:drawable="@color/green"</c0>)。
You can also use an alternative, mobile-friendly library to add specific functionality to your app.
你还可以使用其他适合移动设备的库来为你的应用添加特定功能。
You can also use ratio if both dimensions are set to <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0> (0dp).
如果两个尺寸均设置为 <c0>MATCH_CONSTRAINT</c0> (0dp)，也可以使用比例。
You can attach an <c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0> object to a view using <c2><a3>setAnimation(Animation)</a3></c2> or <c4><a5>startAnimation(Animation)</a5></c4>.
你可以给 view 附加一个 <c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0> 对象，用 <c2><a3>setAnimation(Animation)</a3></c2> 或 <c4><a5>startAnimation(Animation)</a5></c4> 方法。

You can attach an <c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0> object to a view using <c2><a3>setAnimation(android.view.animation.Animation)</a3></c2> or <c4><a5>startAnimation(android.view.animation.Animation)</a5></c4>.
你可以给 view 附加一个 <c0><a1>Animation</a1></c0> 对象，用 <c2><a3>setAnimation(android.view.animation.Animation)</a3></c2> 或 <c4><a5>startAnimation(android.view.animation.Animation)</a5></c4> 方法。
You can build this yourself by manually calling <c0>adapter.notify*</c0> methods when content changes, or you can use one of the easier solutions RecyclerView provides:
你可以在内容更改时手动调用 <c0>adapter.notify*</c0> 方法自行构建，也可以使用 RecyclerView 提供的更简单的解决方案之一：
You can change it by providing a custom <c0><a1>GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup</a1></c0> instance via <c2><a3>setSpanSizeLookup(SpanSizeLookup)</a3></c2>.
你可以改变它通过提供自定义的 <c0><a1>GridLayoutManager.SpanSizeLookup</a1></c0> 实例，通过 <c2><a3>setSpanSizeLookup(SpanSizeLookup)</a3></c2>。
You can change the way the height and width are calculated by clicking the symbols indicated with callout <s0>3</s0> in figure 10.
你可以通过单击图 10 中标注 <s0>3</s0> 所示的符号来更改计算高度和宽度的方式。
You can change this via <c0><a1>setContentScrim(Drawable)</a1></c0>.
你可以通过 <c0><a1>setContentScrim(Drawable)</a1></c0> 更改此设置。
You can change this via <c0><a1>setStatusBarScrim(Drawable)</a1></c0>.
你可以通过 <c0><a1>setStatusBarScrim(Drawable)</a1></c0> 更改此设置。
You can choose any alias you want for your namespace.
你可以为命名空间选择所需的任何别名。
You can constrain a widget on the horizontal and vertical axis:
你可以在水平和垂直轴上约束小部件：
You can control the format of this surface and, if you like, its size; the SurfaceView takes care of placing the surface at the correct location on the screen
你可以控制此 surface 的格式，如果你愿意，也可以控制其大小；SurfaceView 负责将 surface 放置在屏幕上的正确位置
You can control this behavior via <c0><a1>setGapStrategy(int)</a1></c0>.
你可以通过 <c0><a1>setGapStrategy(int)</a1></c0> 控制这种行为。
You can convert existing BMP, JPG, PNG or static GIF images to WebP format using Android Studio.
你可以使用 Android Studio 将现有的 BMP，JPG，PNG 或静态 GIF 图像转换为 WebP 格式。
You can convert individual images or folders of images.
你可以转换图像的单个图像或文件夹。
You can create constraints only between a constraint handle and an anchor point that share the same plane.
只能在共享的同一平面的约束句柄和锚点之间创建约束。
You can define the distance from the edge with margin.
你可以使用 margin 定义到边缘的距离。

You can do all of the things you would do with a fully customized component, but by starting with a more specialized class in the View hierarchy, you can also get a lot of behavior for free that probably does exactly what you want.
一个完全自定义的可以做的，继承一个更特定的 view 也可以做，而且你还能免费获得更多的行为，也许正是你想要的行为。
You can drag the slider left or right to change the quality setting and immediately see the effect on the encoded image and the file size.
你可以向左或向右拖动滑块以更改质量设置，并立即看到对编码图像和文件大小的影响。
You can either create a new View manually or inflate it from an XML layout file.
可以手动创建新 View，也可以从一个 XML 布局文件中加载。
You can either use the factory to create the views, or add them yourself.
你可以使用工厂创建 view，也可以自己添加它们。
You can find examples of using ViewPager in the API 4+ Support Demos and API 13+ Support Demos sample code.
你可以在 API 4+ 支持演示和 API 13+ 支持演示示例代码中找到使用 ViewPager 的示例。
You can generally acquire the <c0><a1>Resources</a1></c0> instance associated with your application with <c2><a3>getResources()</a3></c2>.
你通常可以使用 <c2><a3>getResources()</a3></c2> 获取与你的应用程序关联的 <c0><a1>Resources</a1></c0> 实例。

You can give it a start time in the <c0><a1>SystemClock#elapsedRealtime</a1></c0> timebase, and it counts up from that, or if you don't give it a base time, it will use the time at which you call <c2><a3>start()</a3></c2>.
你可以在 <c0><a1>SystemClock#elapsedRealtime</a1></c0> 时基中给它一个开始时间，并从中计算，或者如果你没有给它一个基准时间，它将使用它你调用 <c2><a3>start()</a3></c2> 的时间。
You can have as many stretchable sections as you want: their relative size stays the same, so the largest sections always remain the largest.
你可以有任意多的可伸缩部分，它们的将保持相对的大小，所以最大的部分始终是最大的。
You can include a separate resource for variations of an image, such as tinted, shaded, or rotated versions of the same image.
你可以为图像的变体添加单独的资源，例如同一图像的着色，着色或旋转版本。
You can offset the alignment by dragging the view inward from the constraint.
你可以通过从视图向内拖动约束来偏移对齐。
You can often diagnose this problem by observing a slow response when a user launches your app.
你通常可以在用户启动应用时观察响应缓慢来诊断此问题。
You can perform layout of your inner UI elements to account for non-fullscreen system UI through the <c4><a5>fitSystemWindows(Rect)</a5></c4> method.
你可以通过 <c4><a5>fitSystemWindows(Rect)</a5></c4> 方法执行内部 UI 元素的布局以考虑非全屏系统 UI。
You can perform layout of your inner UI elements to account for the navigation system UI through the <c4><a5>fitSystemWindows(Rect)</a5></c4> method.
你可以通过 <c4><a5>fitSystemWindows(Rect)</a5></c4> 方法执行内部 UI 元素的布局以考虑导航系统 UI。
You can position the guideline within the layout based on either dp units or percent, relative to the layout's edge.
你可以根据相对于布局边缘的 dp 单位或者百分百在布局中定位参考线。
You can reduce PNG file sizes without losing image quality using tools like <a0>pngcrush</a0>, <a1>pngquant</a1>, or <a2>zopflipng</a2>.
你可以使用 <a0>pngcrush</a0>，<a1>pngquant</a1> 或 <a2>zopflipng</a2> 等工具减少 PNG 文件大小而不会丢失图像质量。
You can register a listener on the close icon with <c4><a5>setOnCloseIconClickListener(OnClickListener)</a5></c4>.
你可以使用 <c4><a5>setOnCloseIconClickListener(OnClickListener)</a5></c4> 在关闭图标上注册一个监听器。
You can register a listener on the main chip with <c0><a1>setOnClickListener(OnClickListener)</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>setOnCheckedChangeListener(OnCheckedChangeListener)</a3></c2>.
你可以使用 <c0><a1>setOnClickListener(OnClickListener)</a1></c0> 或 <c2><a3>setOnCheckedChangeListener(OnCheckedChangeListener)</a3></c2> 在主 chip 上注册监听器。
You can register such a listener using <c1><a2>setOnFocusChangeListener(android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener)</a2></c1>.
你可以注册这样一监听器，使用 <c1><a2>setOnFocusChangeListener(android.view.View.OnFocusChangeListener)</a2></c1>。
You can rely on these positions to be consistent with what user is currently seeing on the screen.
你可以依赖这些位置, 这些位置与用户当前在屏幕上看到的位置是一致的。
You can see some sample usages of the LabelView custom View in <a0>custom_view_1.xml</a0> from the samples.
你可在示例中的 <a0>custom_view_1.xml</a0> 文件中看到一些使用示例。
You can send the content URI returned by <c6><a7>getUriForFile()</a7></c6> to another app in an <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8>.
你可以将由 <c6><a7>getUriForFile()</a7></c6> 返回的 content URI 放到 <c8><a9>Intent</a9></c8> 中发送给其他应用程序。
You can set <c0><a1>android:layout_weight</a1></c0> on individual child views to specify how linear layout divides remaining space amongst the views it contains.
你可以在各个子 view 上设置 <c0><a1>android:layout_weight</a1></c0>，以指定线性布局如何在其包含的 view 之间划分剩余空间。
You can set the title to display via <c0><a1>setTitle(CharSequence)</a1></c0>.
你可以通过 <c0><a1>setTitle(CharSequence)</a1></c0> 设置要显示的标题。
You can set the view size to a ratio such as 16:9 if at least one of the view dimensions is set to "match constraints" (<c0>0dp</c0>).
如果至少有一个 view 尺寸设置为 "match constraints" (<c0>0dp</c0>)，则可以将 view 大小设置为比例，例如 16:9。
You can specify the layout using the declarative XML files just like with an activity screen, or you can create views programmatically and nest them into the layout from your code.
就像 Activity 一样，你可以在 XML 文件中申明布局，也可以通过编程的方式用代码嵌套。

You can supply a constructor which can take attributes and parameters from the XML, and you can also consume your own such attributes and parameters (perhaps the color and range of the VU meter, or the width and damping of the needle, etc.)
你可以提供一个构造方法来从 XML 文件中获取属性和参数，你也可以使用这些属性和参数(比如 VU 表范围的颜色，指针的宽度和阻尼等)。
You can then adjust the whole chain's bias (left/right or up/down) by changing the chain's head view bias.
然后，你可以通过更改链头 view 的偏差来调整整个链的偏差(左/右或上/下)。
You can then run your own custom gesture-detection code.
然后，你可以运行自己的自定义手势检测代码。

You can update the percentage of progress displayed by using the <c0><a1>setProgress(int)</a1></c0> method, or by calling <c2><a3>incrementProgressBy(int)</a3></c2> to increase the current progress completed by a specified amount.
你可以使用 <c0><a1>setProgress(int)</a1></c0> 方法更新显示的进度百分比，或者通过调用 <c2><a3>incrementProgressBy(int)</a3></c2> 以指定的金额增加当前完成的进度。
You can use a color resource any place that accepts a hexadecimal color value.
你可以在任何接受十六进制颜色值的地方使用颜色资源。
You can use constraints to achieve different types of layout behavior, as described in the following sections.
你可以使用约束来实现不同类型的布局行为，如一下各章节所述。
You can use method tracing or inline tracing to try to diagnose the problem.
你可以使用方法跟踪或内联跟踪来尝试诊断问题。
You can use scrollers (<c0><a1>Scroller</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>OverScroller</a3></c2>) to collect the data you need to produce a scrolling animation—for example, in response to a fling gesture.
你可以使用 scroller(<c0><a1>Scroller</a1></c0> 或 <c2><a3>OverScroller</a3></c2>)来收集生成滚动动画所需的数据。例如，响应一个 fling 手势。
You can use the <c0><a1>reportFullyDrawn()</a1></c0> method to measure the elapsed time between application launch and complete display of all resources and view hierarchies.
你可以使用 <c0><a1>reportFullyDrawn()</a1></c0> 方法来度量应用程序启动和完全显示所有资源和视图层次结构之间所用的时间。
You can use the activity's <c1>windowBackground</c1> theme attribute to provide a simple custom drawable for the starting activity.
你可以使用 activity 的 <c1>windowBackground</c1> 主题属性为起始 activity 提供简单的自定义 drawable。
You can use the corner handles to resize a view, but this hard codes the size so the view will not resize for different content or screen sizes.
你可以使用拐角手柄来调整 view 大小，但这样会硬编码大小，因此 view 不会调整为不同的内容或屏幕尺寸大小。
You can use these methods in <c8><a9>onDraw()</a9></c8> to create your custom user interface (UI).
你可以在 <c8><a9>onDraw()</a9></c8> 中使用这些方法来创建自定义用户界面(UI)。
You can use this class to access your application's resources.
你可以使用此类访问应用程序的资源。
You can use this method to find the current offsets of the x and y coordinates, for example:
你可以使用此方法查找 x 和 y 坐标的当前偏移量，例如：
You can use this to create an array of other resources, such as drawables.
你可以使用它来创建其他资源的数组，例如 drawable。
You can use vector graphics to create resolution-independent icons and other scalable media.
你可以使用矢量图形来创建与分辨率无关的图标和其他可伸缩媒体。
You can't share a single file by its file name, nor can you specify a subset of files using wildcards.
你不能按文件名共享单个文件，也不能使用通配符指定文件的子集。

You can, however, add multiple children to a FrameLayout and control their position within the FrameLayout by assigning gravity to each child, using the <a0><c1>android:layout_gravity</c1></a0> attribute.
但是，你可以使用 <a0><c1>android:layout_gravity</c1></a0> 属性，通过为每个子项分配重力，将多个子项添加到 FrameLayout 并控制它们在 FrameLayout 中的位置。
You could capture other events like key presses and handle them in some custom way (such as for a game).
你可以捕获其他事件，比如按键，并且自己处理事件(比如在游戏中)。

You could combine a group of View components into a new single component, perhaps to make something like a ComboBox (a combination of popup list and free entry text field), a dual-pane selector control (a left and right pane with a list in each where you can re-assign which item is in which list), and so on.
你可以用一组 View 组件组成一个新的单一组件，比如类似于一个 ComboBox（弹出窗口列表和一个自由输入的文本框的组合）、一个双窗口的选择控制器（左右窗口各有一个列表，你可以重新分配哪些 item 是在所选列表中）等等。（译注：第二个比如日类似日期、时间选择的那种）。

You could combine a group of View components into a new single component, perhaps to make something like a ComboBox (a combination of popup list and free entry text field), a dual-pane selector control (a left and right pane with a list in each where you can reassign which item is in which list), and so on.
你可以用一组 View 组件组成一个新的单一组件，比如类似于一个 ComboBox（弹出窗口列表和一个自由输入的文本框的组合）、一个双窗口的选择控制器（左右窗口各有一个列表，你可以重新分配哪些 item 是在所选列表中）等等。（译注：第二个比如日类似日期、时间选择的那种）。
You could create a completely custom-rendered View type, for example a "volume control" knob rendered using 2D graphics, and which resembles an analog electronic control.
你可以创建完全自己渲染的 View 类，比如一个用 2D 图呈现的 "音量控制" 旋扭。
You could override the way that an EditText component is rendered on the screen (the <a0> Notepad Tutorial</a0> uses this to good effect to create a lined notepad page).
你可以重写 EditText 在屏幕上呈现的方式(<a0>Notepad Tutorial</a0> 使用这点创建一个按行排的记事本，效果良好)。
You could override the way that an EditText component is rendered on the screen (the <a0>Notepad Tutorial</a0> uses this to good effect, to create a lined-notepad page).
你可以重写 EditText 在屏幕上呈现的方式(<a0>Notepad Tutorial</a0> 使用这点创建一个按行排的记事本，效果良好)。
You create tabs via <c2><a3>newTab()</a3></c2>.
你可以通过 <c2><a3>newTab()</a3></c2> 创建标签。
You define how to order items, and it will automatically trigger update signals that RecyclerView can use.
你可以定义如何排序项目，它将自动触发 RecyclerView 可以使用的更新信号。
You do not need to override all of these methods.
你不需要重写所有的方法。
You do not need to write Javadoc for trivial get and set methods such as <c0>setFoo()</c0> if all your Javadoc would say is "sets Foo".
对于普通的 get 和 set 方法(如 setFoo())，你无需编写 Javadoc，要写也不过是 "设置 Foo"。
You have to invalidate the view after any change to its properties that might change its appearance, so that the system knows that it needs to be redrawn.
在对可能更改其外观的属性进行任何更改后，必须使 view 无效，以便系统知道需要重新绘制该 view。
You indicate a stretchable section by drawing one (or more) 1-pixel-wide black line(s) in the left and top part of the border (the other border pixels should be fully transparent or white).
你可以通过在左边框或上边框，画一段或多段 1 像素宽的黑线，来指明可伸缩的部分。（其他的边框像素应该完全透明或是白色）。
You just need to make sure to check the current API level at runtime, and omit the calls to the view animation system if the current level is less than 11.
你只需确保在运行时检查当前 API 级别，如果当前级别小于 11，则忽略对 view 动画系统的调用。
You may otherwise add the action bar by calling <c2><a3>requestFeature(FEATURE_SUPPORT_ACTION_BAR)</a3></c2> or by declaring it in a custom theme with the <c4><a5>windowActionBar</a5></c4> property.
你可以添加操作栏，通过调用 <c2><a3>requestFeature(FEATURE_SUPPORT_ACTION_BAR)</a3></c2> 或在自定义主题中使用 <c4><a5>windowActionBar</a5></c4> 属性。
You may wish to theme your app’s loading experience, so that the app’s launch screen is thematically consistent with the rest of the app, instead of with the system theming.
你可能希望主题化应用程序的加载体验，以便应用程序的启动屏幕与应用程序的其余部分主题一致，而不是系统主题。
You might also create your own properties with accessors and modifiers, for example, allow the EditText value to be set initially in the component and query for its contents when needed.
你也可以创建你自己属性的访问和修改方法，比如允许设置 EditText 的初始值获当需要时获取它的内容。（译注：allow the EditText value to be set initially in the component and query for its contents when needed，我也不知道是获取初始值的内容还是 EditText 的内容，反正影响不大。）。
You might call this object to iterate the list of tabs, or to tweak the layout of the tab list, but most methods should be called on the containing TabHost object.
你可以调用此对象来迭代选项卡列表，或者调整选项卡列表的布局，但是应该在包含 TabHost 对象上调用大多数方法。
You might need to make some adjustments to be sure the layout responds as you intend for different screen sizes and orientations.
你可能需要进行一些调整，以确保布局响应你打算为不同的屏幕尺寸和方向。
You might override other <c0>on...</c0> methods, like <c1>onKeyDown()</c1>, to perhaps choose certain default values from the popup list of a combo box when a certain key is pressed.
你可能要重写一些 <c0>on...</c0> 方法，比如重写 <c1>onKeyDown()</c1> 方法，当某个按键按下时，从 combo box 的 popup list 中选择某个值。

You must always be on the UI thread when calling any method on any view.</e0> If you are doing work on other threads and want to update the state of a view from that thread, you should use a <c1><a2>Handler</a2></c1>.
你必须在主线程调用任何 view 的任何方法。</e0>如果你在其他线程工作并想在那个线程更新 view 的状态，应该使用 <c1><a2>Handler</a2></c1>。
You must call <c0><a1>getSupportFragmentManager()</a1></c0> to get the <c2><a3>FragmentManager</a3></c2>
你必须调用 <c0><a1>getSupportFragmentManager()</a1></c0> 以获得 <c2><a3>FragmentManager</a3></c2>。

You must ensure that the drawing thread only touches the underlying Surface while it is valid -- between <c0><a1>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceCreated</a1></c0> and <c2><a3>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceDestroyed</a3></c2>.
你必须确保绘制线程仅在其有效时触及底层 Surface - 在 <c0><a1>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceCreated</a1></c0> 和 <c2><a3>SurfaceHolder.Callback#surfaceDestroyed</a3></c2>。
You must handle every Exception in your code in a principled way; the specific handling varies depending on the case.
你必须有原则地处理代码中的每个异常；具体处理方式因情况而异。
You must handle the padding values when you calculate your view's size.
在计算 view 大小时，必须处理 padding 值。
You must provide a <c0><a1>Tokenizer</a1></c0> to distinguish the various substrings.
你必须提供 <c0><a1>Tokenizer</a1></c0> 以区分各种子字符串。
You must specify a child element of <c0><paths></c0> for each directory that contains files for which you want content URIs.
你必须为每个包含你需要 content URI 的文件的目录指定 <c0><paths></c0> 的子元素。

You need to use an <c0><a1>AutoCompleteTextView</a1></c0> instead of a <c2><a3>TextInputEditText</a3></c2> as the input text child, and a Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.(...).ExposedDropdownMenu style.
你需要使用 <c0><a1>AutoCompleteTextView</a1></c0> 而不是 <c2><a3>TextInputEditText</a3></c2> 作为输入文本子项和 Widget.MaterialComponents.TextInputLayout.(...).ExposedDropdownMenu 样式。
You should <e0>never</e0> fix this issue by calling <c1>holder.itemView.setHasTransientState(false);</c1> unless you've previously called <c2>holder.itemView.setHasTransientState(true);</c2>.
除非你以前调用过 <c2>holder.itemView.setHasTransientState(true);</c2>，否则你 <e0>不应该</e0> 通过调用 <c1>holder.itemView.setHasTransientState(false);</c1> 来解决此问题。
You should add a listener via <c0><a1>addOnTabSelectedListener(OnTabSelectedListener)</a1></c0> to be notified when any tab's selection state has been changed.
你应该通过 <c0><a1>addOnTabSelectedListener(OnTabSelectedListener)</a1></c0> 添加一个监听器，以便在任何选项卡的选择状态发生更改时得到通知。
You should always prefer to end or cancel animations that are triggering the transient state instead of handling it manually.
你应该始终希望结束或取消触发瞬态的动画，而不是手动处理它。
You should log only what is needed to gather enough information about what is going on about your component.
你应该只记录收集有关组件的足够信息所需的信息。
You should never make assumptions about the size of your view on the screen.
你永远不应该在屏幕上对 view 的大小做出假设。
You should not call methods that perform these actions on views yourself unless you are actually implementing a <c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0>.
你不应在 view 中调用方法来执行这些操作，除非你实际上继承了一个 <c0><a1>ViewGroup</a1></c0>。
You should redefine <c2>mtrl_on_surface_emphasis_medium</c2> to be #99FF0000.
你应该将 <c2>mtrl_on_surface_emphasis_medium</c2> 重新定义为 #99FF0000。
You should specify a content description for the icon.
你应该为图标指定内容描述。
You should specify a drawable and content description for the icon.
你应该为图标指定 drawable 和内容描述。
You should still always use the returned Bitmap of the decode method and not assume that reusing the bitmap worked, due to the constraints outlined above and failure situations that can occur.
由于上述限制和可能发生的故障情况，你仍应始终使用解码方法返回的位图，并且不要假定重用位图有效。
You supply an implementation of a <c0><a1>PagerAdapter</a1></c0> to generate the pages that the view shows.
你提供了 <c0><a1>PagerAdapter</a1></c0> 的实现，以生成 view 显示的页面。
You typically won't use many methods directly on this object.
你通常不会直接在此对象上使用许多方法。
You use the predefined constants to read the attributes from the <c3><a4>TypedArray</a4></c3>.
你可以使用预定义常量从 <c3><a4>TypedArray</a4></c3> 中读取属性。
You will almost certainly want to override <c0>onMeasure()</c0> and are also likely to need to override <c1>onDraw()</c1> if you want the component to show something.
如果你想要你的组伯显示一些东西，几乎可以肯定你需要重写 <c0>onMeasure()</c0> 和 <c1>onDraw()</c1> 方法。
You will probably want to create your own event listeners, property accessors and modifiers, and possibly more sophisticated behavior in your component class as well.
你也可以在你的组件类中创建自己的事件监听器，属性的获取、设置方法，也可能更复杂的行为。
You will receive the down event here.
你将在这里收到 down 事件。
Your APK can contain content that users download but never use, like regional or language information.
你的 APK 可以包含用户下载但从不使用的内容，例如区域或语言信息。
Your activity must extend <c0><a1>FragmentActivity</a1></c0>
你的 activity 必须继承 <c0><a1>FragmentActivity</a1></c0>
Your app may waste time during startup if your Application subclasses perform initializations that don’t need to be done yet.
如果你的应用程序子类执行不需要执行的初始化，则你的应用程序可能会在启动期间浪费时间。
Your app’s initial <c0><a1>onCreate()</a1></c0> function.
你的应用的初始 <c0><a1>onCreate()</a1></c0> 函数。
Your component's <c0>onMeasure()</c0> method should calculate a measurement width and height which will be required to render the component.
你的组件的 <c0>onMeasure()</c0> 方法将计算出一个测量的宽度和高度，以用来呈现该组件。
Your custom view can also extend <c2><a3>View</a3></c2> directly, or you can save time by extending one of the existing view subclasses, such as <c4><a5>Button</a5></c4>.
你的自定义 view 也可以直接继承 <c2><a3>View</a3></c2>，或者你可以通过继承其中一个现有 view 子类来节省时间，例如 <c4><a5>Button</a5></c4>。
Your custom view should support the widest range of users.
你的自定义 view 应该支持最广泛的用户。
Your image is converted immediately.
你的图像会立即转换。
Your images are converted in place in their original location.
你的图像会在原始位置转换。
Your terminal window should also display the following:
你的终端窗口还应显示以下内容：
Your theme's <c2>?attr/colorControlActivated</c2>, <c3>?attr/colorSurface</c3>, and <c4>?attr/colorOnSurface</c4> must be set.
必须设置主题的 <c2>?attr/colorControlActivated</c2>，<c3>?attr/colorSurface</c3> 和 <c4>?attr/colorOnSurface</c4>。
a ViewHolder that can be re-used for this position.
可以被重用于该位置的 ViewHolder。
a float value, representing a ratio between width and height
浮点值，表示宽度与高度之间的比例。
a logical type and that its value should be one of the explicitly
表示一个逻辑类型，并且它的值应该是显示指明的常量之一。
a new Source object, which can be passed to <c0><a1>decodeDrawable</a1></c0> or <c2><a3>decodeBitmap</a3></c2>.
一个新的 Source 对象，可以传递给 <c0><a1>decodeDrawable</a1></c0> 或 <c2><a3>decodeBitmap</a3></c2>。
a ratio in the form "width:height"
"width:height" 形式的比例
abort - we have a deadline we can't meet
中止 - 我们有一个最后期限，我们不能满足

添加于 <a0>API level 19</a0>
added in <a0>API level 28</a0>
添加于 <a0>API level 28</a0>
alpha property of the view, as a value between 0 (completely transparent) and 1 (completely opaque).
view 的 alpha 属性，作为 0(完全透明)和 1(完全不透明)之间的值。
an array of <t0>StackTraceElement</t0>, each represents one stack frame.
一个 <t0>StackTraceElement</t0> 数组，每一个元素表示一个堆栈帧。
an exact number
一个精确的数字
an instance of <c0><a1>ViewGroup.LayoutParams</a1></c0> or one of its descendants
<c0><a1>ViewGroup.LayoutParams</a1></c0> 的一个实例或其后代之一
